K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:135b-1: shr'i ba ra m'a ng+ya mantra kalpa khanda n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:135b-3: dpal mchog dang po'i sngags kyi rtog pa'i dum bu zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:135b-4: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:135b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136a-0: @136a *// chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136a-1: rdo rje chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dpal mchog dang po thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136a-2: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136a-3: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i dngos grub dam pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136a-6: khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136a-7: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi dngos grub dam pa ni sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-0: 'khor ba la yang ma @136b chags shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-1: brtson 'grus chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par yongs su bskyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-2: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-3: bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-5: ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-6: mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-7: ji srid mtshungs med sems can don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-8: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-9: shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-10: ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-11: chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-13: chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-14: 'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-15: 'jig rten sdig byed de sbyang phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-17: ci ltar padma rab dmar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-18: 'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-19: de bzhin gnas kyi nyes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-20: 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-21: 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-22: bde ba chen po nor che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-23: khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-24: sems can don rnams ston par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:136b-25: gang la la zhig nang par langs nas dpal mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137a-2: sgom pa de yis bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137a-3: yid bde ba thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137a-4: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog kyang 'grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137a-6: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thams cad dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137a-8: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dpal mchog dang po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i don yod cing bstan pa'i cho ga phyag rgyas btab pa'i sku gsung thugs thams cad kyi rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po thams cad la rab tu zhugs nas chos nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes la rab tu zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i @137b phrin las kyis dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par spros pa las kyi mtha' can de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-1: zla ba phyed pa du ma la rab tu gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che rnams kyi 'od zer sna tshogs pa rnam par 'bar ba'i 'od kyis gsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-2: gser gyi dril bu btags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-3: sna tshogs pa'i ba dan rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-4: me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-7: mu tig gi phreng ba rab tu 'phyang bas mdzes shing brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-8: sna tshogs pa'i kha khyer la gnas pa mchog tu gyur pa'i lha'i bu mo dgod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-11: glu yis rab tu brgyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-12: bstod pas sad par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-13: bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas gzhal yas khang pa la bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-16: thugs rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-17: dbang bskur ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-18: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin las thams cad mchog tu gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-19: khams gsum thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:137b-20: thams cad dbang du byed pa po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-2: rgya che ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga thams cad brtag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-3: ci srid srid pa'i bar gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-4: de srid sems can don mchog mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-5: sems can khams ni mtha' yas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-6: rgyal sras srid par 'dod pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-7: srid pa'i skyon rnams 'joms phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-8: bde ba chen po 'phel bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-9: gsang ba'i rtog pa mchog gsung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-10: rjes su gnang bar bdag la stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa nyid la lhag par dgongs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-12: gdul bya thams cad thugs rje chen po'i sna tshogs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-13: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-14: thams cad yongs su bskyang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-17: dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-20: mchog gi dngos grub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138a-21: rdo rje 'chang chen po thob pa mchog gi dngos grub kyi don bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dang po de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @138b thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bde ba chen po mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa dngos grub pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138b-2: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas te sku drang por bsrang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138b-3: g-yon pa bsnyems pa'i tshul du mdzad nas g-yas pa rdo rje gsor bas rang gi thugs kar dang po'i rdo rje mchog gi sbyor ba 'dzin cing bde ba chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di nyid kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138b-6: aom ma h'a su kha badzra sa tva dza: h'um bam ho: su ra ta stam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138b-7: de nas phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur yongs su bzung ba rnams slar yang byang chub chen po mngon par rtogs nas de rnams kyis bzhad pa chen po mngon par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g-yos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138b-9: shin tu g-yos pas yongs su dag par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138b-10: khams gsum rgyas par spros pa thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:138b-11: gang gi sems can thams cad bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-1: bde ba thob par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-2: de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-3: thogs pa med pa las mngon par byung ba rdo rje chen po phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-4: bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnam par gnon par mdzad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-5: de'i sku thams cad las dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-8: rtag tu rjes su 'brel ba can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-10: bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig gi sems dpa' rnams phyung nas phyogs thams cad du phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-11: mdun du rdo rje gsang ba yid las byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-12: g-yas su rdo rje ki li ki li /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-13: rgyab tu 'dod pa'i rdo rje g-yon du rdo rje bsgyings pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-14: mtshams rnams su mchod pa'i lha mo rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-15: phyi rol gyi kha khyer mtshams su lha'i bu mo rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-16: sgo srung ba rnams ni rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-20: phyi rol tu rdo rje sgo srung gi tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub rdo rje zhes bya ba'i @139b ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang chen po la gsol ba btab ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-2: sems can kun la phan don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-3: rgyal ba chen po 'byung ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-4: chags bral de rnams chags ldan yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-5: rang gi btsun mo'ang gsol mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-6: de phyir bdag gis khyod la gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-7: bde ba chen po rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-8: gsang ba'i rtog pa'i dngos grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-9: 'dul ba mchog ni bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i bka' bde ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub 'dul ba rdo rje 'dod pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas rdo rje chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-11: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-12: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-13: bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-14: dam tshig dam pa'i ming can yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-16: de'i dbus cho ga bzhin du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-17: phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-18: der ni dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-19: gsar zhing legs par bsgril ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-20: mdud pa dag ni med pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-21: thig skud dmar pos thig btab nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-22: tshon gyi phye mas bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:139b-23: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-0: sgo khyud bzhis ni mdzes pa @140a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-2: kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-3: mtshams su lha yi bu mos mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-5: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-6: zla ba phyed la gnas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-8: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-9: ba dan sna tshogs mdzes pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-10: me long dra ba me tog phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-11: ldan pa'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-12: de yi nang du 'khor lo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-14: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-15: rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-16: de dbus cho ga bzhin du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-17: rdo rje dpa' dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-18: blugs sam yang na byas pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-19: brdungs sam yang na bris pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-20: bzhad pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-22: sangs rgyas phreng bas rnam par mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-23: sku la tshon gyis yang dag byugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-24: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-25: rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-26: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-27: snying gar rnam par dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-28: de yi logs ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-29: sems dpa' chen po rnams bri ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-30: tshon nam yang na rdul tshon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-31: go rim ji bzhin bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140a-32: mdun du sku mdog dmar po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-0: rdo rje mtshon cha la @140b brtson pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-1: g-yas su dag pa'i dkar po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-2: legs par 'khyud pa'i rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-3: rgyab tu sku mdog ser po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-4: chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-5: g-yon du sku mdog sngon po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-6: phyag gnyis bsnyems pa 'dzin la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-8: mchod pa'i lha mo bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-9: sgeg mo bzhad ma glu ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-10: dkar mo lha yi bu mo'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-11: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-12: rdo rje lcags sgrog dril bu rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-13: sgo ni bzhi po rnams la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-14: sgo srung bzhi po dgong par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-15: de nas de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-16: h'um badzri drashti s'a ma ke ma ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-17: h'um badzra ki li ki l'a ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-18: h'um sma ra badzra bandha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-21: de nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-22: h'um ma dhu ra badzri h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-25: h'um badzra shi shi ri h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-26: de nas lha'i bu mo rnams kyi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-31: de nas sgo srung rnams kyi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-32: dza: badzra aam ku shi pra ti ha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-33: h'um badzra p'a sha ga na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-34: bam badzra spho ta du ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-36: de ltar lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-37: bud med grags pa de nyid dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-38: bkod na de dag rnams kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-39: byin gyis brlabs pa nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-40: de nas phyag na rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-41: dkyil 'khor kun tu bris byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-42: bum pa gang ba ji snyed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:140b-43: me to la sogs kun gyis mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-0: @141a *// dril bu btags pa'i ba dan rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-1: mtshams rnams su ni gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-2: lcug ma dang bcas bum pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-3: sgo yi phyi rol dag tu gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-4: rdo rje dang bcas gzhi dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-5: lcug mo yongs su bzlas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-6: dri chus gang ba'i bum pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-7: phyag na rdo rje'i mdun gzhag bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-8: de la 'di ltar bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i chu byin gyis brlab pa'i snying po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-9: aom mah'a su kha badzra sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-10: aa bhi she ka dza: h'um bam ho:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-11: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-13: 'thungs na sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu byang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-14: bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-15: de nas rang gi dam tshig rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-17: zhes brjod nas dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-19: bcings nas skad cig gis dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-20: phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-21: de bzhin g-yas su mdzub lcags kyus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-22: dgug pa 'di ni lan cig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-23: 'grub ster rab tu gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-24: aom mah'a su kha badzra satva /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-25: aa aa hi sh'i ghram mah'a su kha badzra gu hya sa ma ya nu sma ra phra bh'u ta sa ma stvam hram da yam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-26: su to shyo me bha wa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-27: su po shyo me bha wa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141a-28: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-0: aa dhi tishtha bha ga b'am aa na ti nam @141b da na sid dhyam tu me man tra pa dee:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-2: de nas rtag tu bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-3: dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyid byon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-4: dgug cing bcug gnas brtan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-6: rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul du ma rnams mthong ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-7: yang na bcom ldan 'das rang nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-8: de nas rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin kun gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-9: slob dpon ni phyag rgya thams cad grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-10: dam tshig thams cad shes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-13: 'jug pa'i cho ga 'di yis rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid ci snyed pa'i dris byugs shing bsgos pa rgyan dang bcas pa'i me tog gi phreng bas lus shin tu brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-14: gos dmar po gnyis bsgos pa rang nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod cing rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pas rang nyid 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-15: bstod pa ni drug ldan la sogs pa glu yis bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-16: 'dod chags la sogs bde kun yid khyod ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-17: kun 'dus bdag la bde ba stsol mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-18: rdo rje sems dgongs myur du bdag ston mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-19: bdag dgyes mdzad dang bde mchog grub la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-20: de nas rab tu zhugs nas dgongs su gsol bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:141b-21: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-0: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba @142a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-2: kun tu bzang po khyod yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-3: rdo rje bsnyems bdag khyab bdag yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-4: sems kyi sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-5: de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-6: kun mchog dam tshig dngos grub can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-7: rdo rje sems bdag deng grub mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-8: de nas bcom ldan de nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-9: rdo rje slob dpon byin brlab 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-10: de sngar ma byung ba'i so sor rang rig pa'i bde ba gnyis ka la skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-12: de nas bdag la bcom ldan 'das grub par 'gyur to zhes shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-13: de nas de bzhin du 'dug la ci 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-14: de nas de bzhin du 'dug la rang gi bsod nams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-15: de nas brtsams te sems dpa' chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-16: de rnams kyis kyang de la dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-17: phyag rgya thams cad kyang bdag rang nyid kyis bcings na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-18: dam tshig thams cad kyang 'di la bstan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-19: yid kyi 'dod pa'i las rnams kyang byed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142a-21: yid bde ba thams cad nyams su myong zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-0: mi sod pas lo gcig 'das @142b nas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thob pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-1: de nas sems can thams cad gzhug pa'i don du brtag par bya ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-2: rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid snga ma bzhin du lus la brgyan nas rab tu bde ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rab tu bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-3: de bzhin du de kho na nyid chen po bskul bas yang dag par bskul la dgug par bya la 'di skad ces brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-4: srid pa'i bde ba rnam dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-5: sngar gyi srid pa la khyod dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-6: 'dod pa kun gyi dngos grub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-8: de nas mchod pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-9: rang gi lhag pa'i lha gang yin pa de'i dam tshig phyag rgya me tog dang bcas pa gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-10: bcug nas rna bar 'di skad ces brjod par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-13: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' sbas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-15: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-16: sdug bsngal gzhan ni rang bzhin med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-17: de bas sems can chags bral lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-18: slar yang yid ni ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-19: de nas me tog la sogs pa snying po 'dis 'dor du gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-20: aom mah'a su kha badzra satva pra ti gri hna sa ma ya stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:142b-21: de nas gang du babs pa de ni de'i lha yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-0: de nas de kho na nyid chen po brjod par @143a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-2: gang 'dod pa'i snying po byin la sgrub tu bcug la rang nyid lhag pa'i lha'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas de'i mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-3: de'i rigs kyi ming gi dbang bskur la snying po 'dis dbang bskur bar bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a tma ko nya lham bdzra dha ra sa mu khe bha aa bhi she tvam aa bhi shi nytsa mi gri hna siddhi bdzram aa mo gha si ddhi stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-5: de nas phyag rgya bcings pa bslab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-6: de nas ci 'dod pa'i mchod pa byas shing byed du bcug nas ci 'dod pa bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-7: btung bas slob ma rnams tshim par byas la phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-10: dgod pa byed du bcug cing rang nyid kyis kyang bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-11: de nas thams cad bskrad nas 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-13: dga' ba mchog la rag lus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-14: sems dpa' chen po rdo rjer 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-15: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-16: de nas snyim pa'i me tog dor nas dbyung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143a-17: dkyil 'khor yang rang nyid kyis phyags la rdul tshon de dag gi ril bu byas la bzhag na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-0: de nas bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i tshul de yang bcug na tshe @143b 'phel ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad dgongs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-1: de nyid kyis dbang bskur na yang dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-2: mchog gi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-3: gal te sku bri ba'i ri mo mkhan ma rnyed na rang rang gi phyag mtshan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-4: gal te de yang mi shes na phyag mtshan gzhag par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-5: phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod pa thogs pa med pa myur du 'grub pa'i cho ga rgya che ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rnam par gnon par mdzad nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-7: bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-8: 'dod pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' grub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-10: rtag par myur du bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-11: ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-12: de srid sems can gdon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-13: mya ngan 'das pa byang chub sgrib //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-14: de nyid kyis ni dam tshig rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-15: ci srid srid pa la gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-16: de srid sems can don nyid byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-17: thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-18: ci ltar sems can kun gyi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-19: dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-20: de ltar sbyin tshogs pha rol phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:143b-21: byang chub spyod pa mchog gis min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-2: sems can kun rnams don mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-3: 'di ni dngos grub rab bsgrubs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-4: dus kun du ni thams cad mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-5: des na bsgrub 'di bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-6: dngos grub shin tu rtag pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-7: gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-8: shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-9: dkyil 'khor dpag tu ma zhugs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-10: dam tshig rnam par spangs pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-11: bsod nams med kyang thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-13: gal te dngos grub sgrub 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-14: rtag tu yul dang ldan gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-15: gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-17: drug ldan la sogs snyan pa'i glu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-18: chags pa kun kyang ci 'dod par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-19: bzlas pa'i don ni ci nus pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-23: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-24: rga shi med cing gtso bor 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-25: rgyal ba kun gyis mchod byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-26: rang gzhan kun gyis bsnyen bskur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-27: rdo rje 'chang chen dang mtshungs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144a-28: don yod kun mchog spyod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144b-0: bde ba chen po rdo rje grub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad @144b rab tu ster ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po byang chub sems dpa' yin la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144b-1: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub mngon par 'dod pa des /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144b-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa ras ris la bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144b-4: bcas pa dngos po thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144b-5: de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas rdo rje'i tshig gis stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144b-6: 'bum rdzogs pa na mtshan phyed na bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144b-7: de nas bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pas bcom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144b-8: de nas tho rangs kyi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144b-9: byang chub sems dpa' nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144b-10: gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid mngon par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144b-14: ras ris la sogs par legs par bris pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du sngar sgrub pa la sku gzugs kyi khyad par ci ltar thob pa ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgrub pa bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:144b-15: zla ba drug gis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub chen po 'grub po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145a-1: 'chang chen po dgug na bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyus dgug cing ci 'dod pa bsgrub par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145a-2: zla ba gcig bzlas nas thams cad gsol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145a-3: gal te rang gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid bsgrub na rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te bsgoms pas bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yin no zhes bsgroms la bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145a-4: de ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pas bdag nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145a-6: yang du sgom zhing bzlas pa de srid bdag gis bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145a-7: ci srid rdo rje 'chang nyid zla ba phyed bzlas nas thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145a-8: de nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du rang yid du 'ong ba dang bcas par rab tu zhugs te phyag rgya bcings la de srid bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145a-9: ci srid bdag 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145a-10: khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i rdo rje'i rgyun gyi rang bzhin thams cad grub pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes rnam par rol par mdzad nas ma bsgrubs pa'i phyag rgya'i las kyi rgyun rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145a-12: ma bsgrubs pa'i snying po'i las rnams 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-0: bdag nyid bsrung @145b ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i gtsug tor gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-1: thams cad bsrung pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang pa'i mdzod spus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-4: dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba 'bar ba'i phreng bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-5: bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba mi bskyod pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-6: tshe 'phel bar bya ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bdud rtsis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-7: gzugs chen po phun sum tshogs pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i gzugs can gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-9: na tshod shin tu bzang po rab tu 'phel ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bcud kyis len gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-11: mdog 'phel ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i mthu yis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-12: dbang bskur ba thams cad la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i cod pan gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-13: nor thams cad thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-14: rgyal srid thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-15: sa ma lus pa thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rtsal gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-18: gar byed du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:145b-19: dus gsum bden pa nyid du smrar gzhug pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi don du gzhug pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-0: pra se na thams cad grub pa @146a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-1: la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i pra se na dbab pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-2: gdon thams cad las thar pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gdon las thar bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-3: gdug pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bgegs 'joms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-4: thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rengs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-5: thams cad gnyid log par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnyid kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-6: thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro mas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-7: thams cad du gsang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba mthar byed kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-8: thams cad bsgyel ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i h'um mdzad kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-9: thams cad bslang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gis bslang ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-10: thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bcings pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-11: thams cad thar par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i yi ge mus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-12: phra men ma thams cad las thar bar bya ba la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-13: sngon gyi gnas skabs rjes su sbyin pa la ni gsang ba chen po he ru ka'i rdo rjes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-14: ma mo'i gdon thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i drag mos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-15: phra men ma thams cad kyis rgyas btab pa la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146a-16: thar bar bya ba la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-0: snying zos pa las snying gzhan 'byung bar @146b 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-1: shi ba gso ba la ni dam tshig chen po gsang ba'i he ru ka'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-2: gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rjes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-3: rims thams cad rab tu zhi ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-4: dug thams cad gzhig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-7: 'chi ba gso ba la ni gsang ba chen po rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-9: sbyar ba'i dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dug med pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-14: gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-18: rtsod pa gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i zhal rab tu gdangs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-22: rmi lam ngan pa gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i zhi bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-23: gzhan gyi dpung thams cad rengs par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-24: gnyid log par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:146b-28: gsad pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i gshed byed kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-1: cad las rgyal ba thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi dpung rgyan gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-2: gdug pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rje legs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-3: bgegs thams cad zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i thabs sbyor gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-4: dgra bo thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rnam par 'thor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-5: bdud kyi stobs thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rab tu 'dul bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-6: sprin bskyed pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin chen pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-7: char dbab pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sdig mdzub kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-11: char zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin srung gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-14: khug rna zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bde ba chen po'i spyan gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-15: klu thams cad dgug pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-16: klu thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni gsang ba thams cad kyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-17: klu thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i klu 'dul bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147a-18: klu thams cad 'byin pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i klu gdon pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-0: sa ma lus pa g-yo zhing 'gul bar bya ba la ni @147b rdo rje gsang ba'i thar pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-1: chu med par chu'i phung po ches cher bsil zhing dri ma med par bskyed pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje klu'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-2: mun par nyi ma'i snang ba chen po bskyed pa la ni rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-3: rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje rlung thams cad kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-4: nam mkha' la gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'dzin pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-5: nam mkha' las dngos po thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'byung bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-6: nam mkha' la rang gi bdag nyid kyi dngos po kun tu bstan par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-7: nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-8: rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-10: nam mkhar shing thams cad la lo ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-12: 'bras bu thams cad 'byung ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dus kyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-13: sa'i cha thams cad la 'bru'i cha thams cad smin par 'gyur ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gshol gyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-14: thams cad las lha'i kha zas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:147b-19: bu mo gzhon nu 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148a-3: bran mo thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi bsod nams kyi chu bos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148a-4: g-yul du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bstan te g-yul 'gyed pa la ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i sdom pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148a-5: sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje bde mchog gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148a-6: bde mchog gi bya ba thams cad la ni rdo rje sgyu ma'i bya bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148a-8: cho 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rmad du 'byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148a-9: lan thams cad gdab par bya ba la ni rdo rje lan bstan pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148a-10: me rengs par bya ba la ni rdo rje shin tu grang bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148a-11: chu dbab par bya ba la ni rdo rje zla ba'i chu shel gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148a-20: gtsug lag khang bsrung ba la ni rdo rje grub pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148a-21: chu'i steng du bzhag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148a-22: bdag nyid gzugs mang po'i dngos po ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148a-24: nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-0: lha la sogs pa thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i @148b bka' bsgo bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-1: sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-2: mi rgyu ba thams cad drang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-4: bden par smrar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dngos grub chen po'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-5: gzugs brnyan thams cad dbab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-8: gar byed du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-9: kun tu rol bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-10: bsgo ba thams cad byed du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-11: thams cad khyer te 'ong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-12: las thams cad byed du gzhug pa la ni bde pa chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig bsgrubs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-13: thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje yid las byung bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-15: mi rgyu ba thams cad rtser gzhug pa la ni rdo rje ki li ki li'i gsang bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-16: thams cad brtan par bya ba la ni rdo rje chu srin gyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-17: thams cad dpa' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje bsnyems pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-18: rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa la ni rdo rje ngag gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-19: gzhan dag gis rang 'dod pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bya ba la ni rdo rje rmi lam mthong bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-20: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje sreg blugs kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:148b-21: rmi lam bzang ba thams cad bsgrub pa brtan par bya ba la ni rdo rje rmi lam grub pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-0: @149a *// thams cad bsal ba la ni rdo rje sman gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-1: rims nad thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-2: dus ma yin par 'chi ba gzhig pa la ni rdo rje d'ur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-3: dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan 'gro thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje sdig pa dral bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-4: sku thams cad bsgrub pa la rdo rje sku'i mchog gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-5: gsung thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rang gi lces 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-7: da ltar gyi dngos po thams cad bden par ston pa'i rdo rje gsang ba'i ljags kyi mchog gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-8: thugs thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje thugs thams cad bskyed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-9: rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rab tu dag pa'i rdo rjes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-10: dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor los so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-11: phyag rgyas thams cad bcing ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pas phyag rgya chen pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-12: thams cad dam tshig thams cad bsgrub pa ni rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-13: las thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-14: dngos grub thams cad la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bde ba chen po grub pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149a-15: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad la ni rdo rje ltung ba las gdon pa'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149b-0: @149b thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149b-1: thams cad kyi mchod pa bya ba nyid la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gar gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149b-2: rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149b-3: sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba chen pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba mchog gi bde ba chen pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149b-5: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149b-6: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149b-7: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig gi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa gsang ba'i chos can rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149b-9: rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149b-10: bde ba chen po rab grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:149b-11: 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-1: bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-2: dam pa'i rigs ni bskyed du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bde ba chen po mi phyed pa'i rnam par gnon pa mdzad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-6: thugs rdo rje thams cad la rab tu bzhugs nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid mnyam par spros nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-7: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-9: de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-10: rnam pa drug tu g-yos gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-11: sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-12: kun nas 'dus shing bstan par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-13: dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-14: thams cad grub phyir kun nas bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-15: bzhad pa chen po'i khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-16: rmad byung chen po rab tu bzhad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin du rdo rje la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-18: bde ba chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-19: 'di ltar chos kyis bris nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-20: rgyal ba g-yon du bsnyems 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-21: dam tshig mchog gi mchog bkod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150a-22: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-0: de bzhin @150b gshegs pa sras dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-1: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-3: me tog la sogs spyir thal sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-4: de la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-8: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-9: rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-10: rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-11: de nas rab tu zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi gzungs bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus dgug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-12: aom badzra dh'a ra su ra ma h'a su kha sarba h'a ra rma pa ma ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-13: sarba ta th'a ga ta dznya na mee manta p'a dee: dza: h'um bam ho:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dzin pa dang bcas pa yang dag par byon par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-15: yid bde ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-16: cho 'phrul du ma dag mthong ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-17: de nas cho ga rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-19: yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-21: thogs pa med par myur du dam pa grub pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:150b-23: de nas ma bsgrubs par lan gcig bzlas pas las rnams byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-1: bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-2: sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje mdzod spus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-3: chos nyid thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje chos nyid kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub ni rdo rje mchod pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-5: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje khro bos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-6: byang chub kyi spyod pa ma lus par rdzogs par bya ba la ni rdo rje spyod pa'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-7: bdud thams cad gzhom pa la ni bdud thams cad 'joms par byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid du bya ba la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-9: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa 'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i bka' bstan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje chen po'i thabs bde ba chen po'i khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-14: rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151a-15: bde ba chen po rab grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-0: chags pa chen po rnam dag @151b phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-1: gdug pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-2: rang rigs sprul mdzod rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-4: h'um rakta dzva la m'a l'a pra la ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-5: aagni pra ti pa ta te dza /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-6: ma h'a su ra ta badzra kro dha dza: h'um bam ho phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-7: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje las kun nas 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i snying po can smin ma 'gyur zhing khro gnyer bsdus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-8: sma ra ser zhing spyan 'bar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-9: rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pas ma mchu'i sgros rnam par gnon pa'i zhal mnga' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-12: gzhu la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khams gsum pa'i gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar mdzad nas rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-15: dkyil 'khor chen po thig gdab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-16: de la dang po khros pa gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-17: su ra tod bha ba h'um zhes zlos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-19: rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-20: mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:151b-21: khro dang bcas pa'i bzhad pa'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-3: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-4: thams cad du ni khro bo bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-5: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya chen pos dang por slob dpon gyis 'jug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-6: slob ma rnams kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-7: slob dpon zhugs nas khros pas lcags kyu de nyid kyis dgug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-8: h'um su ra ta badzra kro dha aa ya te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-9: mah'a su kha badzra satva dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-10: sarba badzra ku la ne tra pra be sha ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-11: sarba mu dr'a ga na bandha ya bam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-12: sarba ma y'a ma bi shva ku ru ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-13: sarba karma ne tra satva ya aa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-14: de nas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pa byon zhing grub pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-16: slob ma rnams la dgyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-17: khro bo 'bab pa'i mtshan ma yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-18: gzhan yang cung zad 'byung ba yin na de grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-20: cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin du 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-21: gal te ma grub na lan gcig bzla 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-22: khams gsum pa ma lus pa las rgyal bar bya ba la ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152a-23: sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gsang bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-0: 'jig rten gsum po las rnam par rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal @152b ba'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-8: gnyid log par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-11: gsad par bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje khro bos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-12: thams cad ltung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje phra mo'i khro bos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-13: thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i khro bos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-14: thams cad nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje gad rgyangs kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-15: las thams cad la nye bar dgod pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-16: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gsang ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-17: rab tu dga' ba las byung ba rdo rje gsang ba rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod cing thogs pa med pa thams cad dag pa'i chos sgrib pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-19: bden pa chen po rab grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-20: 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-21: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:152b-22: mchog chen khyod kyis bskyed par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos chos thams @153a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-1: cad la gzigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i padma zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-3: 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas padma'i mdog gi mdangs can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od lta bu padma'i 'dab ma la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-6: na bza' dmar po 'chang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-7: padma chen po'i sems dpa' rnams byung nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-8: bcom ldan 'das zhal rab tu bzhad pas g-yas pas rdo rje g-yon pas padma 'dzin cing de bzhin du rdo rje bsnyems pas rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-10: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-11: dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-12: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-13: padma'i mtshan ma'i tshogs rnams bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-14: de na rdo rje padmas zhugs la mdzub mo'i lcags kyu gnyis kyis dgug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-16: aom hr'i: mah'a su kha badzra a'a lo ke shva r'a ya me /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153a-17: a'a a'a he pra be sha dhi dhi me bha ba siddhi mmer mu dr'a p'a dee: dza: h'um bam ho:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras @153b gzigs dbang phyug byon te mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-1: snang ba'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-2: cho ga rgyas pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-4: dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-5: ma bsgrubs kyang lan gcig bzlas pas las thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-6: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba la ni padma chen pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-7: thams cad bsrung ba la ni padma'i gtsug tor gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-8: thams cad rjes su chags pa la ni padma la lta bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-9: thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni padma kha 'byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-10: bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni padma chen po'i 'dod chags kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-11: skyes pa thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni padma chen po'i dbang phyug gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-12: rmi lam gdab pa la ni padma chen po dmar pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi mchog thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i padma rmongs pa med pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-14: bde ba chen po padma gsang ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:153b-15: bde ba chen po padma'i rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa 'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge @154a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-1: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-2: bde ba chen po rab grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-3: chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-4: nor bu chen po'i rigs mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-5: mgrin 'byor phyir ni skyed par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig rab tu bzhag pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i rigs sngags 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-7: aom li ti dha bhanta ta te tr'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-8: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje las nor bu rin po che rab tu phyung nas phyag g-yon pa la rab tu gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-9: nor bu rin po che dag pa de yang mrgad rnyog pa med pa'i mdog can rdo rje rin po che rang gi 'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba can nor bu rin po che'i mda' la sogs pa'i mtshan ma yongs su bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-11: de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-12: dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154a-13: rdo rje rin chen bdag po bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-0: nor bu'i rigs @154b ni chen po bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-1: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-2: de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-3: aom mah'a su kha badzra bi bh'u te ra ya bha ga b'an tam a'a karsha ya gi ra bam sarba ta th'a ga ta aa gram sam tra sa ma be na n'a ma bhe ra ma tra be /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i nor bu thams cad dang bcas pa byon pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-6: spyi bo nas spu ldang ba'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la dbang bskur ba la ni zhes shes par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-8: de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste cho ga rgyas pa thams cad de bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-9: de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams lan gcig bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-10: dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-11: don thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi rgyal mtshan gyis rtse mos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-12: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la ni rdo rje nor bu chen po'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-13: gter chen po thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje rin chen gyis 'og gi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:154b-14: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje rin chen chen po'i sa 'og gi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155a-1: rje'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155a-2: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che chen po'i phreng bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba dam pa'i phreng bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155a-4: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gi rdo rje rin chen gyi cod pan gyi phreng bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155a-5: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155a-7: yid bde ba thams cad kyang kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i ye shes thob pas sems can thams cad gzhug pa'i 'khor lo rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155a-9: thog ma tha ma med pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155a-10: bde ba chen po rab grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155a-11: chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155a-12: bde ba chen po'i don gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155a-13: 'gro rnams ci bder gzhug tu gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155b-0: @155b de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i 'gro ba kun 'dul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155b-2: dngos grub thams cad stsol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155b-9: thams cad la rjes su ston pas don yod par grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155b-10: dam tshig rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon pa mdzad nas bde ba chen po dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i don yod pa mtshungs pa med pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155b-12: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po der yang dag par gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:155b-13: dkyil 'khor gcig nyid du gyur to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:159b-24: don yod thogs med nyid mchog gi /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:159b-26: bde ba chen po rdo rje che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:159b-29: rtog pa thams cad myur 'grub byed //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-6: h'um/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-7: sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-8: nye bar 'dzin pa mdzad nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-9: 'gro ba thams cad skyed par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-10: sna tshogs 'gro ba kun bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-11: gtso bos dngos grub dris gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-13: sems dpa' chen po myur du smros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-14: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-16: cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-17: de nas phan chad sems can 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-18: ji bzhin las kyi rjes 'gro ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-19: rtag par sdig pa kun spyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-20: ngan sems dang ni le lo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-21: de ni skye bo gsum gzigs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-22: 'jig rten gtso bo rnams kyis dris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-23: bcom ldan ci ltar 'o na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-24: byis pa dge ba kun tu skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-25: de rnams kyi ni tshig gsan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-26: tshig ni 'di skad gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-27: rdo rje 'dzin kun byed pa pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-28: las kyi 'chi ba ltos gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-29: de yi tshig de thos nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-33: bde ba chen po rab grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160a-34: shin tu chags pa rnam dag phyir //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160b-1: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160b-6: dkyil 'khor la sogs cho ga che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160b-7: sna tshogs phyi ma'i rgyud dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160b-8: dngos grub thams cad rab grub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160b-9: 'jig rten thams cad khams chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160b-10: phra rab rdul rnams dang mnyam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160b-11: snying po chen po 'di nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160b-12: grub pa'i bden pa dam par gyur //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160b-15: de tshe de la gsol ba btab //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160b-17: chags bral bstan par bya ba'am //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160b-23: rab tu dga' ba 'gro ba kun gyi bde chen po //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:160b-25: ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor glu len cing brtag par mdzad do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-8: rdo rje dang bcas bsnyems pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-9: phyag rgya mchog gis rang nyid 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-10: dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-11: lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun 'dug ste //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-16: su to shyo me bha ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-18: su po shyo me bha ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-19: aa dhi tishtha bha ga b'an /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-22: siddhi mme pra ya tstsa aom ha ha ha ha aa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-23: de nas rab tu dga' bas rdo rje lha mo dga' ba'i gtam bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-24: aom badzra mushti sa ma ya ke phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-26: h'um sma ra badzre ne bandha h'um h'um tushta badzra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du nye bar 'dug ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-30: ki li ke las thams cad nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161a-31: thams cad rjes su chags dran dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161b-0: rtag tu @161b legs par mnyes gyur bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161b-1: aom mah'a su kha siddhi badzra satva dza: h'um bam ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161b-2: siddhi sa ma ya stvam siddhi h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161b-3: de nas bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur zhing 'thungs la rdo rje rtse lnga ba bzung ste; bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yin no zhes rang gi ming brjod la snga ma bzhin du gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161b-4: ci ltar rnyed pa'i yul dang ldan pas slob ma dang lhan cig mchod pa byas nas 'byung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161b-5: slob ma gzhug par bya zhing rang nyid kyang der zhugs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161b-6: rdo rje slob dpon thams cad phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161b-7: dam tshig thams cad shes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161b-8: thams cad la tshar gcod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161b-10: dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi las byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161b-11: rang nyid 'jug pa tsam nyid kyis slob dpon ma yin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:161b-12: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs par skad cig nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162a-8: yongs su sbyang ba dang brten pa'i don du ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162a-9: bgegs byed pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal ster bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162a-10: bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162a-14: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162a-16: las thams cad gdon mi za ba'i grub pas myur du grub par mdzad pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162a-20: 'dzin pa des ma bsgrubs shing dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs na yang tshe 'di nyid la ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162a-23: don yod cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bar chad byed par mi nus te thams cad rjes su chags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-0: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang rjes @162b su chags pa las byung ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-1: 'dod pa brtan pas rjes su chags pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-2: de mi 'dod pa ji ltar mchog gi bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i go 'phang thams cad du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar thogs pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-3: grub na bde ba chen po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-4: rdo rje chags pas skad cig ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-5: sgrub pa'i dam tshig 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-7: sdig pa chen po byed pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-8: de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-10: mchog sgrub pas ni grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-13: gzugs brnyan rjes su dran bsgoms na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-15: thams cad nyid phyir bdag po grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-16: nga la gzugs brnyan med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-17: glegs bam med par 'gyur na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-18: yi ge h'um ni thams cad du //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-20: zhes bya ba don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub can rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-21: de nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-23: dkyil 'khor thams cad thig btab nas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-26: chags pa che las thogs pa che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-28: bde ba che las rdo rje brtan //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-30: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:162b-31: gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-0: phyag rgya thams cad bshad pa @163a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-4: yang dag bsdus par gyur nas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-6: ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-7: bka' ni 'da' bar dka' ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-8: de bzhin rgyal ba kun gyi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-9: phyag rgya 'da' bar nus pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-10: sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-11: de ltar bskal ba bye ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-12: thob min ji ltar phyag rgya mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-13: bsdus pa tshe 'di nyid la thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-14: ji ltar gdul bya'i 'jig rten ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-15: de bzhin dngos grub gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-16: de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-17: dngos grub thams cad byed pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-18: de bzhin cho ga rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-19: dngos grub thams cad gdon mi za'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-22: rdo rje thal mo zhes brjod do; ;sor mo nang du bcings pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-23: rdo rje bsdams par yang dag bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-24: rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-25: mdzub mo mthe bong yang dag sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-26: g-yas pa yi ni mthe bong btegs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-28: mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163a-29: dbus ma'i bcings pa nang du gnas //
