K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163b-12: bskor zhing spyi bor gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163b-13: bskor nas snying gar bzhag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163b-14: yongs su bskor zhing dgod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163b-15: kha las gyen du 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163b-16: de bzhin gar gyis bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163b-17: mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis kyi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163b-18: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo g-yas kyis bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163b-19: mdzub mo'i mthe bo bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163b-20: mthe bong mtha' ma'i nang du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163b-21: khu tshur gyi phyag rgya rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163b-22: de nas don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di rnams kho na'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba mchog tu gsang ba bla na med cing bla ma'i las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pa'i bdag gis kyang gnon par mi nus so; ;de la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbus ma las rdo rje sen mo'i rtse mo mchu la sogs par gzhag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:163b-23: 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-1: pa'i dngos grub kun tu byed pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-4: rdo rje rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-6: rdo rje 'dren mas ni mig 'bras kyi las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-8: g-yon pa'i mig gis bltas pas thams cad rjes su chags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-9: mig 'bras tshur 'dren pas ni dgug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-10: gzhug pas thams cad gzhug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-12: btsums pa med pas dbang du bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-13: rdo rje ki li ki las dbus ma la tsum pa na dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-18: mthe bo'i rtse mor bde bar brdeg pas mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-20: btsir ba rnams kyis thams cad la rol ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-22: mi rgyu ba thams cad du lha'i gzugs kyis bud med rnams 'byung ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-23: ci srid 'di rnams dang rol cing rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo la yang rol par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-24: rdo rje chu srin mas btsir ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-28: myur du za ba rnams kyis brtan pa'i chags pas bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-29: thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-30: chu'i nang du gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164a-32: thams cad za ba grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-0: rdo rje bskor bas g-yo @164b zhing g-yo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-3: dbus ma phan tshun lhan cig dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-4: mgyogs par dbus ma'i rdo rje dral ba rnams kyis khro bo thams cad 'bar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-6: thams cad la rgyas btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-8: gsod pa rnams myur du 'grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-9: mthe bo rdo rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod na rdo rje 'chang chen pos kyang mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-10: de bzhin du lha'i bu mo rnams kyis mthe bo rdo rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i las rnams kyis lha'i bu mo thams cad kyang bkug nas rol pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad nye bar sbyar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-11: rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i nang gi khu tshur gyis las rnams kyis yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-12: de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyud ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-15: las kyi dngos grub grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-16: don yod pas grub pa myur du thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pas yid kyis 'dod pa grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-17: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes rtags kyi rtse mo g-yo ba las thams cad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:164b-18: skye gnas g-yo bas kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-0: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i las byed pas dngos grub thams cad @165a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-1: sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje mig mi g-yo bar byed pas las thams cad bsgrub par byas na thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub kyis grub par 'gyur ro; ;de bzhin du rang gi phyag mtshan rnams kyis dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-2: dang po nyin re lan gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-3: phyag rgya chen pos snying po bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-4: rdo rje nye ba'i snying po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-5: phyag rgya thams cad nges sbyar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-6: thams cad don yod grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-7: bde ba chen po rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-8: gsang ba'i rtog pa mchog phyir ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-9: sgrub pa'i don yod dam tshig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-10: snying pos skad cig dngos grub ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-11: rtsa rgyud phyi ma'i rgyud dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-12: phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-13: dngos grub mchog ni de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-14: bla na med pa'i ye shes grub; ;de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-16: pang ba g-yon du dgod bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-17: zhabs kyi padma ci bder bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-18: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-19: sku ni drang por 'dzin pa bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-20: bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-21: rdo rje bsnyems pa yang dag 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-22: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-24: 'dis ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165a-25: sangs rgyas nyid dam sras nyid dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-0: dngos @165b grub kun gyi dbang phyug nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-2: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-3: ji bzhin phyag rgya'i rjes 'brangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-4: mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-5: sems dpa' chen po rang nyid 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-7: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-8: rdo rje mda' la sogs pa'i bzhi bo 'di las byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-9: mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu'i phyi rol tu mngon par phyogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-11: mthe bo gnyis kha phe la mdzub mo gnyis kyi dbus ma'i rtse mo 'dren cing srin lag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-12: mthe'u chung mnyam por sbyar la rtse mo so sor kha phye bas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi bsgreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-13: brla gnyis la bskor zhing gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-14: de bzhin du mtshams rnams la rdo rje thal mos bskor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-15: sgo'i phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-16: bde chen mchog gi phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-17: de bzhin dngos grub rab stsol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-18: mda' sogs dam tshig sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-19: dngos grub chen po mchog ster ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-20: de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-21: ho bid h'um dhri ka h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:165b-22: de rnams kyang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba'o; ;de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje med pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-0: g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pas g-yas pa'i khu tshur gtod pa'i tshul gyis snying gar @166a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-1: bzung bar byas pa rdo rje bsnyems pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-2: rab tu dga' ba brtan par byed cing dngos grub thams cad stsal ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-3: mda' gzhu gtod pas rdo rje mtshon cha ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-5: rgyal mtshan gyen du bsgreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-7: sgeg pa dang bcas mtha' mal sogs pas bkrol bas glog 'gyu ba'i gar g-yas su yongs su bskor bas me tog la sogs pa'i ka bu ta'i thal mo spyi bo nas phab /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-8: rdo rje thal mo bkrol bas de bzhin du sgeg pa dang bcas pas mchod pa dor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-9: rdo rje gar ni nang gi mtshams la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-10: rdzogs pa'am ni ma tshang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-11: yang na ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-12: me tog mchod la sogs ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-13: dngos grub mchog stsol thun mong yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-14: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i mtshan ma yongs su gzung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-15: 'di rnams kyang don yod pa'i las sgrub pa rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-16: rdo rje khu tshur gyi bdud rtsi'i chu bzla'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-17: 'jug pa'i cho ga'i phyag rgya bshad pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-18: dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i 'jug pa'i phyag rgya gnyis pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-19: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-20: g-yon mtheb mdzub mo'i skye gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166a-21: g-yas pa mthe po'i ltag bcug la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-0: btsir ba bde ba @166b ster ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-1: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa des /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-3: yang na sems dpa' gang la 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-5: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-6: rang gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu blangs nas chu'i rgyun des dbang bskur te 'thung du bcug na dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-7: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyis na tshod dar la bab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-9: dngos grub thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-15: phyag rgya la sogs pas gnod pa byed par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-16: skyil mo krung gis ni gar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-18: de nas mchod pa ni rdo rje gar gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-19: rdo rje glu blangs pas rdo rje gar dbul ba ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gar gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-20: rdo rje khu tshur yongs su bzung ba rdo rje gtod pas rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa bsgreng bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-21: mthar sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'i bzhad pa dang bcas pa'i zhal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-23: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang dgyes pas dga' ba thams cad la sogs pa'i bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:166b-24: yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub stsol ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-0: rdo rje bsdams pa btsir ba rang gi snying gar bde ba dgrol na dkyil 'khor dgrol ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i @167a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-1: sgom pas re kh'a dang rdo rje yid kyis gyen du bteg la rim pas nang gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs na dam tshig nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgom pas dkyil 'khor la phyogs na dam tshig nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-3: de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-4: bde ba chen po rdo rje spyi bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-6: snying gar bzhag pa phub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-7: phyogs thams cad du 'bar ba'i ra ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-8: rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rnams kyis kyang 'jug par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-9: snying gar sgom pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-10: gyen du kha blta bas ltung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-11: rang gi gdong yongs su sbyangs nas gdong par dgrol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-12: dbus ma'i rdo rje brtag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-13: dpung mgo gnyis su bzhag cing snying gar bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-14: dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba mthong ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-19: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i rtags kyi lcags kyus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-20: rtse mo gtod pa'i skye gnas bkrol ba lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil nyed cing bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167a-23: bskor zhing btsir nas khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-0: yongs su bskor nas kha'i mthar mche ba bstan pa'i g-yas pa'i mdzub mos @167b sdigs mdzub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-1: mdzub mo la ldang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-3: yi ge mus phyag rgya dgrol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-4: dang po mthe'u chung gi rdo rjes bsnun par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-5: de nyid rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdong pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-6: de nyid yongs su bskor nas dpral bar gyen du kha blta bas gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-7: de nyid kyis nam mkha' la rdeg pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-8: g-yo zhing btsum pa'i mig gis phyag rgya bcings pa dgrol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-9: mthe'u chung gi nor bus reg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-10: mdzub mo mnyam pas zhabs kyi sor mo brje bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-13: mdzub mos sbyin sreg byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-14: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gdong par dgrol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-16: mthe'u chung gnyis skye gnas la sbyar te phyag rgya dral bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-17: srin lag dang mtha' ma mnyam par sbyar sor mo ba dan gyi tshul du bsgreng bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-18: rdo rje bsdams pas legs par byed pa mdzub mo mthe bong mnyam por phye ba dang bkug pa bskor nas dral bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-19: rdo rje bsdams pa rab tu brkyang pa'i mthil sa la reg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-20: dang po'i rdo rje sprin skyed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-21: mdzub mos char bskyed par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-23: rdo rje blta bas 'phrog par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-24: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-25: mdzub mo gcig gi nor bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:167b-26: mthe'u chung rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-1: nas chu mig bkug la bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-2: bde ba chen po rdo rje sa la bzung nas g-yo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-3: mdzub mo gnyis kyis gdengs ka'i tshul bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-4: rtse mo bzhi'i 'od zer gyis me stag ston pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-6: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes mdzub mo'i rtse mos me long dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-8: nam mkha' la rdo rje blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-10: rdo rje'i mdangs shing drung thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-13: 'bru thams cad la gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-14: mdzub mo rnon pos klog par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-15: bdag nyid kyis thams cad la drang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-16: phyi rol gyi dpung mdun du bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-17: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis glog 'gyu bas bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-18: glog 'gyu bas nam mkha' la bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-19: g-yas pas g-yon pa la brdeg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-20: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis g-yo zhing g-yo ba med pa la gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-21: mdzub mo mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni nor bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-22: mdzub mo'i rdo rje'i g-yon pa'i mthe bong gi bu gar g-yas pa'i mdzub mo gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-23: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes steng du nam mkha' la dka' ba bskyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168a-25: dbus ma'i rdo rje bskyod cing btsir ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-0: rdo rje yid @168b las byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-1: rdo rje k'i li k'i la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-3: rdo rje bsnyems ma ni bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-4: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mos gsol ba 'debs par byed pas mdzub mo gnyis kyi rang gi mig bkab la yid kyis ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-6: mdzub mos rang mig btsum par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-9: rtse mo bskyod cing sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-10: mthe bo'i 'og tu rab tu brkyang la sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-11: rdo rje sku'i phyag rgya mchog ni mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi mdzub mo rdo rje ni rdo rje'i sku mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-12: dbus ma'i mnyam pa'i mgo lcogs kyis ngag 'byin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-14: aom bo dhi tsitta auta p'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba bsgom mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-15: mthe bo'i rtags g-yon pa'i mthe bo'i bu gar gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-16: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis glog 'gyu ba ltar bskor bas rdo rje 'khor lo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-17: rdo rje bsnyems ma rdo rje dang bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-18: yi ge h'um gis sdigs mdzub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-19: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gar gyi kha sbyor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-20: rdo rje bsnyems ma bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-21: mthe'u chung gi zur gyis mdud pa'i rtse mo mnyam pa yongs su bskor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-22: 'og nas bteg pa mdzub mo mnyam pa'i rtse mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:168b-23: dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag na rdo rje mdzod spu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-1: gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ni 'og nas bshad par bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-2: rdo rje gar gyi bshad pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-3: mdzub mo phyir phyogs pa bslang ba'i rdo rje snying gar badzro ham zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-4: de bzhin du snying gar rdo rje sgom zhing ma h'a sa ha ham zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-5: ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis ta th'a ga to: ham bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-7: rdo rje khu tshur bcing pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-8: mdzub mo rdo rje bsdams pa bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-9: mdzub mo bkug pa gnyis kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-10: mtha' ma gnyis kyi nang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-11: mthe bong gnyis kyi kha sbyar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-12: dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-13: khu tshur dngos grub mchog kun stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-14: rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtags ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni phyag rgya chen po rnams ni ta th'a ga to nya ham zhes bya bas bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-16: dam tshig cho ga mchog ni mthe bong mthe chung mnyam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-17: rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-18: mda' la sogs pa bcing ba ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-19: las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin du bcing ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-0: khu tshur gyi khyad par rdo rje bsngams pa'i khu tshur mthe bong gnyis la gnas pa @169b dam tshig gi khu tshur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-1: de gnyis su byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-3: dkyil 'khor lngas phyag 'tshal zhing 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-4: 'di dag kyang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-5: de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje sku mchog gis spyi gtsug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-8: bskor zhing bskor bas mkhur tshos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-9: gtsug tor du gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-12: g-yon pa snying gar bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-13: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo gcig gis sa la reg pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-14: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i mdzub mo g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi nang du mngon par phyogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur sangs rgyas nyid du myur du thob pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-15: rdo rje bsdams pa'i 'og tu bcing bas brtan pa'i skyil mo krung ngo ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-16: de nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-17: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i dgug pa'i phyag rgya de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-18: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-19: dam tshig ni 'og du rdo rje bsngams pa'i sor mo thams cad 'bar ba'i nang du mthe bong rdo rje ni rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:169b-20: rdo rje 'chang chen po sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-2: chos kyi rnams ni de bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-3: las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-4: khu tshur gyi khyad par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-5: rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo sdigs mdzub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-6: dam tshig las byung ba ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-7: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje h'um mdzad las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-8: lag pa rdo rje'i mthe'u chung gdu bur bcings pa'i sdigs mdzub ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-9: rdo rje h'um mdzad de g-yon brkyang pas gnas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-10: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo'i rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-13: khros pas yi ge aa sbyar bar bya 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-14: ha har dgod pas bzhad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-15: snying gar rdo rje bsgoms pas rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-16: de nas padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la de'i snying gar gzhag pa ni rdo rje padma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-18: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-19: dam tshig gi khyad par dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-20: khu tshur gyi khyad par ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-21: kha 'bus pa'i thal mo las mthe bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-22: mthe'u chung kha phye bas 'dab ma bzhi pa'i padma chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170a-23: thams cad bcing ba ni ci lta ba bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-0: khu tshur gyi khyad par ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bong mnyam par brkyang la dbus ma gnyis phyi rol tu @170b gshibs pa dang bcas pa bzhag pa ste de gnyis su byas pa padma'i khu tshur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-1: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni padma chen po'i bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-3: de nyid rdo rje lta bas blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-4: de nyid sor mo thams cad kha phye bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-5: de nyid rdo rje gnyis gnyis kyi mig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-6: de nyid legs par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-7: de nyid dpral bar byas nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-8: de nyid g-yon pa'i skye gnas su mthe bo'i rtags bcag pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-9: de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi chog rgyas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-10: rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang zhing mthe bong mnyam po la mdzub mo bkug pa bzhag ste dpral ba'i mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag na dbang bskur ba thams cad gsol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-11: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-12: dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis phyir bkug pa'i sor mo mnyam por nor bu mthe bong rdo rjes bkag pa rdo rje nor bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-13: gzhan rnams ni de las byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-14: de gnyis su byas nas rin bo che'i khu tshur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-15: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsgreng ba bsgrub par bya ba'i myu gu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:170b-16: kha sbyar nas srin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam por kha phye bas mchog gi dar dbyangs 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-2: rdo rje bsdams pa las ni mdzub mo'i nor bu brkyang ba'i phreng ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-3: rdo rje rin po che gsum mdun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-4: logs gnyis su bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-5: rdo rje rin po che'i mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag ste mdzub mo'i rtse mos steng du mdud pa dar dpyangs kyi tshul du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-6: mthe bong gnyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung byas la mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i mchog gi lus can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-7: des spyi bo nas brtsams te mdun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-10: g-yon du bya ba byas nas de bzhin du mdun dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-12: logs gnyis su sgeg pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-13: bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa bkrol ba byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-14: phreng ba bcing ba'i mdud ba bya zhing dar dpyangs kyis tshul du bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-15: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba dang srid pa gsum gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-16: rdo rje thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad ni gong du ci lta ba bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-17: de nas phyi'i phyag rgya shes par bya ba ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-18: phyag rgya chen po ni g-yon par kham phor dang g-yas su mda' gtod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171a-19: dam tshig gi 'jug pa ni mdzub mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171b-0: srin lag mnyam por legs par sbyar @171b la rtse gsum par byas la mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ni mgon po rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171b-1: ci nas ltar bzung ba bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171b-2: dam tshig ni gung me dang srin lag rdo rje bsdams pas mdzub mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171b-5: srin lag mthe bo'i sor mo'i rtsa bar bsdus pa ni sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171b-6: gal te dkyil 'khor brtag par mi nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings pas dkyil 'khor shin tu brtag par 'gyur te dngos grub kyang shin tu gsol ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171b-7: lha mo rnams 'di nyid kyis spyan drang ba dang 'jug par bya'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171b-8: de nas sgyu ma'i 'khor lo ni g-yon pa'i steng du sor mo thams cad shin tu brkyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171b-9: dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171b-10: lha ma yin thams cad kyi sgyu ma thams cad don yod par bsgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171b-11: gdengs ka can gyi dbang po'i mthe bong gnyis pas rtse mo phyi rol tu phyogs pa'i sor mo brgyad kyis gdengs ka'i tshogs kyis klu thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171b-14: dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig ste lto 'phye chen po'i lag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:171b-15: gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-0: gung mo dang srin lag bzhi pos mdud pa byas la mgu ba'i tshul gyis steng du sgreng ste bsdus nas mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mos brdegs par byas na dug thams @172a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-2: dug thams cad bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-3: kun nas bsdus te brdegs pas dug thams cad 'jig pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-4: 'di nyid kyi dug thams cad za ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-6: phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-7: de nas rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-8: zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-9: de la sku'i phyag rgya lnga ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-10: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-11: dam tshig gi phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-12: rdo rje h'um mdzad ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-13: padma chen po ni padma'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-14: rdo rje nor bu chen po ni nor bu'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-15: de nas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-16: snyan pa'i glu'i yul thams cad kyi tshul rnams nus pa ci lta bu'i glu'i rgyun thams cad kyis glu blangs te bzlas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172a-18: mchu gnyis shin tu g-yo ba med cing ngos shin tu ma 'byar ba dbyangs dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i ngag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-0: sprin gyi 'brug sgra yi ge h'um gi sgra phra mo dang ldan pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ngag rdo @172b rje'i rigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-1: ting nge 'dzin gyi ngag padma'i rigs la te thams cad dag pa'i padma zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-2: chos kyi ngag nor bu'i rigs la te mchod pa'i nor bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-3: de nas thugs kyi phyag rgya lnga ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-4: thams cad bsgrub par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-5: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-6: bdag gam bdag gi mdun du gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-7: sbyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-8: nam mkha' thams cad bsgoms pas nor bu'i rigs la'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-9: de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-10: rdo rje rtse mo lnga 'od zer gyi phreng bas rtse mo yongs su khyab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-11: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-12: rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-13: 'bar ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje rtse bzhi pa rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-14: padma'i steng gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i padma'i khu tshur gyis padma'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:172b-15: rdo rje phyed pa rdo rje rin po che nor bu'i khu tshur gyis nor bu'i rigs la'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-0: de nas rigs thams cad rtogs pa'i gsang ba thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba'i de kho na nyid kyi bden pa myur du mchog @173a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-1: gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bsgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med par myur ba'i mchog gi dngos grub can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-3: gsung gi phyag rgya ni snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-4: thugs kyi phyag rgya ni nye ba'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-5: rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje snyems ma'i 'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-6: de nas phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-7: ma mchu'i sgros so rnams kyis bzung nas rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing thams cad rjes su chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-10: brtan par byed pa'i dngos grub skad cig gis so sor nyams su myong ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-11: rdo rje phra mos byin gyis brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-12: dam tshig tsam du blta ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-16: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173a-17: khro gnyer dang bcas pa'i khro bos mi bzad pa'i lta ba byas nas shin tu ma mgal bsdams nas thams cad ltung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-5: gzhan gyi dpung rmugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-6: thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub skad cig mas 'byung par 'gyur ba ni khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-7: btsums pa med pas brtan pa'i rdo rje'i lta bas mchu mnyam pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-9: ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa'i dngos grub 'byung ba ni padma'i rigs la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-10: 'bar ba'i lta bas zhal rnam par bzhad pas dbang bskur ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-11: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-12: mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-13: de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-14: nyin re mngon du lan gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-15: snying po rang nyid bsgrub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-16: rang gis bcings nas mdor bsdus pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-17: phyag rgya thams cad grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-18: de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-19: snying po'i phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-20: sgrub pa 'di ni rmad du byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-21: ci nus ci 'dod bzlas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-22: nye ba'i snying po gsang ba 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-23: don yod thogs med gsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-24: rang bzhin grub pa de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-25: bsod nams med pa rnams la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-26: dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:173b-27: dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-2: gsang ba'am gsang rgyud dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-4: gang gi khyim du gnas gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-5: phyag rgya sngags 'di dge ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-6: gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-7: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-8: dum bu gnyis pa sngags dum gyi rtsa rgyud rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-9: sems can thams cad bde don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-10: bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-11: sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-12: rdo rje mchog 'dzin de la zhus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-13: bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-14: chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-15: rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-16: sems dpa' chen po bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-17: rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-18: 'dir ni rtog pa gang zhig brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-19: snying po zhes ni gang bshad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-20: ye shes rgyud ni ji ltar yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-21: dkyil 'khor zhes ni brjod pa ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-22: der 'jug yon tan ci dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-23: rigs kyi 'khor lo'i khyad par dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-24: gzhan yang sgrub pa ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-26: 'di yang ci ltar de nyid gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-27: thog ma tha ma med nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-28: rab tu dga' ba ji ltar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-29: dang po'i snying po 'di yi yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-30: de bzhin nyid ni gang zhig yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174a-31: h'um gi glu ni gang gis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-0: 'di yi don ni ji ltar @174b brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-1: sems ni rdo rje nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-2: de bzhin phyag rgya rdo rje nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-3: sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-4: rigs rnams kyang ni de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-5: sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-6: sangs rgyas bdud du ji ltar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-7: rtogs pa rnams kyang bsgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-8: dang po'i snying po'i de nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-9: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-10: sgrub pa de bzhin dngos grub rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-11: bsod nams med pa'i ci ltar 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-12: slob dpon nyid du ji ltar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-13: me tog spos dang mar me dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-14: dri rnams ci yin ji ltar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-15: mchod pa yang ni ji ltar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-16: gsang ba'i mchod pa ji ltar yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-17: kun byed kun za sdig pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-18: shin tu sdig can ji ltar grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-19: don yod thog med dngos grub kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-21: gsang ba de yang gang zhig yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-23: bde ba chen po rab grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-24: chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-25: gsang ba'i de nyid gsang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-26: bdag cag rnams la kun bshad gsol ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:174b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-0: bzhad pa chen po'i dam tshig chen po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma 'di @175a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-2: de la rnam par mi rtog pa khyab pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-3: rnam rtog med pa'i ting 'dzin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-4: sems can don ni yongs su brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-5: des na brtag par bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-6: rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-7: de la bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyud ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-8: sa la yi ge'i gnas bris nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-9: bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-10: de yi dam tshig rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-11: snying po thams cad sgrub byed pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-12: de la dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-13: ci ltar gnas dang ci ltar dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-14: ci ltar 'jig rten ci lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-15: 'khor ni dgod par bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-17: de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-18: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-20: zhugs pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-21: de ltar bris pa'ang de dang 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-22: de nas rigs thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i khyad par gyi rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-23: rdo rje 'khor lo bstan pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-24: lcags kyi 'khor lo dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-27: de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-28: dkyil 'khor brtag par byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175a-29: nang gi rim par zhugs bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-0: dkyil 'khor @175b dag la dza: h'um bam//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-1: ho: pra sid dhya mam brjod bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-2: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-3: sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro kun gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-4: thams cad bdag nyid bcom ldan mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-5: sems can 'byung phyir sems dpa' ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-7: de nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-8: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-10: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-13: tha ma med pa'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-14: thog mtha' med pa thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-15: nam mkha' 'byung ba chen po'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-16: nam mkha' skye ba skye med phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu dga' ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-19: rab tu dga' phyir nyon mongs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-21: de la bde ba rnam dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-22: srid gsum snga rol bcom ldan 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-23: de nas dang po'i snying po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-24: chags pa kun la chags pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-25: 'dod ldan thams cad sad par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-27: snying po'i phyag rgya rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-28: de nas yi ge h'um gi glu blang ba'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-29: glu las chags pa dga' las 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:175b-30: rab tu dga' las thams cad 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-1: phyir; ;bskal pa dang por bcom ldan gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-2: de nas yi ge h'um gi bzlas pa'i don gyi rgyud bshad pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-3: myur du thams cad rjes chags pas; ;dngos grub thams cad rjes su chags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-4: rjes su chags par byed mchog ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-5: snying po'i bzlas pa'i don yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-6: de nas rdo rje sems rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-7: glu rnams ci ltar khro bo ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-8: bsdus nas kun tu 'jug pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-9: rdo rje thog ni brtan gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-10: de bzhin rdo rje bsdus pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-11: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-12: thams cad bdag nyid sems dpa' ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-13: bdag gi bdag nyid la yang gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' dngos su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-15: myur du thams cad du yang zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-17: 'dod las chags pa dga' las bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-18: bde las sdig pa sdig las sdug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-19: sdug las ting 'dzin shin tu brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-20: rdo rje nyid las sangs rgyas 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-21: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-23: de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-24: de nyid padma'i rigs dag ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-25: de nyid nor bu'i rigs mchog bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-26: de nas mngon par byang chub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176a-27: rang sems so sor rtog pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-0: @176b byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-1: rdo rje nyid phyir sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-2: bdag nyid sangs rgyas rab tu bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa bdud nyid du shes pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-4: rang sems nyid ni bdud nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-5: sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-6: rang gi sems ni gdul ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-7: sangs rgyas bdud nyid du ni 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-8: de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-9: rtog pa kun la grub bya gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-10: rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-11: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-12: de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-13: de nas dang po'i snying po sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-14: bzlas pa'i don shes nus pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-15: rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgrub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-16: ci srid 'dod pa'i bzlas pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-17: dngos grub chen po'i bde ba ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-21: rig pa sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-22: sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-23: phyag rgya sngags dang rig pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-24: bzlas pa'i don du sems dpa' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-25: bdag nyid dang ni bsgrub bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-26: de nas dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-27: rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-28: de bzhin de bzhin gshegs kun gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-29: byang chub rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-30: las kun mchog gi dngos grub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:176b-31: de nas bsod nams med pa rnams kyi dngos grub grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-2: ci yang rung ba'ang thal bas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-3: sems dpa' chen po bzhag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-4: nyin zhag bzhir ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-5: de nas slob dpon nyid kyi grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-6: bde ba chen po rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-7: gsang mchog dam tshig grong khyer du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-8: ci bzhin rang nyid rab zhugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-9: bdud rtsi'i chu yis dbang bskur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-10: de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba'i shes pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-11: rdo rje can la mchod pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-13: rdo rje bdag nyid nag po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-14: dmar po padma nor bu ser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-15: de nas dbul ba shes pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-17: yang na ji ltar rnyed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-18: rdo rje gar sogs mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-20: de nas dus kyi mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-21: drug ldan la sogs snyam pa'i glu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-22: glu ni thams cad ci 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-24: mchod pa dag ni rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-25: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-26: rdo rje gar bcas mchod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-27: go rims ci lta ba bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-28: bzlas pa'i don gyis ma brjod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-30: de nas sdig pa chen po byed pa'ang grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177a-31: dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-0: @177b tshul khrims 'chal ba la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-1: ting nge 'dzin gyi stos kyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-2: sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-3: de nas dngos grub mi thob pa'i rgyu shes pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-4: chags pa smad par mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-5: rnam dag de bzhin bde ba ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyang chags pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-8: de nas mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-9: ji bzhin yul dang ldan gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-10: mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-12: tshe 'di nyid la sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-13: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rje rin po che chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-14: rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das rtog pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje rin po che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga gzigs pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug gi rdo rje'i padma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:177b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i mdzad pas 'phrin las dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rdo rjes thams cad la khyab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-0: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i khams bstan pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par chos kyi dbyings spro ba thams cad khyab pa'i de bzhin @178a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-1: gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor lo mngon par mkhyen par mdzad nas dang po'i snying po'i gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-2: ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas la zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-3: de srid sems can gdon par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-4: mya ngan 'das bzhugs gzi brjid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-5: sems can don ni nus pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-6: de phyir sems dpa' dam pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-8: sems can don ni mngon par bzhed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-9: thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-10: de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'dul bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-11: sems can don mi mdzad pa de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-12: 'dir ni rab grub dngos grub mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-13: dus kun du ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-14: rdo rje 'chang chen la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-15: 'di ltar bsod nams rnam smin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-16: kun la mthong ba la sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-17: rang gi las kyis mdzad mi spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-18: dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-20: shin tu mthong ba la sogs kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-21: sems can thams cad rab stsol mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-22: kun nas dus kun thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-23: dngos grub thams cad rab stsol 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-24: rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-25: srid pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-26: de phyir bsgrub bya 'di bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-27: dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178a-28: gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-0: shin tu rtag @178b pa'i dngos grub thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-2: ri mor bris pa 'am 'dus byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-3: phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-4: ci bzhin bshad par rab gzhug bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-5: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub gyi cho ga rgyas pa 'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi slar yang phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-7: nyin re snga rol dus ci bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-8: dang po'i rdo rje bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-9: 'dis ni rtag pa thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-10: phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdus pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-11: dam tshig yang dag bcings nas grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-12: phyi nas ma bsgrubs kyang grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i sngags sgrub pa 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-15: gang dang der ni gnas pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-16: thams cad rjes chags rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-17: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-19: gsang ba'i gar mchog mchod pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-20: yang na mchod pa ci bde bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-21: byas te mgon po bsgrub byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:178b-22: mchog gi dngos grub myur du 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-0: de nas rang gi phyag rgyas bdag @179a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-2: phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-3: rang gi snying pos lan gcig bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-4: brtan zhing shin tu dgyes kun chags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-5: shin tu dgyes myur bdag po grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-6: de nas yi ge h'um gi glu blang ba'i grub pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-7: ri bhi da sogs rgyan dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-8: ci nus pa dang ci 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-9: dri za dang po blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-10: yi ge h'um gis grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-11: zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-12: de kho na nyid chen po'i gsang ba'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-13: de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-14: tha ma med pa'i 'phrin las can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-15: shin tu ring ba'i tshe 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i chos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-16: shin nu gzhon pa'i na tshod 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i bcud kyis len gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-18: gzi brjid chen po 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gzugs kyi gzi brjid kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-19: 'du byed chen po thams cad 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje 'du byed chen pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179a-20: sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid thams cad bsrung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bsrung bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-3: bde ba chen po rdo rje bskor bas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-4: thams cad rdo rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rdo rjes kyang 'jug par mi nus shing mi phyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-5: srid pa thams cad srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-6: bdag nyid kyi dngos grub thams cad dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-7: gzhan dag rdo rjer byed pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje go chas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-8: 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-9: 'thab mo srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i gzhan gyis mi thub pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-10: gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhig pa ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'dzin par byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-11: gzhan gyi dpung nyams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-14: gsod pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje glog bskor bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-15: rims thams cad la sogs pa'i nad thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-16: nad chen po zhi ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'phrog pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-17: dug thams cad gzhig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-18: dug med par bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje phyag rgya'i las kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-19: gdon thams cad las dgrol ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i 'byung po bskrad pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:179b-22: gdon thams cad dgrol ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-0: @180a *// tshe 'phel ba de shin tu srung ba rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i lan gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-4: gar byed du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-5: glu len du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-6: snga ma 'byung ba so sor bstan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-9: bden pa thams cad pa thams cad smrar gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-12: sos su bcug pa rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbab pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-14: mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad la yid kyis 'dod pa'i pra dbab pa thams cad grub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje pra dbab pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-17: yid rdo rjes mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-20: ston pa'i shes pa grub pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgoms pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-23: da ltar byung ba thams cad bka' mthong ba'i yi ge sna tshogs pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-24: dngos po sna tshogs pa thams cad kyis rna ba'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad mkhyen pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-27: thog dbab pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180a-28: sprin gzhig pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-0: sa'i 'og thams @180b cad las sngar ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-2: chu med pa'i gnas las chu'i dngos po 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-4: mun pa chen por snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-6: rlung thams cad la bka' bsgo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-8: nam mkha' thams cad las yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos po thams cad mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-9: nye bar len pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-14: gnyid log par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-19: phyir ldog pa ni bde ba chen po'i gdug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-20: thams cad rjes su chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-31: mngag gzhug bka' bsgo ba byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-32: thams cad tshur drang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-35: slar gso ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:180b-36: dbang du byed pa'i sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i thams cad sgrub pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-0: rigs thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad @181a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-2: mchog gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-3: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-4: thams cad rjes su chags pa la sogs pa'i bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-5: yid bde ba thams cad rab tu gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-6: mchod pa chen po thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad myur du grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi dngos grub kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-7: de la bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi dang po'i mchog gi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-8: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ster ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-9: 'di'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-10: dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-11: rtse mo'i 'od zer byas pas gdong pa yongs su sbyangs te gdong par dgrol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-12: bdag nyid la kun tu bskor nas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-20: dpral bar bzhag la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings la go cha bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181a-21: mdud pa byas nas rdo rje'i gnas rnams su slar yang phreng ba byas pas rgyab tu mdud pa byas te dar dpyangs bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181b-2: byab pa'i gyen du kha bltas pa'i dbugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181b-4: 'bar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis 'dor zhing khros pa'i rang gi snying gar bcings te zhi ba'i lta bas rtse mo 'phrog par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181b-6: dbab pas myur du dgrol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181b-7: yongs su bskor nas dpral bar bzhag ste dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas na ci lta ba bzhin du las byed pa'i snying gar bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181b-8: dbus ma rdo rje'i las ni 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:181b-12: gar byed du bcug pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:185a-12: dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:185a-13: 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa //
