K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189a-21: ci rnyed pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189a-22: shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgo zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189a-23: me tog phreng btags kha dris bsgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189a-24: rnam sgeg dga' ba'i rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189a-25: rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189a-26: spyi bor me tog thal sbyar nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189a-27: gnas de mgon la phyag bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189a-28: zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189a-29: bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-0: de nas mdun du @189b 'dug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-1: de kho na nyid lan gcig brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-2: 'dod chags chen po bde ba chen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-3: rdo rje chen po nor che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-4: ye shes chen po las chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-5: de dag rdo rje sems grub brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-6: de nas me tog sil ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-7: mgon la gtor te cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-8: dang po sha da la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-9: bstod pa glu ru lan gcig blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa de kho na nyid chen po ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-13: dga' ba chen po'i dga' ba chen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-14: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-15: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-16: sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-17: rdo rje rdo rje mchog chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-18: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-19: bdud dang bdud rni rab 'joms pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-20: thams cad du ni byang chub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-21: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas skyes mchog skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-22: rdo rje h'um mdzad yi ge h'um//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-23: 'jig rten dbang phyug nor rab gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-24: 'dod chags chen po bde ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-25: 'dod dang thar pa nor che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-26: dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-27: 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-28: brtan par rang 'byung gsal ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-29: rab phra sbom dang legs bsags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-30: rgyu ba rab mchog thob mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-31: srid pa 'khor ba sbyong mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-32: thog mtha' med cing thog mtha' can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:189b-33: mdangs ldan dang por thams cad gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-2: de nyid bden pa mchog pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-4: chos dang las ni khams chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-7: byang chub sems ni rab sbyod mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-8: rdo rje khro bo khro bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-10: 'dul mdzad chen po gdug pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-11: drag po drag nyid zad mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-12: thams cad dag pa padma che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-13: shes rab thabs te tshul chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-15: sna tshogs chags pa dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-16: nam mkha' mtha' yas rtag pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-17: 'byung po thams cad gnas chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-18: 'byor pa po ni thams cad gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-19: 'byor pa dpal dang gtso bo rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-20: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-23: dad pas khyed la bdag brten bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-25: gang zhig bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-26: nyid re nang par rjod byed dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-27: chos kyi tshig gis lan gcig brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-28: dngos grub shin tu myur bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-30: dang por nyin re dus gsum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-31: bstod na sdig pa las nges grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-32: zhing dag pa ni grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190a-33: rtag tu sdug bsngal thams cad sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-0: lan gcig rab tu brjod @190b pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-1: dngos grub thams cad skal bzang byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-2: phun sum tshogs dpal 'phel bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-3: dngos grub don yod yon tan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-4: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-5: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-6: rab tu dga' bas mgon la mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-7: rang gi phyag rgyas lan gcig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-8: rang gi phyag rgyas bcings te grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-9: de nas lha yi chu dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-10: de bzhin sku mchog gis dbang bskur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-11: rang nyid snying po rdo rje phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-12: snying po 'di ni blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-13: de la rdo rje sems dpar dbang bskur ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-14: h'um maha' su kha badzra satva aa bhi she ke na hr'i: aa bhi shinytsa mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-15: sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam dri dho me bha ba mi dha n'a ma ma ste ga blan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-16: mh'a bdzra dha ra su rat stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-19: de nas rdo rje dbang bskur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-20: phyag na rdo rje ril 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-21: rdo rje 'dzin chen slob dpon du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-23: de nas kyang ni ci 'dod par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-24: cho ga'i dam pa bsgrubs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-25: rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-26: legs par mchod la phyir phyung bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-27: de nas brtsams te rdo rje'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-28: rdo rje kun gyi gsung rab 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-29: rdo rje thams cad 'dzin slob dpon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-30: dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' dngos grub uchen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-32: phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:190b-34: dh'i:/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-2: mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-3: kun byed dngos grub thams cad ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-4: sems can kun gyi rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-5: tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-6: thams cad rjes chags byed kun mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-7: kun rig pa dang kun gyi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-8: 'dod pa thams cad la rab sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-9: phun tshogs kun gyi dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-10: lha la sogs pa'i sems can kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-11: bsgo ba thams cad rtag tu byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-14: de nyid kyis ni 'dod par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-15: dga' zhing rang nyid de bdag por //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-16: rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-17: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-18: bde ba chen po rdo rje slob dpon byin gyis brlab cing 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-19: de nas rdo rje slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-20: rdo rje mchod yon snying gar bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-21: bcings nas bsam g-yos bzhin gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-22: mgo bos yang dag phyag rgya bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-23: dngos grub thams cad grub byed yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-24: dkyil 'khor du ni rab zhugs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-25: bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-26: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191a-27: 'gro ba kun la'ang grub mdzad brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-0: de nas dus kyi @191b mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-1: bde ba chen po yang dag mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-2: de bzhin du ni dbang bskur bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-3: rdo rje gsang ba'i slob ma gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-4: de nas ci bzhin brgyan nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-5: rdo rje slob dpon gyis rab gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-6: slob ma'i tshogs rnams bcug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-8: de nas slob ma bcug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-9: dga' chen po 'di brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-10: rab dgyes rab bde bstan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' deng grub mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-12: de nas me tog phreng ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-13: spyi bo nas ni myur du 'dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-14: gang du me tog babs gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-16: de nas lha yi chu yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-18: rdo rje chen po rdo rje lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-19: byon la rdo rje bo dhi brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-20: aom ma h'a su kha badzar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-21: badzar aa bhi she ke na stvam//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-24: he badzra n'a ma si ddha n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-25: gang la rdo rje ming gang zhig yin pa de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-26: de nas snying po byin la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-27: phyag rgya bcing ba bslabs nas ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-29: gang 'dod rang gis grub pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-30: de nyid kyis ni dam tshig nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-31: 'jug la sogs pa'i cho ga bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-32: 'jig rten pa ni sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-34: thams cad rang gi ngo bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:191b-35: rgyas par bsgrubs na rab tu 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-2: nyid du rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-3: bde chen rab tu grub pa ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-4: de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-5: mna' ni dam du bsngags nas kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-6: de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-7: rang nyid dang ni gzhan gyis bslab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-8: de la 'di ni mna' grub pa'i rdo rje chus dbang bskur nas brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-9: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-10: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-12: dngos grub rdo rje bdud rtsi chu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-13: de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-14: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-16: dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-17: de la 'di ni de kho na nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-18: dam tshig gi gsang ba'i cho ga rab tu sbyin pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-19: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-21: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-22: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-23: de kho na nyid mchog gi gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen por bshad par brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-24: bcom ldan de nyid chos kyi mchog bka' stsal bar mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-25: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-26: ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-27: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192a-28: srid pa mchog ni byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-0: de la srid pa rnam par dag pa'i thabs rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam @192b tshig chen po bsten par bya ba ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-1: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-2: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-3: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-4: dam tshig rtag tu bsten par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-5: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-6: ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-7: rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-8: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-9: de la rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog gi dam tshig chen po 'di brjod par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-10: ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-11: mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur ba'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-12: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-13: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-14: gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-15: bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-16: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-17: rgyun tu sems can don byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-18: de ltar sems ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-19: rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde skyed bsten par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-20: de na 'gro la myur du bde ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-21: rab tu mtshungs shing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-22: de nas khyed kyis bcud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-26: rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams legs par bstabs pa bas bdag nyid gang la sred pas kyang rdo rje slob dpon chen po mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-27: rdo rje slob dpon me tog sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:192b-28: ci 'dod par ni legs mchod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-2: yang dag par ni mchod de byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-3: de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-4: gar gyi mchod pas mchod nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-5: rdo rje thal mo'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-6: slob ma kun gyis rab tu mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-7: ro dang kha zas gnas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-8: glu dang rol mo ci 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-9: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-10: yang dag mchod nas phyir byung bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-11: dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-12: de nas sgrub pa bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-13: dngos grub shin tu rtag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-14: gang gi srid pa 'di nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-15: dngos grub rtag pa thob byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-16: 'di yis byang chub sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-17: srid par gnas shing srid par sangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-18: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-19: rtag tu sems can kun don byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-20: 'di yi ci ltar mchog grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-21: de ltar byang chub spyod sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-22: dge ba'i tshul ni gzhan gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-23: sangs rgyas kun sogs thob mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-24: gdul bya min pa bsod nams med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-25: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-26: rnam pa kun tu mthong sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-27: sems can don byed mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-28: de bas rgyud chen las grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-29: sangs rgyas sam ni rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-30: mthong la sogs pa sems can don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-31: nam mkha' mnyam par byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-32: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193a-33: srid pa'i nges pa dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-0: nam @193b mkha' mtha' yas sems can don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-1: mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-2: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-3: bsod nams med pa'am le lo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-4: de yang kun mchog grub pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-6: zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-7: de nas don yod cing thogs pa med pa myur du sgrub pa'i mchog rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-9: byas pa 'am ni bris pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-10: dang ba'i sems dpa'i brtags nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-11: mdun du de ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-12: nyin re zhing ni dang po ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-13: de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-14: dang po'i gsang mchog gis bkug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-15: phyag rgya chen por rab byin brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-16: rdo rje mig gis de bzhin bltas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-17: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po rang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-18: rdo rje h'um ni glur blangs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-20: rdo rje cha lugs ci bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-21: mchog gi dad por rab dgyes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-22: gzugs brnyan la sogs dang por ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-23: ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-26: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-27: kun mchog dam pa'i dbang phyug yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-28: phun tshogs kun bdag thams cad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:193b-29: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-0: @194a *// thams cad 'jug mdzad sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-1: rtag par kun tu 'dul ba po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-2: dngos grub kun gyi bde ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-3: phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-4: rdo rje kun gyi dngos grub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung gnas che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-6: mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-7: thams cad byed cing kun gyi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-8: khams gsum las rgyal sna tshogs pa; ;tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-9: kun la rjes chags kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-10: kun rig dngos grub thams cad ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-11: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-12: rang gi rnam 'phrul rab ston byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-13: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-14: dbang phyug chen po'i dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-15: gzugs dang tshe stobs rdo rje mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-17: 'gro ba rnams kyis mchod cing rjed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-18: rang gi gnyen rnams kyis brten pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-19: rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-21: gal te rdo rje sems dpa' 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-22: sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-23: dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-26: rtog pa kun bshad cho ga 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-27: rang nyid kyis mdzad kyis rtag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-28: dngos grub thams cad grub 'gyur zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-29: bcom ldan rdo rje dngos grub kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194a-30: dbang phyug bde ba chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-0: rdo rje 'chang ba @194b che rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-1: kun mchog sa yi dbang pos gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-2: de la ci ltar na rang gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-3: phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-4: rang gi snying pos lan gcig sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-5: dridha su to shya sam ra kata //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-6: su po si ddha ta la gu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-7: de la ci ltar yi ge h'um gi glu blangs pa'i rgyud yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-8: ri dhi ta sogs kyis brgyan ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-10: i dga' dang gnade la sogs glu blangs pa'i yi ge h'um gis 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-11: de nas phyogs rgya thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-12: mchog de sgrub pa'i rgyud bshad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-13: gal te phyag rgya sgrub 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-14: de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-15: rang nyid kyis ni rgya bcings la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-16: yongs su mi skyo'i bar du bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-17: de la ci ltar na dam tshig thams cad grub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-18: dam tshig phyag rgya bcing nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-19: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-20: rang gi snying gar rim bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-21: phyag rgya'i mchog de bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-22: de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog sgrub pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-23: rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-24: yongs su mi skyo'i bar bsgrubs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-25: mchod pa kun sogs las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-27: rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-28: sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:194b-29: gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-0: rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa @195a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-1: chen po don yod par grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-2: de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-3: nyin re zhing dang por lan gcig phyag rgya bsgrub par don yod pa dngos grub thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-4: thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-7: dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lta bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-11: dngos grub thams cad mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-15: gzi brjod chen po mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-19: snyan pa 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-23: las bsgrub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje snying stobs che bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-27: rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-28: thams cad du yi ge dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195a-29: gzugs kyi bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-2: 'dri ba grub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-3: dbang po thams cad kyis bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-6: zil gyis gnon par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-10: lan thob pa grub pa la dang po'i rdo rje yid du byung bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-11: gter thams cad dbyung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-14: sa la nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes dbang bskur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-19: chu bor nye bar longs spyod sprul ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-20: thams cad las sngon ma byung ba'i lha yul dang rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-23: g-yog 'khor shin tu bzang po la sogs pa sprul te nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sprul pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-24: skad cig gis sa gzhi thams cad 'bru la sogs pa smin par bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-25: chu'i phung po chen po 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-26: snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-27: rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-28: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:195b-31: las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-1: po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i thams cad dbang du byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-2: dngos grub thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-5: rdo rje la sogs mthong ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i bsnyems pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-6: rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad sprul cing ston pa mi snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-7: nam mkhar 'gro ba grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-10: du mar ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje gzugs sna tshogs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-11: 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa thams cad dbab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-14: las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-15: lha thams cad dbab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-18: las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje lha'i bdag pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-19: klu thams cad gdon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-22: las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i rdo rjes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-23: gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-25: las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-26: skrag par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje gdon 'dul bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196a-27: dkyil 'khor thams cad brtag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-3: las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'khor los so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-4: phyag rgya thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-8: bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje phyag rgya grub pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-9: dam tshig thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-12: bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje dam tshig mchog gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-13: las thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa la rnam pa mi 'jigs par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-15: grags pa chen po rab tu bsgrags pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje las kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-16: rdo rje thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-19: dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-20: sems dpa' chen po thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-23: dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sems dpas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-27: dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i de bzhin gshegs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-28: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-31: dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pas so zhes kyang gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-32: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-33: sdig pa thams cad byas pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:196b-34: rang gi snying po ma bsgrubs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197a-2: ma bsgrubs par thams cad 'grub pa don yod par grub pa phyag rgya chen po mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197a-3: de nas dang po'i snying po ma bsgrubs pa'i thams cad don yod pa thogs pa med pa las thams cad kyi rgyu skad cig la bsgrub pa rjes su bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197a-4: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i 'phrin las rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197a-5: don yod pa dang thogs med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197a-6: bdag kyang bde gshegs lhan cig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197a-8: dngos grub skad cig gis sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197a-10: thams cad shin tu bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197a-13: bde legs su bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197a-14: tshe mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi sems dpa'i tshul gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197a-18: dngos grub bcing zhing bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi so sor 'brang ba chen pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197a-23: khyab 'jug gi rims thams cad gsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rims nad med pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-0: sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig @197b pa la ni rdo rje gar gyis sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-1: dug dang sbyar ba'i dug las nye bar thar pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-5: bdud rtsir bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi nye ba'i dug gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-6: gdon thams cad dbab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-8: dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-10: bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdon las thar pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-11: thams cad la bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-15: ldang ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-16: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-17: gdon las thar bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-18: shi ba bslang bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-20: shin tu bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'i lan gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-25: byur gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi zhi bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-28: gar byed du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-29: thams cad bden par smrar gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-30: pra se na thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi thams cad 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-31: thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:197b-35: slar gso ba la ni don yod pa'i rdo rje gar gyi mkha' 'gro ma chen mos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-0: @198a *// thams cad rengs par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-2: gnyid log par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-4: bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdug pa'i srin pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-5: gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-9: gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gshed byed kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-10: khro bo thams cad bsal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-11: bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-12: rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-14: g-yul 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i rgyal ba bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-15: sprin thams cad yang dag par bzung zhing mi g-yo bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-16: char chen po dbab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-22: grang ba bsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dbang po'i rdo rjes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-27: reg bya thams cad shin tu grub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-29: mi rgyu ba thams cad rjes su chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-33: las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198a-34: lha thams cad dbab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-0: klu @198b thams cad dbang du bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-3: ma mo thams cad las la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje glu'i mchog gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-4: rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-5: lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tu dbrog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-7: lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad dang rtse ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-8: 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-9: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad las rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-10: dbang phyug chen po thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi skyes bu byed pa chen pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-11: mchod pa thams cad sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-12: thams cad rdo rjer bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-13: bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-14: phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-15: dngos grub kyi mchog la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi myur du grub par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi don yod cing thogs pa med pa myur ba'i las sna tshogs kyi dngos grub dam pas so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-16: de nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-17: nyin re dang po lan gcig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-18: phyag rgya thams cad rab sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-19: snying mchog lan gcig bzlas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-20: phyag rgya chen po rab grub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-21: de yis rjes la nye snying po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-22: las rnams kun la nges sbyar bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:198b-23: don yod grub pas las rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-2: phyag rgya thams cad rab byin rlob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-3: phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-4: dkyil 'khor dag kyang mthong ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-7: 'khor lo med la brgya byin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-8: gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-9: rang sras rgyu ni 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-10: sdig pa chen po byed pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-11: bsam pa shes nas sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-12: 'di dag bcings tsam nyid dag byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-14: dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-15: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-16: 'byin pa byed pa bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-17: bde chen can du brtan phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-18: sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-19: khams kun dang mnyam zad pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-20: kun gyi bdag nyid la zhugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-21: mnyam pa'i dngos grub mchog spros nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-23: mtha' yas pa yi zhing thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-24: 'jig rten kun gyi khams bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-25: de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-26: til gyi gang bu bzhin myur gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-27: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-28: sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199a-29: sems can thams cad ma dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-0: rang rig las kyi @199b dag ma gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-1: de tshe sems can khams rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-2: rang bzhin gyis ni gso dka' phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-3: rang gi las ni sbyang don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-4: btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-5: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-6: sems dpa' chen po bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-7: byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-8: skad cig gis ni yang dag bskul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-9: sems can la phan bsod nams can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-10: byang chub sems ni brtan pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-11: sems can khams ni rgud 'gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-12: shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-13: de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-14: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-15: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-16: byang chub sems mchog khyod smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-17: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-18: de tshe kun nas byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-19: bde ba chen po rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-20: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-21: khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgya khyon gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-22: 'khor lo chen po gdod nas byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-23: de yis khams gsum gnas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-24: sems can thams cad yang dag bsgrubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-25: sangs rgyas kun sogs dngos grub la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-27: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-30: sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-31: de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:199b-32: sku gsung thugs la yang dag gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-2: yang dag spros te 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-4: de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-6: bdud bcom la sogs mdzad nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-7: byang chub snying por byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-8: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-9: dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-10: sems can la ni bde don phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-11: rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-12: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-13: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-14: dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-15: rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-16: 'khor lo lta bar sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-17: 'dzum pa'i tshems ni mi snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-18: su ra te sa ma ya stvam//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-19: aom siddha m'am zhes brjod dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-20: mdun du bdud las rnam par rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-21: mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-22: g-yas su byang chub sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-23: nor chen pos ni dbang bskur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-24: rgyab tu byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-25: mnyam du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-26: g-yon du log par rnam dregs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-27: sdig pa bsdus pa kun 'byin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-28: de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-33: de nas phyag rgya rnams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-38: mtshams kyi char ni rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-39: rin chen sdong bu nor bu bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200a-40: mtshams rnams su ni lha mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-0: lcags kyu la sogs sgo rnams @200b su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-1: de bzhan snga ma ci lta bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-2: 'khor lo de ni brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-3: mchod pa'i thal mo snying gar bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-4: g-yon du de bzhin bskor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-5: me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-7: me tog bcas te snying gar bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-8: bsam pa g-yos pas gdung par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-9: mgon la mgo bos phyag byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-10: bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-11: zhugs nas me tog 'dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-12: shin tu gsang ba yang dag dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-13: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-16: bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-17: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharma n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-19: de nas cho ga ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-20: ston la me tog sil ma dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-21: sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-22: 'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-23: de yis kun nas sangs rgyas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-25: thams cad mi dmigs sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-26: dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-27: dkyil 'khor der zhugs pa la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-29: dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-31: de nas de bzhin cho ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-32: rgyas pas slob ma mchog tu gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-33: mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor lo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:200b-34: mchod nas slar ni dbyung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-2: cho ga ci bzhin rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-3: ras la bcom ldan bdud la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-4: rnam par rgyal ba mnyes par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-5: sgrub 'di lan gcig tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-7: sku gzugs sogs mdun yang dag par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-8: ye shes khu tshur yongs bzung la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-9: rdo rje'i tshig gi cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-10: bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-11: mdor na 'bum ni rdzogs pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-12: ci 'dod dngos grub thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-13: tshe mchog 'di la sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-16: phyag rgya gang rung gcig bcings nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-17: bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-18: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-19: bstan par myur du thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-20: de nas dam tshig sgrub pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-21: snying gar rdo rje gzugs bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-22: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-23: bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-24: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-25: de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-26: bdud las rgyal ba'i mchog bcings te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-27: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-28: mtshungs med sems can don byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-29: las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201a-30: ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201b-0: de @201b bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201b-1: de nas ma bsgrubs dngos grub mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201b-2: las rnams rab 'byams dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201b-3: sdig pa kun sel sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201b-4: go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201b-21: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:201b-31: sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bshig pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-2: thugs 'phel ba la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen pos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-16: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-20: sna tshogs pa'i bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-22: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-26: rdo rje chen po grub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-28: kun tu bzang po'i cho ga spyod pa rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-29: sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-32: gzhon nu'i rol pa ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-34: dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-35: byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-37: byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202a-38: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-0: mu stegs thams cad tshar gcod pa @202b dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-1: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-3: 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-4: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-5: 'dul ba la rab tu bzhag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-6: ngan 'gro thams cad las 'don pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-7: mdo sde thams cad ston par mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-8: rtog pa thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-9: dngos grub thams cad sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-12: thugs la dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-13: cho 'phrul bsgrub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs kyi rdo rjes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-14: ci ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-15: byang chub sems la mngon brten pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-16: de ltar byang chub spyod tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-17: byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-18: don yod bsod nams dam pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-19: las kyi rab 'byams sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-20: cho ga ma grub pa rnams grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-21: sangs rgyas chos ni rab ster byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-22: rnam pa kun tu dad ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-23: sems can kun la sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-24: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-25: skad cig gis ni sbyor bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-26: dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje'i rtog pa rgyas pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:202b-28: de nas sna tshogs las chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-2: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-3: sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-5: gang phyir nyes byas kyis gdug pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-6: rang gi rang sems spyod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-7: zhi bas sems can kun gyi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-8: gdul bar rab tu bsgrub mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-9: sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrub bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-11: gang tshe bde gshegs sems can don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-12: dam ba mdzad par mi spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-13: de tshe nyid kyis dngos po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-14: gtso bos rdo rje gsol ba btab sems can thams cad 'dul mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-15: bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-16: au ti shtha sa ma ya kro bha ni sumbha dzv'a la badzra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-17: de nas sngags 'di gsungs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-18: phyag na rdo rje rang nyid gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-19: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-20: slar byung nas ni mdu nan gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-21: khro chen rgyal po'i sku yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-22: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-24: sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-25: g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-26: drag tu gsor bas bskyod mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-29: 'bar ba chen pos gsod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-30: bskal pa'i me yi phung po 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203a-31: dang po'i rdo rje khro gnyer bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-0: rdo rje @203b mchog 'dzin pas gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-1: de la rdo rje chen po me dang nyi ma ltar 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-3: h'um/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-4: sdig pa kun gyi bud shing zad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-7: lha chen la sogs lha rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-8: g-yo ba med cing rmongs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-11: nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-13: lha la sogs pa'i srid gsum kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-14: de tshe kun tu rmongs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-16: sangs rgyas byang chub yang bstan mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-17: sems dpa' kun gyi thabs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-18: dam pa yang ni thugs su chud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-19: de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-21: rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-22: zhal ras khro dang bcas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-23: g-yon brkyang bas ni legs par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-25: dbu skra gyen du brdzes shing g-yo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-27: rdo rje gsang ba'i rnal 'byor che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-28: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi lus can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-29: phyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:203b-31: rlung bskyod bskal ba'i me lta bur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-2: 'jig rten khams ni ma lus na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-3: sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-4: yang dag bzhugs pa legs bskul te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-5: 'jig rten thams cad yongs su bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-6: bkug nas sems can kun don dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-7: brtan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-8: 'jig rten gsum bdag de rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-9: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sems med byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-10: de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-11: kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-12: de rnams la ni thugs rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-13: 'chi ba slar gso brtan por gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-14: aom au ttishtha ma h'a aa dhi pa ti badzri ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-15: sh'i ghram aud th'a pa ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-17: mi rgyu ba thams cad bslang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-18: de nas sa gsum bslang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-19: thams cad du ni shi ba gso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-20: sangs rgyas dpa' bos btul gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-21: rdo rje can gyis kyang rjes btul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-22: de nas rdo rje 'dzin khro bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-23: 'bar ba'i rdo rje gsor byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-24: nga yi dam tshig la gnas zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-25: sna tshogs pa la bka' rab bsgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-28: bcom ldan sku ni zhi ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-29: gnod sbyin gzugs can gang lags gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-30: khyed kyi dam tshig ci 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-31: zhus pa bde ba'i tshig tu gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-33: 'di ni sangs rgyas rnam grol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204a-34: gdod skyes rdo rje gnod sbyin che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-0: dkon mchog gsum dang de bzhin @204b du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-1: nga la skyabs su 'gro bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-3: tshogs bdag tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-4: bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-7: bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-8: rdo rje gnod sbyin shes ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-9: bdag cag 'jig rten gsum po gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-10: gnod sbyin bsgo bas ci zhig bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-11: de nas rdo rje 'dzin khros nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-12: khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus te gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-13: de nas khro gnyer thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rjes su spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-15: g-yon pa bsnyems pa rgya bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-16: smin ma spyan bsdus pas dgod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-17: nam mkha' khyab pa'i dbyangs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-18: drag tu khros bcas pas smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-19: de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nye ba'i snying po sems can ma lus rgyal ba la ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-21: de nas snying po 'di phyung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-22: des rgyal bcu gcig bcings pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-23: dam tshig brtan pa 'dzin du bcug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-24: rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-25: lag na rdo rje 'dzin mchog byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-26: rdo rje ming ni byin nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-28: de nas rdo rje chen po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-29: mgon po yis ni gsol btab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-30: sems can kun la rjes ston pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-31: rtog pba 'di ni bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-32: rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:204b-33: dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-2: de yi dbus su bzhag bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-3: sngon po 'bar ba'i gzugs bzang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-4: zhal gyi mche bcung zad gtsigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-5: zhal ni khro dang bcas pas bzhad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-6: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-7: bsnyems bcas shas cher 'bar ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-9: rdo rje gsor ba mdzad la brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-10: de yi dngos ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-11: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-12: rdo rje mtshon cha mdung chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-13: ral gri zhags pa mtshon 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-14: mtshams su mda' dang kha tvam ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-16: rdo rje'i rigs ni sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-18: dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-19: thig bdun gyis ni yang dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-20: dang po rdo rje phyag rgya bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-21: gnyis pa sngags kyi lha mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-22: gsum par rdo rje rgyal po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-23: rdo rje lha mos yang dag bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-24: rdo rje chen mo sgeg mo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-25: bzhi pa glu mkhan ma la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-26: rgyal rigs gsol ka bran rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-27: khro bo rnams ni lnga ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-28: drug par rdo rje pho nya mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-29: gnod sbyin srin po king kar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-30: dbang phyug dam pa drag po sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-31: gtum po chen po 'dul bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205a-32: phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbyibs rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-0: mdor na ming po gsum la @205b sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-1: lha la sogs pa'i tshogs thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-2: legs par bri ba 'am gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-3: mtshams su lha mo rab bshad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-4: de rnams kyi ni sgo bus su'nga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-5: lcags kyu la sogs de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-6: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-7: go rims dag ni ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-8: cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-9: khros pas rdo rje gsor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-10: khro gnyer 'dzum dang bcas pas mdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-11: de nas khro zhing slob dpon che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-12: rdo rje can mchog rab zhugs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-13: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis sdigs mdzub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-14: h'um mdzad rab tu sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-15: bsnyems dang bcas pas rgyas gdab nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-16: de bzhin khro bas gdul ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-17: rdo rje 'chang chen rgyas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-18: gdug pa nyid la rab tu dgyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-19: de nas me tog blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-20: khros pas bdag po che la gtor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-21: rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ches //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-22: yang dag par ni dgug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-23: aom ma h'a badzra dzv'a la y'a na la rka ya hi dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-24: sarba badzra ku la pra be sha ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-25: sarba mu dram ga n'a bandha na tr'a ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-26: sarba sa ma yam s'a bha ya phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-27: sarba du sht'a na da ha ba tsam bha smim ku ru ma h'a kro dha aa ka ni badzra ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-29: de nas bcom ldan khro bo yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-30: rgyal po brtan pa che byon 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-31: rdo rje rigs la sogs pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-32: dngos grub thams cad gsol bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:205b-33: de nas h'um mdzad la sogs sgras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-2: gal te slob ma la sogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-3: snying gar dbab pa bra ba skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-4: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-5: phyag rgyas slob ma gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-6: bcug nas dang po'i sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-7: rang gi snying po brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-8: h'um h'um badzra pra ha ra ni phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-9: h'um badzra sh'u la y'a gri ni tri ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-10: ma tas h'um badzra ko she tstshinda ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-11: aom badzra aa ma la p'a she mata /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-16: rdo rje khro bo'i srung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-17: de nas 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya rdo rje don yod pa'i thogs pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-20: pha rol gnon pa rnams sems can mngon par rgyas gdab pa nus pa rnams bskul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-21: aom badzra gu hya siddha pa ra ma yo g'i shva ri hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-22: h'um badzra tsanda ho kha tr'am ga ma h'a badzra ka p'a la ya ma ku te ru lu ru lu ndi h'um badzra n'a r'a ya ni dzi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-23: h'um badzra ba ta ka dzi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-24: rdo rje khro bo'i mkha' 'gro ma lan gcig bzlas te dgod pa 'am bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-25: bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid kyi snying pos bzhugs su gsol na dngos grub thams cad la don yod pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-26: de nas dam tshig brjod par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-27: sems can rnams la bde phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-28: bstan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206a-29: gdug pa 'dul las bsod nams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-0: @206b de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-3: 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yang dag par 'dul ba nyid du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-4: de nas dbang bskur ba rgyas pa la sogs pa de bzhin du byas la rdo rje khro bo'i las bzhi pa la bslab par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-5: phyag rgya rnams kyis sems can rnams rgyas gdab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-9: gang la phyag rgya sbyar ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur na de ni gdug pa yin par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-10: de nas 'tsho bar byed pa'i phyag rgyas 'tsho bar byas la shin tu bsrung ba rab tu sbyar ba byas na shin tu bsrung ba yin pa'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-11: gdug pa rnams slar yang gnod par mi byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-12: de nas brtsams te slob ma bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-13: dkyil 'khor tshogs ni kun gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-14: mi tshugs pa dang mi sod par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-16: de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-17: ci bzhin sku ni dge 'dun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-18: rdo rje gsor zhing dang por ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-19: bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-20: 'bum tshang nas ni sems dpa' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-21: rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-22: rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:206b-24: gdug pa rnams ni rjes 'dul zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-0: @207a *// sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-1: 'jig rten gsum du legs snang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-3: de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying po sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-5: 'gro ba'am nyal bar byed pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-6: ci ltar de ltar 'bum bzlas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-10: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-12: 'gro ba rnams kyis mchod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-13: rang gi nye du rnams kyis bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-14: gdug pa thams cad rjes 'dul zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-16: bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-17: de nas phyag rgya'i dam pa sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-18: ci bzhin dus su phyag rgya bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-19: bdag nyid nges par bsregs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-20: ci srid nyid du khro chen po'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-22: de nas dam tshig sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-23: bdag ni thams cad gsad bya zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-24: brjod cing phyag na rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-25: dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-27: de nas las rnams sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-28: las rnams dam bsgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-29: rnam pa bzhir ni rab phyed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207a-30: thams cad bde ba'i phyir zos na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-0: rdo rje las nyid thob @207b par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-1: sgrub pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-2: de nas dngos grub sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-3: rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-4: las kyi rgyun ni dam pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-5: go rims bzhin du bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-11: gnyid log par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-29: gdon gyis zin du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-31: gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-32: thams cad dgug par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-35: gar byed du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-36: glu len du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-39: ha ha zhes dgod du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-47: nye bar 'degs pa bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-49: nga ro 'don par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-50: dur gzhug par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:207b-51: rang nyid brdeg par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-4: khro ba 'bar bar bya ba la ni khro bo'i gdon gyi phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-8: pra se na bsgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-9: bden pa smra bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-10: sgyu ma ston cing lan ston pa ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-11: dus tshigs kyi 'khor lo yongs su bzlog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-12: dus ma yin par shing las me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-13: 'bras bu smin par byed par ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-14: 'bru thams cad yang dag par ston par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-19: mkha' 'gro ma las thar bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-20: g-yul 'gyed pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-21: gzhan gyi dpung gzhom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-26: yongs su skyob par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-29: dbang du bya ba la ni khro bo chen po sna tshogs grub pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-30: lha la sogs thams cad ltung bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-31: klu gdon par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-32: gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-34: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad btul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-35: bdud kyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208a-36: ma mo rnams gdul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-0: gdug @208b pa'i tshogs rnam par gtor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-1: gdug pa rnams tshar gcod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-3: 'jigs pa med par yang dag par bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-4: nor bu bzang po dbang du bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-5: nor sbyin las nor bu thams cad dbrog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-6: rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-7: lha'i bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad dang rtse 'jo bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-8: brgya byin mnan nas bde sogs ma dbrog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-9: skem byed tshar gcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-10: tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-12: dbang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-13: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mnan nas dga' ba mo dbrog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-15: byang chub chen po bsgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-19: dam tshig gis bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-21: bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje khro bo chen po rgyal po dam pa'i dngos grub kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-23: lan gcig bzlas pas mchog grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-24: thog ma'i rtsa snying bzang lan gcig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-25: de yi 'og tu khro gnyer gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-26: bsgrub bya thams cad grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-27: dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-28: rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:208b-29: de nas ting 'dzin thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-0: @209a *// rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-1: spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-3: gdug pa thams cad 'dul don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-4: rang rig rin po che bskyed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi khre bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-6: thabs med pas na thabs yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-7: 'dod chags la sogs kun bsags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-8: ma dag sems can khams dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-9: de rnams la ni rab spyod par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-10: skyes bu mchog ni rnam par mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-11: mchog tu mi 'dul ba nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-12: sangs rgyas kyang ni mnga' mi mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-14: rang nyid bzang po la snyoms zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-15: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-16: gang la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thams cad nyid thugs su chud par gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-17: bsnyems pas padma g-yon pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-19: ci nus pa yi ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-20: rang bzhin gyis ni gzigs par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-22: tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209a-23: gnas kyi nyes pa sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-0: @209b khams gsum pa ni de bzhin dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-1: 'di la gzigs pa la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-2: rgyal ba rnams ni dbang por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-3: de yis rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-4: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-5: de nas sgom pa'i snying po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-6: dag par bsgoms pas sgom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-7: rdo rje 'chang ba chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-9: gser sbyangs ri yi dbang po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-10: rgyal po chen po dang mnyam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-11: bsnyems pa g-yon pa'i pad mchog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-12: g-yas pa mchog la rnam par gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-15: sangs rgyas la sogs 'byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-18: bzhugs pa rab tu bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-19: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-20: de la padma dge ba der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-21: 'gro ba thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-22: tshul gyis 'dul ba mdzad pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-23: padma'i rigs mchog ston pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-24: rgyal po rnams kyis gsol ba btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-25: de nas thams cad 'dul mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-26: shin tu dkar ba'i chos 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-27: rdo rje chos te rang rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-28: 'jig rten dbang pos bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-29: phyi ni dkyil 'khor chen po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-31: de yi dbus su spyan 'dzum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-32: 'jig rten dbang phyug dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:209b-33: gser sbyangs lta bu'i padma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-2: rgyal mtshan kun gyis rnam par spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-3: sangs rgyas sku mchog spyi bor bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-4: de yi ngos ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-5: sangs rgyas sku ni brgyad po bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-7: ting nge 'dzin la rnam par gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-8: 'jig rten dbang po'i gzugs logs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-9: sangs rgyas la sogs rigs kyi lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-10: zhi ba sred med bu tshangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-13: rta mgrin lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-14: chos kyi tshig gis spyan drang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-15: de nas padma'i snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-16: sarba ta th'a ga ta padma dza: h'um badzra padma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-20: de nas mtshams rnams su ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-21: h'um padme tsande shva ra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-22: he ma h'a bi shva padma ts'u rni siddha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-23: mata hr'i: padma padmo h'um aa ho padma aa shva /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-24: kra ma kra ma h'um dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-25: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-26: cho ga rgyas par byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-27: padma chen po me tog bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-28: ma yengs yid kyis phyag bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-30: las byung gzungs 'di brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-32: ma nu sa ni shuddha ma h'a satva /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-33: dh'a tu sa ma ya satva /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-35: tsitta me sarba dha mesh+ya badzri ni tsitta me sarba dha me sh+ya dzi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210a-36: gzugs kyi phyag rgya gsan nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-0: de nas @210b mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-1: chos kyi tshig gis legs spyan drangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa wa lo ke shva ra padma ha sta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-3: ya hi shr'i ghr'am ma me badzra mu dr'a aa gri sh+ya sa be sa ma yer ba dha bi shi ko mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-4: dza: h'um bam ho: sho dha ya sarba s'a dha ya pa ma me /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-5: ma h'a badzra dha ra stvam//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-6: de nas 'jig rten mgon po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-9: ting 'dzin cho ga nges par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-10: de nas de bzhin slob ma rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-11: gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-12: dngos grub thams cad sbyin pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-13: ye shes dag ni bslab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-15: sgrub pa chen po gdong nas byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-16: 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-17: go rims bzhin du bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-18: bud med rnams kyi nang zhugs pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-19: gdug pa rnams kyi nang chud pa'am //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:210b-22: dus dang stobs ni ji bzhin du //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:211a-8: las kyi las mchog phyag rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:211a-9: sgrub pa chen po'i cho ga'i rgyud do ////

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:211a-23: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:211a-38: nad med pa ma yin pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-5: thams cad mi 'gyur nam mkha' che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-7: kun dbang rin chen thams cad 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-8: ting nge 'dzin gyis rab byin brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-9: drag po chen po rab sad mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-10: chos rnams la ni rnam gzigs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-11: kun don dbang phyug gdod nas byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-12: nyi zla dang ni gza' skar can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-13: nam mkha' nyid du gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-14: de nas rin chen ting 'dzin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-15: nges par rdo rje can du brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-16: de nas nam mkha' rdo rje nyid //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-18: rdo rje rin chen rnams dge ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-19: nam mkha'i snying por yang dag gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-20: de nas bcom ldan thog ma 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-21: mdzod spu kun gyi gnas na bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-22: ting nge 'dzin la rnam gzigs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-23: 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-24: sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-25: de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-26: rdo rje rin chen de yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-27: kun rig kun gyis dbang bskur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-28: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-29: kun mchog kun la dbang bskur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212a-30: shis pa brjod pa 'di gsungs so //
