K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-1: de nas bzang pas 'di gsungs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-2: legs par shis brjod dbang bskur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-3: rdo rje rin chen che de las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-4: chos kyi gtso bor byung bar gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-5: byung nas 'gro ba thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-6: ci rigs par ni kun dbang bskur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-7: rdo rje kun gyis dbang skur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-8: slar yang dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-9: bde gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-10: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-11: shin tu dbang phyug chen po'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-12: dngos grub gsol ba'i rtog pa gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-13: dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-14: nam mkha'i 'khor lo nam mkha'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-15: nyi ma zla ba skar ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-16: gza' rnams kyis ni brgyan pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-17: de dbus nam mkha'i snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-18: bdag nyid thams cad dgyes pa gzhag /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-22: g-yas pas nor chen rab stsol ba //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-25: dbang bskur ba dang gter nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:212b-26: nor bu chen po bla med dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:213a-6: nor bu'i khu tshur gyis bzhugs la //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:213a-8: bzhugs nas nam mkha' mkhas pa yi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:213a-20: de nas nor bu khu tshur can gyi lcags kyus dgug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:213a-21: aom bhu r'a ya h'i dza /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:213a-22: bhu ba pra bi sha h'um sva /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:213a-29: me tog bcas pa mchog gis gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:213a-30: bcug nas de nyid mchog snying po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:213a-31: bden pa lan gcig brjod du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:213a-32: de nas 'byor pa'i mchog brtag pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:213b-1: bde bar gshegs pa bzhin du 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:213b-2: de nas de phyir sgrub pa bshad //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:213b-4: dpag med zlos pas bsgrub bya zhing //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-0: @215a *// bdud rtsi nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-2: zhe sdang drag po'i ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-3: gti mug khyab 'jug brtan mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-4: 'jig rten gsum po byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-5: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-8: chos min bsten pas ngan song gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-9: 'dod chags sbrang rtsir byed par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-10: zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-11: gti mug don ni sgrub byed ces //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-14: 'jig rten gsum du rab tu bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-15: nga ni 'dod pa gcig pu nyid //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-17: de nas gsum po 'di yi mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215a-30: 'jig rten gsum mchog dbang phyug che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-1: rang gi rang grub phyir rab phul //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-6: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-7: de yi nang ma nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-8: dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-9: sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal byed nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-10: bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-11: go rims dag ni ci bzhin du //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-26: dam tshig mchog ni sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-27: gal te khyod kyis rtse gsum bcag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-28: snying po snod min la smras sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-29: ji skad smras pa'i chos rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-31: snying stobs rdul dang mun pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-32: tshangs pa drag po g-yung drung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-33: ming po gsum po 'di nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-34: nam yang brnyes par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-35: nga zhig 'di rnams sgom pa slob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-36: yang dang yang du zhugs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:215b-37: dkyil 'khor mchod par bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-2: rang gi phyag rgya bslabs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-3: de la gar gyi mchod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-4: 'dod yon dam pa lnga rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-5: rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-7: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-8: sems can kun rje ston mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-9: 'jig rten gsum phyung don grub tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-10: slar yang sring mo rnams 'byin mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-11: kun tu chags dang zhe sdang rmongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-12: brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-13: dga' dang phrag dog bud med ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-14: rab tu grags pa'i grub kun ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-15: gang zhig 'jig rten kun tu bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-16: tshogs kun gyis mchod lha mo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-17: zhi dang 'jigs ma de bzhin gsar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-18: grub pa dang ni zhi bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-19: phyi rol sems can phan phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-20: rtogs don khong du chud bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-21: de rnams kyi ni snying po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-22: dkyil 'khor de bzhin dam tshig bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-24: dkyil 'khor bzang po sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-25: srad bu gsum gyis dkyil 'khor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-26: mtshams kyi thig ni ka ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-27: bzhi po dag gi rim pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-28: de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-29: bzhi po dag ni de bzhin bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-30: rang gi snying po bzhi po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-31: rang gi sgor ni phyogs par gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-32: skal bzang lag na ral gri mtshon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216a-33: sring mo phub can zhi ba mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-0: phag mo lag na @216b gter nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-1: grub pa mo ni bsnyems dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-2: de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-3: kun nas de bzhin zhugs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-4: sring mo rnams kyi rang gi rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-5: go rims dag ni ci bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-6: zhugs nas de bzhin cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-7: spos la sogs pas mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-8: de nyid gsang ba rab bsgrub pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-9: kun nas dgug pa dag tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-10: aom sum bha ga ra ti shtha ma ya h'i bh'u ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-11: raksha sa m'a ti shtha ma ya hi bhur bhu ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-12: ba ra h'a aa mi r+ya ta ma ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-13: siddhi ke siddhi sa ma ya hi a'i mam ke m'u dra bhi:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-15: de nas lus ni thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-16: de bzhin du ni legs bzhugs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-17: de nas phyag rgya bcings bstan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-18: gsang ba mchog 'di brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-19: gal te gsang nyid ma bsrungs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-20: gang zhig sems can don zhugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-21: gang yang dkyil 'khor sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-22: de rnams khyed kyis bsad par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-23: chos dang ldan la bdud rtsi nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-24: chos min pas ni dug pas lhags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-25: ci snyed pa dang dus ci bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-26: yul rnams nye bar bsten pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-27: phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-28: ci bde bar ni rtag tu mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-30: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-31: sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-32: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-33: sgrub bdag ni rab sgrub nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:216b-34: 'dod chags sogs dug gzhig phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-2: zhe sdang las byung klu yi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-4: de la snying po ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-6: phu:/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-7: srad bu thams cad yang dag bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-8: sgo khyud klu yi gdengs ka mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-9: mtshams kyi rtse mchog mjug ma mdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-10: de yi dbus su klu rgyal ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-11: mtha' yas gdengs ka bcas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-12: klu yi rigs ni brgyad po dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-13: shes rab can gyis kun tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-14: de nas khros dang zhugs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-15: klu 'dzin pa yi shugs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-16: zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-17: sbrul gyi gdengs kas dgug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-18: aom hr'i: aa n'i la dza ba be ga pri thi bhin di ra she sh'a ya hi phu: sarba n'a ga ku l'a n+y'a na ya phu:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-19: sa ma ya pra be sha ya phu:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-20: sarb'a na s'a dha ya phu:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-21: ta ta sa sarba n'a ga pu tra ka phu:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-22: de ltar byas na legs par bzhugs shing dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-23: de nas slob dpon gyis dug med par bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-24: de nas brtsams te dug thams cad zos pas kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-25: nor rgyas dang rtse bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-26: dug thams cad sbar ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-28: de nas mna'i snying po sbyin par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-29: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217a-31: gal te bden pa las 'das na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-0: khyod @217b kyis glog la brnyas mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-1: ser ba bzlog par mi bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-2: gal te dngos grub la dga' na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-3: ci nas sbrul ni gsad mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-5: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-6: sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-7: sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-8: gdon gyi dkyil 'khor phyung ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-9: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-10: nyes byas kyis ni dug nyid 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-11: gdon dang rims dang sdig pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-12: dmyal ba yang ni 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-13: de nas gdug pa'i snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-15: ham/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-16: gdon gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-17: de'i dbus dang por gdon la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-18: cho ga rgyas pa gdon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-19: de nas bshad pa bzhin zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-20: dgod cing myur bar dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-21: rdo rje 'dzin pa zhug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-22: khros pas rkang pa g-yon pas mnye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-23: de nas gdon dang rims sdig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-24: dmyal ba thams cad rtag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-25: sdig pa chen po byed pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-27: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-28: sdug bsngal thams cad las 'don pa'i rgyud do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-29: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-30: kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-31: sems can kun don rab bsgrub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-32: dkyil 'khor thams cad gsungs pa yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:217b-33: de la snying po ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-2: kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-3: gzugs kun gyis ni kun mchog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-4: dbang phyug dam pa mdzad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-5: gsang ba chen po lnga yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-6: gang tshe 'dul bar ma gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-7: de tshe sna tshogs cher mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-9: de nas gang phyir dkyil 'khor che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-10: dam pa yang dag bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-11: kun mchog sna tshogs rnam par rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-12: kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-13: dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-14: de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' rab bzhag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-16: rdo rje lha mo tshogs dkyil 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-17: de yi ngos ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-18: kun mchog bdag po'i sku rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-19: rdo rje mchog bcas mtshan ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-20: rang gi rigs kyis bskor ba gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-21: rgyal po rdo rje sred med bu'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-23: khyab bdag rdo rje can rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-24: gtum ma dbang rdo rje mdung bsnams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-25: rdo rje pad byung padma can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-26: rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs gzugs ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-27: nam mkha'i snying po 'dod pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-28: rdo rje dang bcas me tog mtshon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-29: dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-30: rigs kyi lha mo bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-31: rdo rje dpal mo dkar mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-32: rdo rje sgrol ma mkha' rdo rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218a-33: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'di rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-0: @218b aom badzra n'a r'a ya na tsitshanda pra ti ha na badzra tsakra te na ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-1: bha ga wa na badzra ta th'a ga ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-4: badzra ta th'a ga ta h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-5: badzra kro dha ma h'a yo gi ni ga ne shva ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-6: ma h'a badzra ku lo gra ba ne ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-7: bha ga b'ana badzra tsandre shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-10: bha ga b'an badzra lo ke shva re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-11: ma h'a pra me sid dhya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-14: he badzra ku su m'a yu dha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-15: sarba k'a ma me s'a dha ya ho: bha ga b'ana badzra a'a k'a sha gargha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-17: badzra a'a k'a sha garbha aa she sham mu dr'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-18: na mo ye na s'a dhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-19: bha ga ba te pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a yu dha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-20: tstshindha tstshindha badzra ni tsa kre na te na sa tye na p'a pa ka na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-22: shr'i shru ti smri ti bi dza ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-24: aom badzra goo ri ma h'a bidya tree lo kya bi dza ye shva ri badzra kro dha aa gni sa ma ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-25: badza dha ri na mo stu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-28: le li t'a li badzra ka mu ka ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-29: badzra sa ma ya na mo ye na s'a dhya na bha ga ba te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-30: buddha bo dhi rbuddha dh'a ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-31: badzra dharma pra yo ge na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-32: te na sa tye na siddha m'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-33: aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-35: aom karma badzri ni siddhya bi shuddhya dhya ba ha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-37: yo ge na si da dha m'am pa ra ma ka re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-39: ga ga na bi shud dhe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-40: sarba ma pa pri ya pa ri p'u ra ni sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-41: phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-42: rdo rje 'dzin pa rab spyod gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:218b-43: lha dbang dang ni ma mo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-0: @219a *// 'jig rten skyong rnams dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-1: tshogs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-2: rol mo che bcu rdung byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-4: sgo dang mtshams su'ang de bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-5: sgo rnams kun tu 'jug pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-6: rang gi phyag rgya rab tu gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-7: dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-8: dang po'i sbyor bas 'jug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-9: de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-10: dang po lcags kyu che de nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-11: snying po 'di ni brjod byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-13: aom ma h'a su kha badzra satva siddhi h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-14: sarba ta th'a ga t'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-15: sa ma ya aa karsha ya dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-16: badzra ku la d'i pam da ma ye d'a pra be sha ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-17: sarba lo ke shva re pra be sha ya sa ma ya bandha na bam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-18: sa ma ya sarba ratna d'i pam ma h'a ma ni r'a dz'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-21: de nas gsang ba chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-22: snying po bzang po 'di brjod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-23: rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-24: 'khor lo thams cad dang bcas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-25: bkug cing rab tu bcug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-26: bden pas bcings te dbang du byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-27: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog thams cad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-29: de nas go rims ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-30: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-31: dngos grub de rnams nyid kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-32: thams cad kyang ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219a-33: bde ba thams cad mi 'gyur gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-0: bde ba @219b chen po zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-1: rdo rje 'di ni bsgrub la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-3: de ltar sna tshogs pa'i don sbyang ba'i don gyi cho ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-4: 'gro ba dpag tu med pa 'dul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-5: mtha' med cing sna tshogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-6: mnyam pa med pa'i phul du byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad 'dzin pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-8: rgyal ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-9: srid pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa gsungs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-10: dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-11: rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun gyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-12: de nas gsang ba ras bris kyi cho ga gsungs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-13: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-14: dam tshig mchog gi sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-15: bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-16: dngos grub kun gyis lus byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa mchog chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-18: rin chen rgyal po sogs kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-19: bde ba chen po chags pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-20: glu dang rol mo rjes chags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-21: bla med dga' ba chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-22: mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-23: dga' ba chen po dpal gyi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-24: rang gi bzhugs gnas mchog de la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-25: rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:219b-26: mi 'gyur mchog tu yang dag bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-2: rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-3: kun tu bzang po 'khor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-4: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-5: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-6: rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-7: kun mchog chags pa chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-8: dngos grub dbang phyug rjes grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-9: glu dang rol mo thog mtha' med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-10: mchog ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-12: h'um/ de nas 'di ni gsung tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-13: rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-14: gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-15: phyag rgya'i lha mo byung bar gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-16: rtag tu chags dang dngos grub che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-17: rnam rgyal dbang phyug lhag pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-18: phyag rgya dam pa bzhi pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-19: sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-20: de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-21: kun mchog so sor rtog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-22: dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-23: kun mchog rnam rgyal mthong ba 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-24: thams cad dbang phyug mchod pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-25: dngos grub rnams dang phun tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-26: dga' ba dag dang bdag po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-27: rdo rje lha mo thog mtha' med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220a-30: de nas mchog tu gsad ba'i mi rnams ni dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba'i dam tshig gi 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-0: dga' ba chen po dpal don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig gi rdo @220b rje ki li ki li dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-1: dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-2: dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-3: 'di rnams gsang ba'i mtshan dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-4: mkhas pas gang zhig dang pas brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-5: de ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-6: dngos grub kun bdag bdag por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-7: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gseng bas gsungs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-8: de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-9: dngos grub shin tu brtag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-10: sdig pa che la dga' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-11: sgrub pa gang zhig ma grub kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-12: rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-13: de dag kyang ni myur du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-15: de bzhin lo ni re re la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-16: ci mngon mngon 'dod bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-17: ci rnyed pa dang ci bde bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-18: ras la bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-19: kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-20: gang zhig bris par gyur na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-21: mchog tu rtag pa'i thar pa thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-22: bzhad pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-24: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-25: sna tshogs rgyan dang na bza' ljang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-26: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-27: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i mchog 'chang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-28: g-yon pa dril bu mchog bsnyems pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:220b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-0: @221a *// de yi logs na bzhugs pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-2: rab tu dga' dang bde ba'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-3: gsang ba chen po dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-4: dang po padma ltar dkar dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-5: gzhan ni pa la sha ltar dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-7: rdo rje bsnyems ma ser po 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-8: dang po dang ni gnyis pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-9: g-yas kyi logs la brten pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-10: gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-11: g-yon gyi logs su bzhugs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-12: rdo rje ki li ki la ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-13: dbus kyi rang lha dgyes par spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-14: de yi logs la rdo rje che'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-15: mda' ni gsor ba la brtson pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-16: bsnyems pa'i phyag gis yongs 'khyud pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-17: chu srin rgyal mtshan bsgreng dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-18: de yi logs na bzhad dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-19: mchod pas bdag po la lta ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-20: sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-21: thams cad spyan gyi phyag rgya gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-22: rang la bdag ni thugs gtad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-23: zur du blta zhing bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-24: ras ris 'di ni mthong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-25: rtag pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-26: mchod pa dang ni brtags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-27: mchog tu dga' ba'i thar pa thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-28: ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221a-29: de ltar mchog tu dga' ba rab tu 'dod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-0: mchog tu dga' ba dag pa dam @221b pa'i dngos grub 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-1: gsal zhing rnam par rgyal ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-2: rgyal ba'i ras ris chen po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-3: thams cad gzigs pa rnams mchod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-4: chen po yis ni dpal 'dir rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-5: 'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-6: mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-7: rnam par dben pa'i khang par ram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-8: yang na skyed mos tshal sogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-9: de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-10: ras ris rgyal po sogs kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-11: dril bu dang bcas yid dga' ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-12: bla re phul bas mchog gyur ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-13: rdo rje glu yi mchod tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-14: glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-15: me tog spos sogs rab sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-16: mar me'i sbyor bas yang dag mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-17: khang pa sum brtsegs dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-18: mchog gi gsang ba bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-19: yang na bdag nyid kho na mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-20: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-21: de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-22: rang nyid kyis ni rtag zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-23: rdo rje kun 'chang slob dpon ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-25: rang nyid khrus byas dri zhim bsgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-26: ji snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-27: sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-28: phreng bcas kha ni dri zhim pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-29: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-30: me tog spos dang dri snod bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-31: rdo rje glu ni 'di dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:221b-32: gar byed grong khyer 'jug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-0: de la mchog tu gsang ba'i @222a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-1: dpal dam tshig gsum 'jug la mchog tu gsang ba'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-2: dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-3: thar pa'i grong du bcom ldan bde chen 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-4: mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-5: dza: h'um bam ho: rab tu grub par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-6: rab tu zhugs te g-yon pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-7: rdo rje'i mig gis mgon la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-8: g-yon pa bsnyems pa cung zad bzhad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-9: bstod cing mdzes pa'i mig btsums pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-10: de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa dpal dam tshig gsum gyi phyag 'tshal ba'i me tog gi sil ma dor ba'i mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-11: mchog tu bde ba'i sems ni rol bar ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-12: sgeg pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-15: mgon po snyim pa'i me tog bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-16: de nas me tog sil ma dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-18: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-19: ldan pa'i don gsal sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222a-20: de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-0: aom/ sangs rgyas kun ldan rin chen mchog gis @222b brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-1: lha yi cod pan dang bcas khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-2: rdo rje 'chang bdag rin chen dbang bskur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' sa ma ya stvam ham//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-4: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-5: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-6: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-7: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-8: rdo rje la sogs thob bzung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-10: rdo rje thams cad 'dzin rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-11: rdo rje can gyis byin brlabs 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-12: zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyis bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa gcig pu'i cho ga mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-13: de nas 'dir bsgrub bshad bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-14: dngos grub shin tu brtag pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-15: gang gis sgrub po dam pa dang; ;sdig chen byed pa rnams kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-16: rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-17: ma grub rnams kyang grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-20: dang po'i sems dpa' bzhugs gsol nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-21: de yi mdun du cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-22: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-23: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-24: thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:222b-25: bdag byin rlabs sogs bsgrub rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-0: de la ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad @223a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-1: dgug pa'i rgyud ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-2: rang lhag lha yi sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-3: thams cad dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-4: yan lag mchog gi rol bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-5: gar bya zhing ni dgug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-7: dza: mchog dang po'i rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba rab rtogs rab tu dga' ba khyod bdag sangs rgyas so sor rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-8: h'um mchog rdo rje las ni mchog tu mi 'gyur zad med srid pa bar bsgrub bde dang yid bde dam tshig bdag la deng grub mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-9: bam mchog bdag gi sku 'dzin rnal 'byor thams cad rnam rgyal bsgreng ba rab mchog dag pa bde bar 'gyur ba'i padma'i rgyal po kye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-10: ho: rab mchog ni mchog gi dngos grub dam pa thams cad dbang phyug dam par bdag gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-11: rtag par bdag 'phel nam mkha'i snying po khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-12: hu lu hu lu'i sgrub pas dbab par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-13: dam tshig chen pos yang dag dgug pa khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dam tshig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-15: rab tu dga' ba mchog bdag po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223a-16: de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga ji ltar yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-0: rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji @223b bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-1: mchod pa kun mchog sku rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-2: mchod de sngags pas glu rnams kyi sgra rol mo'i rnam 'phrul gyis rjes mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog gi dngos grub kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-4: thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-6: bde ba chen po gsal mthong bdag la brtan gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-7: myur du so sor mkhyen nas rab tu 'dod pa bsgrubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-8: de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa chen po ji ltar yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-9: rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-10: phyag rgya kun gyis byin brlabs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-11: de nyid chen po'i mchog gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-12: rang nyid bsgrubs te snying po bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba chen po dam pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-15: aom/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-16: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-17: sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-18: rdo rje sems dpal bdag grub mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-19: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:223b-20: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-2: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-3: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-4: 'dod chags kyis ni rjes chags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-5: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-6: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-7: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-8: gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-9: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-10: byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-11: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-12: dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-13: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-14: rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-15: dpal mchog dang po'i bcom ldan khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-16: gang gis don dang glu yis bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-17: de ni dngos grub kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-18: dbang phyug chen po nyid grub 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-19: zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i glu chen po mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-20: dngos grub cho ga 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-21: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-22: kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-23: dbang phyug nyid ni rab bsgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-24: kun nas 'od zer ston sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-25: so sor ston pa'i rmad byung rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-26: rdo rje'i tshig gis rang lha las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-27: ngo mtshar gyur rnams mthong bar gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224a-28: rtog pa kun gyi sna tshogs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-0: dngos grub dbang phyug bde @224b rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-1: myur du rang gis byin brlabs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-2: rdo rje slob dpon gyis thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-3: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dang pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-4: de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyis lha thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ci ltar yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-5: rang lha rnal 'byor ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-6: lha kun bdag nyid sku rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-7: rang lha'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-8: rang lha nyid bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-9: de nas mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba dam pa bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-12: yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su grub pa ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-13: rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-14: rdo rje kun mchog sku rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-15: glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-16: rdo rje nyid kyis rjes chags 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-17: rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-18: dbyangs kyi rtsa ba rnam sad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-19: glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-20: dril bu nyid kyis rjes su brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-21: rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-22: sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:224b-23: glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-2: 'di yis rtog pa thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-3: rdo rje 'bebs pas rab sad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-4: rang gi lha yi dam tshig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-6: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi glu chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-7: rol mo'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-8: de nas de rjes gnas ci bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-9: ji snyed pa ni ci bde bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-10: me tog spos kyis mchod nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-11: khang pa 'am skyed mos tshal sogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-12: bdag nyid ci 'dod rab bsgrubs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-13: ci snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-14: sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-15: me tog phreng bcas kha dri zhim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-18: dang po'i 'khor lo de mdun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-19: cho ga bzhin du bzhugs gsol nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-20: rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-21: rdo rje dril bu rab sad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-22: thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-23: bdag byin rlab sogs 'grub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-24: sngon du lan gcig bsgrub byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-25: de nas de rjes ci 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-26: ci 'dod ci spyod ci smra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-27: thams cad bza' zhing thams cad byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225a-29: rab tu dgod dam smra ba 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-0: ji bzhin de bzhin @225b de dang der //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-1: ji 'dod par ni de bzhin gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-2: gsang ba mchog gi 'khor lo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-3: me tog sogs kyis mchod nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-4: ji bzhin du ni rjes bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-7: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-8: rga shi med pa'i gtso bor 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' grub chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-10: phyag rgya kun gyi dbang phyug bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-11: rdo rje kun 'dzin rgyal ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-12: rdo rje mtshon cha thams cad 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-13: mi thub pa dang mi sod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-14: thams cad byed cing kun gyi rten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-15: sems can kun gyi rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-16: tshar gcod rjes su bzung bar nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-17: kun mchog rjes su chags pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-18: 'dod pa grub pa bde ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-19: kun las rnam rgyal grub 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-20: kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-21: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-22: dbang phyug chen po'i go 'phang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-23: rgyal po rdo rje kun 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-25: de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba padma'i ra ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-26: mchog tu gsang ba grub pa'i bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-27: mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas gang zhig rjes su bsten pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-28: mchog gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams myong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:225b-29: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-2: gsang ba chen po dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-3: dngos grub thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-5: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-6: gsang ba mchog ni dgyes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-9: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-10: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-12: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid; ;rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-14: lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-16: de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba padma ra ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-17: mchog tu bsngags pa bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-18: mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba gang zhig rjes su bsten pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-19: mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid des nyams myong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226a-20: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-0: dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil @226b 'khor mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i slob ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su gzung ba bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-2: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-3: de la dang po kho nar re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i sngags 'di lan gcig brjod pas sems bskyed du bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-4: aom sarba yo ga tsittam aud p'a da y'a mi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-5: 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-6: bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyag rgya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du yang rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba yang gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-7: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-8: mchog tu bskyed par byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-9: snying gar rdo rje rab bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-10: su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-11: snying pos rdo rje ci bder bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-12: 'di yis rdo rje bskul ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-14: de nyid bskul bas myur du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-15: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-16: kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:226b-18: zhes bya ba'i mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-2: gos kyis gdong ni g-yogs pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-4: slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-5: ci 'dod dngos grub sems dpa' yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-6: slob ma me tog 'dor du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-7: phyag rgya gang la de babs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-8: de de'i lha mo bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-9: de nas gdong g-yogs dkrol byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-10: rnam pa kun gyi yon blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-11: sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-12: dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-13: de la rdo rje chen po mna'i chus dbang bskur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-15: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-16: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-17: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-19: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-20: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-21: skye bo 'dus pa'i nang na gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-22: dad pa med pas bzhad gad smod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-23: ces bya ba mna' bsgag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-24: de la sangs rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-25: rdo rje chu yis dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227a-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a sa ma ya aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi ma h'a badzra dha ra zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis rdo rje lag tu sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-0: 'di ni sangs rgyas @227b thams cad nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-1: rdo rje 'chang gi rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-2: rdo rje 'chang gi brtul zhugs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-3: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-5: byang chub mchog gi sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-6: yongs su mi spang rtag tu bsgrubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-7: shin tu gsang bde 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-8: aom badzra karma b'a dhi dhi shr'i badzra n'a ma sid dhi sa ma ya stam bh'ur bhu ba sva:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-9: gang la rdo rje'i ming btags pa de la kye'i sgra dang por sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-10: de'i ming de yang ji srid byang chub snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang ming du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-11: de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-12: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-14: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid; ;rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-15: ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid bshad par byas nas rdo rje sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-16: 'di bcom ldan 'das srid pa'i bdag po dam pa kun gyi mchog dbang phyug gi dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang dag par stsol bar mdzad pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-17: srid pa rang bzhin nyid kyis dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-18: rang bzhin gyis ni srid bral byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:227b-19: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-1: pa mchog ni mdzad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-2: mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa ni dril bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya ba 'am lha sgrub pa'i tshe dkrol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-4: de nas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu sad pa'i phab pa rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-5: rdo rje thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-6: rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-8: rab tu dang bar byed pa zhes bya bar bsgrub par 'gyur ro; ;de nas srid pa dag pa'i thabs kyi mchog rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po dam tshig la rtag tu bsten par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-9: de la 'di ni deng khyod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-10: srid bde shin tu myur ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-11: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-12: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-13: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-14: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-15: ci 'dod par ni brten bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-16: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-17: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i yang chen po dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-0: de bzhin gshegs @228b pa kun gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-1: 'da' pa ru ni mi mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-2: phyag rgya dam tshig ces ni bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-3: yid kyi sku ni brtan phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-4: zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-5: de la 'di brjod par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-6: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-7: mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-8: ji srid mtshungs med sems can don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-9: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-10: gsang ba dam pa dam tshig thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-11: bsod nams byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-12: rtag tu dngos grub kun dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-13: sems can don ni byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-14: dam tshig 'dis ni mchog sgrub cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-15: ci bde bar ni bsgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-16: nyes pa spyad kyang sdig kun gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-17: rnam pa kun tu gnod mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-19: kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-20: thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-21: kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-22: las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-24: bdag gzhan thams cad rgyas btab pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-25: yang na bsgrub bya kun la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-26: don yod mchog tu grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-27: rnal 'byor thams cad rjes sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:228b-28: dpal ldan sdug bsngal kun 'phrog byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-0: zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang @229a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-1: ba bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-2: rdo rje la sogs thob 'dzin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-3: dngos po kun gyi bde ba kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-4: phab pas rdo rje slob ma yis; ;dkyil 'khor du ni nyams su myong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-5: de nas thams cad gzengs ba stod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-7: rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-8: de bzhin gshegs ni lung bstan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-9: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung bstan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-10: sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-11: gzengs bstod pa yi gang lung bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-12: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-13: rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-14: aom 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-16: srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-17: srid pa'i ngan 'gro las khyod bton //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-18: he badzra na ma: ta th'a ga ta si ddhi sa ma ya stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-20: gang la gzengs bstod pa 'di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-21: phyag rgya chen po por lung bstan pa mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas byas pa de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229a-22: rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229b-0: mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @229b pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229b-2: gzengs bstod pa 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229b-3: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'di dang; sngags kyi stobs la dad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229b-4: de nas ci lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba spyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa ci snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjes su chags pa 'dir dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229b-9: rjes su bsgrub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad brtan par 'gyur ba nying kyis; 'di brtan par 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun tu khyab pa nyid kyis kun tu zhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229b-10: nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rgya che ba nyid kyis 'dir rab tu bzhugs shing; legs par rab tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de dang de dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:229b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig la rag las pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la lhag par dmigs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di yin no zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs @230a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon gyis dam tshig gi mgrin gcig tu khyed rnams la dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pa yin te dad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-4: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-5: mthong ba dang ni zhugs pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-6: sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-7: khyed rnams der nyid legs par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-8: bde chen theg pa 'di las ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-9: slar 'chi ba ni yod min te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-10: mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-11: cis kyang mi 'jigs rol bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-12: srid pa'i sdug bsngal ldog pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-13: srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-14: ston pa mchog tu gyur pa khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-15: srid pa shin tu grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-16: dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-17: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-18: sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-19: dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-20: gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-21: sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-22: byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-23: phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-24: dam pa'i chos ni mi smod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-25: nam yang btang bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-26: mi shes pa 'am rmongs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-27: des ni smad par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-28: rang gi bdag nyid yongs spangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-29: dka' thub rnams kyis gdung mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230a-30: ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-0: 'di ni ma @230b byon rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-1: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-2: nam yang yongs su brang mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-3: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-5: sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-6: slob dpon la ni gang smod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-7: des ni sangs rgyas kun smad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-8: rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-9: rims dang dug dang sbyar dug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-10: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtses pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-11: gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-12: bsad nas sems can dmyal bar ltung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-13: de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-14: rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-15: dge ba rab tu mi spyoms pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-16: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-17: bla ma la ni gus bcas yon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-18: rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-19: des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-21: rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-22: sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-23: rang srog gis rtag bsten bya na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-24: longs spyod g-yo ba smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-25: gang gis bskal ba bye bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-26: grangs med par ni rnyed dka' ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-27: sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-28: tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-29: rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-30: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-31: rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul; ;'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-32: de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-33: rtag tu sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:230b-34: de byin bsod nams tshogs yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-2: de phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-3: deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-4: rang byung dam tshig lha dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-5: deng khyod 'gyur bar the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-6: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-7: kun gyi deng khyod dbang bskur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-8: khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-9: rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-10: de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-11: grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-12: khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-13: deng 'dir thob pa the tshom med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-14: ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-16: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bden pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-18: slob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-19: phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-20: byang chub sems dang lhan cig bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-21: sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtogs bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-23: de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231a-24: gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyi bdag nyid thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu nyid kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-0: phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi phyir nges pa'i phung po @231b la rnam par gnas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa nyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-1: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rjes su rtogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-3: de nas thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig gi slob dpon gyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag sbyor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-5: rnal 'byor kun dang rjes sbyor ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-6: sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-7: mkhas pas mchog tu brtag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-9: de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-10: gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyi bdag nyid thams cad 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig yongs su gzung ba gdon mi za ba nyid kyi phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi rjes su sgrub pas mchog gi dngos grub rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du de dag rtogs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-13: de'i phyir gnas skabs thams cad du yang ci nus pas sdug bsngal dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-14: yid mi bde ba thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa khyed rnams kyis rang gi bdag nyid thams cad kho na rjes su bsrung zhing gsad par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:231b-15: ci snyed pa'i longs spyod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-0: nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams @232a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-1: cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig gi sbyor bas yang dag par mchod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-4: bdag nyid la ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par brtson pa de bzhin du gzhan rnams la na tshod bskyed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-6: phyi rol mu stegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-7: nyan thos pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas lus 'di shin tu gsang ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-9: ngag ni shin tu mi smra bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-10: sems ni shin tu 'gog pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-11: gang gis kyang khyod kyi lus ngag yid gsum gyi rdo rje rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dpal la rang gi dam tshig gi bla na med pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtogs par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba yang gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-12: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-13: cis kyang mi 'jigs rol bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-15: sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-16: ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bden pas gsungs ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la dgongs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-18: de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-19: rang gi dam tshig mi zad pa bde ster bsten par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232a-20: de ni 'gro la myur bde rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-0: rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid @232b du rtogs par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-1: de nas ro dang bza' dang spyod pa gar dang glu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-2: rol mo'i mchod sogs kyis ni mgon mchod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-3: rdo rje bla ma chen pos de phul nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-4: rang dang gzhan dag ci 'dod mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-5: myos byed myos bral btung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-6: ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-7: glu dang rol mo'i cho ga sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-8: ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-9: rang gsang cho gas blangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-10: glu dang rol mo gar rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-11: sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i rol mo sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-13: bud med sogs dang ldan pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-14: rang gi slob ma dang bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-15: ci 'dod pa yi longs spyod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-16: mchod pa byas pas myu ba 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-17: ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-18: de la gsang ba'i cho ga'i glu'i khyad par ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-20: h'um/ bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-24: dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-28: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rgyal po nam mkha'i snying po yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-30: rang gsang snying po'i glu dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-31: yi ge lnga pos bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-32: rang gsang cho gas blangs pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-33: mchog tu gshegs pa kun gyi yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-34: de nas mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu yi mchod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:232b-35: rdo rje dril bu mnyam sogs bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-0: @233a *// rnam par dben par rol mo dkrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-1: rang gsang cho gas glu blangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-2: gsang ba'i rol mos rab tu bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-3: de nas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-4: 'dzin pa dang bcas gzung ba che'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-5: gar ni rab tu byas nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-7: yongs su bskor bas rab mchod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-8: de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-9: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-10: rtog pa thams cad rnam 'phrul ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-11: gtam rgyud phyag mtshan phyag rgya yis; ;gang zhig gar de rol mo yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-12: gser ram yang na dngul dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-13: de bzhin shing las byas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-14: rang gi lha yi gdong rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-15: grub pa'i phyag rgyas gar rnams bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-16: dkyil 'khor gang dang gang brten pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-17: phyag rgya sna tshogs mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-18: slob ma'i tshogs ni de dang de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-19: bzla zhing thams cad mchog tu gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-20: sna tshogs cho ga 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-21: sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-23: rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-24: rims dang gdon dang dug dang nad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-26: bdud dang gsod par byed pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233a-28: dngos grub dag ni phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-0: dga' ba de bzhin bdag po @233b rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-1: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-3: zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-4: de nas phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa lhag pa'i lha thams cad re re'i mchog gsang ba 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mngon par brjod nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis byas pa'am de las gzhan ci 'dod pa'i glu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-5: rol mo rnams kyis rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-6: de re zhig thog ma kho nar bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-7: thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab dga' dam tshig ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-9: bde ba chen po brtan zhing mtho ba gsal gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-10: so sor rtogs nas mngon du phyogs shing myur sgrubs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rigs kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-13: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-14: rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:233b-15: rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-0: de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu @234a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-1: gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-3: h'um/ rdo rje mda' gzhu dang bcas khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-4: rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig dpal khyod 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-5: kha tv'am 'jig dus rdo rje khyod la 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-6: rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa'i dpal khyod 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-7: de na padma'i rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-8: la lar skye bo ma rungs pa yi srog 'phrog byed pa shin tu drag po'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-9: la lar 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-10: la lar padma'i gdan gyi shin tu zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur ba med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-11: la lar shin tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pa'i dam tshig padma'i rgyal po bdag bsgrubs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-12: de nas nor bu'i rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-13: dbang bskur thams cad dbang phyug dam pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-14: yang dag bsgrubs shing mi zad gter gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-15: kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal bsgreng ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-16: rdo rje rin chen dpal bdag legs mchod 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-17: de nas ming po gsum gyi ni bh'ur bhu ba sva:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-18: de nas sring mo bzhi rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234a-20: de nas klu'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-0: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon @234b chen po lag na rdo rje'i sdig pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-1: sarba mam ga mandal mi dam badzar dha r'a tra ma bi ma ra dbi ser bha [?] sud s'a da ya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-4: pa ce bha smim ku ru kro dha h'um ka ra ma nitri na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-5: de nas thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-6: la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong gi 'od kyi sku ni rnam par mdzes /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-7: la lar 'jig dus nyi ma 'char ka bye ba'i 'od zer tshogs ni 'jigs cher 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-8: la lar mdangs dang 'od zer dang ldan bde zhing zhi ba'i rgyal pa'i sku 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-9: la lar shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang mchog gi mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu 'dzin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-10: la lar gdul bya rnam par sbyang phyir brtson pa'i rdo rje sems khyod mkha' bzhin bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-11: ma lus 'dul ba mkhas pa'i bde ba dam pa nyid phyir bdag la grub gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-12: de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga dam pa'i gsang ba'i mchog dpal dam tshig gsum gyi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-13: dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-14: thar pa'i grong khyer bcom ldan bde chen 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:234b-15: mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235a-0: dza: h'um bam ho: rab tu @235a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235a-2: de nas shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i dam pa dpal dam tshig bla na med pa'i mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba mngon par brjod nas shin tu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i glu dang gar gyi cho gas ci lta ba bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs nas so sor rjes su bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu shin tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235a-4: zhes bya ba yang gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235a-5: sna tshogs cho ga 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235a-7: kun mchog sna tshogs chen po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235a-8: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235a-9: ces bya ba shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235a-10: de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gtam rgyud sna tshogs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235a-11: mchog tu gsang ba'i rol mo bla na med pa'i dngos grub nyams dang ldan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235a-12: gang gis sna tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan mthon po dang ldan kun tu rjes bsten pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-0: mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po @235b nyid ni de yis yang dag nyams su myong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-1: don yod mchog tu bsod nams ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-2: cho ga mchog tu rtag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-3: kun mchog gsang ba chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-4: dngos grub thams cad myur grub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-5: gang zhig grong mchog rab dgyes par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-6: zhugs te sgrub par byed rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-7: shin tu mchog gi 'dod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-8: dngos grub dbang phyug bde nges thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-9: gang gis dngos grub ma thob dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-10: bsod nams phun tshogs byed pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-11: dkyil 'khor mchog tu rab zhugs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-13: gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-14: snying po sogs kyis ma grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-15: nye ba'i snying pos bsgrubs byas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-17: dpal mchog dang po'i rtsa rgyud du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-18: de bzhin myur du grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-19: ji ltar dang po'i khyim zhugs nas //
