K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-20: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub pa ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-21: dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-22: de ltar thams cad grub pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-23: ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-24: khang bzang dam pa mthong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-25: dam tshig rnams las nyams pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-26: sgrib pa kun gyis bsgribs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-27: bdud sogs gdon gyis reg pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-28: rtag pa'i thar pa thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-29: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-30: yang na dkyil 'khor ma grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:235b-31: slar yang mchog tu rab zhugs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-2: sgrub min yang 'dir cung zad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-3: dngos grub las dang bde de bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-4: dngos grub thams cad bzhi 'gyur du; ;rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-5: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu gsang ba rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi dam tshig mchog gi gsang ba'i cho ga'i mchog ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-9: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-10: dam tshig chen po gsum 'di yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-11: byang chub sems dpa' mchog 'dzin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-12: ras la dkon mchog gsum bri bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-13: go cha dang bcas rdo rje mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-14: go cha sogs kyis legs par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-15: rdo rje mtshon cha brjod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-17: 'khor lo de ni brtags nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236a-19: ci rigs par ni bsgrub byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gi dngos grub ma lus pa ster ba 'di @236b yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-2: khyim mam yang na nags tshal lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-3: snga ma bzhin du brgyan nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-4: mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-5: thams cad byas nas 'di brjod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-6: de nyid kyis ni bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-7: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-8: lta ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-10: ma lus 'dul ba la brtson pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-11: brtan zhing nges pa'i cho ga dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-12: shin tu srid pa la gnas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-13: cho ga la sogs dgos pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-14: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-15: dkon mchog gsum du gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-16: srid pa shin tu grub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-17: rnam par dag pa'i dpal mdzad mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-18: ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-19: de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi dril bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-20: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-21: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-22: nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-23: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-24: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-25: de nas dam tshig chen po gsum gyi sdom pa zhes bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-26: longs spyod kun la longs spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-27: rang lha bdag nyid kyis bsten na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-28: dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:236b-29: bdag gis bya zhes brjod cing mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-1: bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-2: thabs kyi cho ga 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-3: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-4: bza' min pa yang bza' byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-5: rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-6: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-7: de ltar brjod nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba slob tu bcug nas ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-8: de nas rdor 'dzin slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-9: rdo rje mchod pas mchod nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-10: ci 'dod pa yi mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-11: slob ma thams cad mchod du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-12: longs spyod kun la longs spyod kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-13: dkon mchog gsum po la phul ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-14: 'dod pas bdag dang gzhan rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-17: mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-18: de nas rdo rje chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-19: ras la bcom ldan bri bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-20: rdo rje'i rigs kun bdag po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-21: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-22: cho ga ji bzhin mchog tu 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-23: de yi pad 'dab gcig bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237a-25: gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor che'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-0: mkha' 'gro ma rnams @237b logs la bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-1: dang por dmar dang dkar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-2: gzhan ni thal ba ltar dkar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-3: gsum po dkar dang lta ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-4: bzhi ba gser ltar dri med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-5: rdo rje gtum po'i dbang phyug grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-6: rdo rje kha tv'am bsgrengs dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-8: de yi logs la mtshan ma gtod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-9: rdo rje khyab 'jug ma rdo rje'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-10: 'khor lo gtod pa de bzhin gzhan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-11: rdo rje dril bu ba dan nam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-12: de yi logs na g-yon bsnyems ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-13: cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-14: khro dang bcas pas zhal bzhad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-15: rang bdag la ni thugs gtad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-16: sku ni zur gyi phyogs pa bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-17: de nas 'di yi snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-19: h'um/ de nas nye ba'i snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-20: rdo rje dril sogs lhan cig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-21: rnam dben rol mo brdungs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-22: hi yi glu dang rol mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-23: brdung zhing zur bzhi rab tu bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-24: ces bya ba ni 'dir bzlas pa'i cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-25: 'khor lo der ni bstan byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-26: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-27: mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-28: cho ga thams cad rgyas pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-29: de nas de kho na nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-31: dam tshig gi cho ga sbyin pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-32: rtag tu chags pa las byung khro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-33: rdo rje me yi phung bo'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-34: 'bar ba'i rdo rje khro bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:237b-35: rab 'bar ba yi tshogs kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-2: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-4: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-5: nam mkha' la yang mchan nyid med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-6: nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-7: thams cad myur ba nyid du sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-8: nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-9: thams cad nam mkha' zhes brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-10: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-11: 'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-12: ces bya ba ni rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-13: cho ga 'di yis thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-14: mnyam par gzhag pas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-15: kun mchog dngos grub chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-16: las kyi tshogs rnams mi zad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-18: de ni ci lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho gas rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pa byas nas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-20: rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-21: de nas mchog tu phra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-22: shin tu bzad pa'i rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-23: grub mchog gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-25: grong khyer skyed mos tshal sogs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-26: ji lta ba bzhin rgyas byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-27: rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238a-28: ji bzhin du ni rab bsgrubs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-0: yid 'ong @238b bzhi dang lhan cig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-1: rang gi phyag rgyas me tog gtor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-2: ji lta ba bzhin grong khyer 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-3: g-yon pa'i kha ni gyen du gtod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-4: rdo rje drag po bzhad chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-5: sgra sgrogs mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-7: de la phyag ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-8: aom zhes bya ba brjod byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-9: shin tu dga' ba'i dbugs rlung gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-11: drug ldan par ma'i ru lu ru lu llam ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-12: 'di ni rdo rje drag po'i phyag 'tshal pa'i sgra sgrogs pa'i mchog ces bya ba 'dir rdo rje phyag gi phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-15: thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-16: las thams cad la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu shin tu gsang bas 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-17: de nas yid 'ong dam bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-18: me tog sil ma dor nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-19: rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-20: dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-21: de la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-22: padma'i thod pa las bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-23: de yang rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pas na rdo rje padma zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-24: de nas 'dir phyag rgya bcing ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-25: sor mo thams cad phan tshun sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-26: kun mchog rtse mo dang bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-27: mthe bo rdo rjes bkab pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:238b-29: rdo rje padma'i phyag rgya 'dis rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i sbyor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-0: rdo rje padma'i rin po che'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur bar @239a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-2: 'dis dpang bskur ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin du gdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-5: ma rungs pa'i sems can thal bar brla nas thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba khams gsum ma lus pa'i stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-6: mchog tu rtag pa'i srung bar yang 'gyur ro zhes mchog tu shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-7: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-8: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-9: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-10: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-11: rdo rje la sogs thob par gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-13: rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-14: rdo rje can gyis byin rlabs 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-15: bud med rnams kyang 'bebs gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-16: ston pa'i rdo rje phab pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-17: rdo rje dang bcas phyag mtshan 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239a-19: de la thog mar re zhig rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba chen po thal bar rab tu rlog pa zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i bdag po mchog dang po yang dag par 'bebs @239b par byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyis 'khon du 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i me 'bar ba'i rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-2: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang nges par sbyor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-3: ba dan dang bcas pa'i dril bu 'chang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-4: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po shin tu khro ba 'bebs pas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer shin tu 'jigs shing 'jigs par byed pa'i spyan ser po dang ldan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis stong phrag brgya bzlas pas 'grub par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-11: thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-12: lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis khams gsum ma lus pa'i rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i bdud thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-16: ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-17: mkha' 'gro ma drag po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:239b-19: rang sangs rgyas rnams te de dag kyang thal bar rlog par 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240a-0: dgra bo la sogs pa gzhan rnams lta smos @240a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240a-2: don yod cing thogs pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240a-4: las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i thabs shin tu drag po 'di'i man ngag gi bzlas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240a-6: sna'i dbugs phra ba nyid kyis bden pa'i rdo rje tshig gis grub pa'i yid kyi 'dod pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi tshogs rnams la dam pa'i mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240a-8: h'um/ de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma'i lha chen po rnams kyis bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240a-9: de la thog mar re zhig rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo rdo rje gzhu dang mdang gtod pa'i spyan g-yon pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240a-10: rdo rje spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240a-11: sgeg pa dang bcas shing g-yo ba'i spyan gyi zur gyis gzigs pa'i phyag rgyas btab ba tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240a-12: don yod cing thogs pa med pa dngos po thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240a-13: las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-0: de bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i rdo rje phra mo'i g-yon pa'i khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyis 'dod pas dngos grub thams @240b cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-1: las kyi tshogs rnams la mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-3: hra'i:/ gnyis pa ni rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi lan zhes [?] bya ba'i lha mo ste dbus su rang gi lhag pa'i lha bstod pa'i zhal 'dzum pa'i spyan cung zhig 'dzums shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-4: dga' ba chen po rdo rje'i spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang tsum pan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-5: 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i reg pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-6: phyag rgya thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-7: thams cad kyis gsod par mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-8: don yod cing thogs pa med par dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-9: las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i bya rog gi mgrin pa'i dbyangs kyis rdo rje ngang gi khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyi 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-11: las kyi tshogs rnams la mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-13: h'um/ gsum pa ni rdo rje chen po'i 'dod pa'i me 'par ba thal bar rlog pa zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-15: kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan 'chang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:240b-16: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i bzhad pas smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi khro bo'i spyan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-0: rdo rje chen po'i khro bo ki li gi @241a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-1: la khro bo'i spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-3: ru lu ru lu ru lu hni zhes bya ba tsam gyis bdud thams cad 'joms pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-4: don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-5: las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-7: bzhi pa ni rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba thal bar rlog pa 'chi ba slong ba zhes bya ba g-yon bsnyems pa g-yas pas rang gi spyi bor rdo rje dril bu bskyod par mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-8: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i spyan shin tu gdangs pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-9: rdo rje rgyal po drin gyi spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgyas thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-10: thal lcag la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-13: phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'i 'chi ba thams cad slong bar mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-14: don yod cing thogs pa med pa dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-15: las kyi tshogs la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i dril bu'i dbyangs kyi rdo rje khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyi 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-17: las kyi tshogs thams cad la mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-19: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241a-20: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-0: @241b nam mkha'i khams ltar grangs med cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-1: rdo rje nyi ma las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-2: nam mkha' kun gyi gnas skabs kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-4: rdo rje mchog gi rnal 'byor gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-5: dbang phyug ma lus kun nas 'bebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-6: de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor pa ston pa des rnal 'byor pa rang gi logs dag tu dgod pa yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-7: zla ches dkyil 'khor rnam pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-8: dkyil 'khor du ni dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-9: bkod nas thams cad kun mchog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-10: dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-11: thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-12: bdag byin brlab sogs grub pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-13: shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-14: brtag pa dang ni bsgrubs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-15: rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-16: rdo rje slob ma rnams gzhug bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-17: de la re zhig thog ma kho nar slob dpon gyis bcug ste tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig gsum gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams logs dag tu bzhag nas skyes pa rnams kyang gzhug cing byang chub kyi sems kyis rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i dam tshig dang sdom pa dag len du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:241b-19: bu mo rnams rab tu bzhag la tshogs dang bcas pa'i rang nyid kyis zhugs te bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-1: gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-2: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-3: mchog tu bskyed pa byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-4: gar byas spyi bor thal sbyar mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-5: slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-6: ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-7: slob ma me tog dor du gzhung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-8: rnal 'byor ma ni gang la babs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-9: de dang de yi lha mo 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-10: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-11: rnam pa kun tu yon blangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-12: rdo rje padma'i dbang bskur gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-13: dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-15: dbang bskur ba ni de nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-16: de la 'dir dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-17: mi phyed pa dang so sor rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-18: gdug pa thams cad gnon pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-19: sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-20: byang chub sems ni che zhing brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-21: mtshon cha de ni rgyal kun gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-22: kun tu bzang po'i lag tu sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-23: bstan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-24: de phyir phyag na rdo rje yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-25: de nas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i mchog tu gsang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-26: rtag tu chags pa las byung khro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-28: rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242a-29: mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-0: de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' @242b 'gro ma rnams kyi gsang ba mchog gi de kho na nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-1: rdo rje nyi ma 'char las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i grib ma 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-3: sprul te ma lus bdung la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-4: gdug pa'i khrag ni gsol bar spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-5: ces bya ba ni gsang ba mchog gi de kho na nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-6: de nas 'dir mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i dril bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-7: shin tu gdug cing drag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-8: bdag po drag po'i bu rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-9: shin tu gnyid ni log pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-10: rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-11: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-12: mchog tu gsang pa'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i rdo rje kha tv'am ga'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-13: ba dan gyi dril bu thams cad 'bebs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-14: rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-15: thams cad ltung bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-17: de nas rnal 'byor mchog gi dam tshig ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-18: khrag chen ga bur dang bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-19: tsandan dmar dang sbyar ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-20: tshogs kyi nang du rab zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-21: rdo rje dang bcas rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-22: srin lag mthe bo'i rtse mo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-23: nam mkha' thams cad sbyor mchog ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-24: zla ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-25: rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-26: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-27: ci 'dod pa ni bsten bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:242b-28: nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-2: nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-3: nam mkha' thams cad ces brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-4: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas btab pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-5: 'jig rten gsum yang bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-6: dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-8: las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-9: dngos grub ma lus sgrub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-10: don yod mchog tu grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-11: gdug pa thams cad gnon par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-12: sdug bsngal kun 'phrog dpal dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-14: ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-16: ro dang bza' dang spyod pa gar dang glu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-17: rol mo'i mchong pa sogs kyis mgon la mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-18: phul ba de yis rdo rje bla ma che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-19: dad bas bdag dang gzhan rnams mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-20: myos byed myos byed btung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-21: ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-22: rdo rje nyi ma me 'bar sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-23: ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bzla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-24: rang gsang cho gas blangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-25: glu dang rol mo gar rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-26: sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-27: khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-28: bud med tshogs dang bcas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-29: mchod pa rgya chen thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243a-30: ci 'dod pa yi longs spyod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-0: @243b mchod pa byas nas rab tu bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-1: ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-3: 'gro ba kun gyi khams rnams kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-4: phra rab rdul dang mnyam pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-5: rtog pa'i rgyal po grub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-6: sangs rgyas la sogs mchog grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-7: gang zhig blo ni dpag med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-8: khyad par du ni dmigs mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-9: de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-10: dam pa thams cad bsdus pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-11: zad pa thams cad zad 'gyur dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-13: gang zhig mthong bas mi snang 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-14: gang nas kyang ni 'jigs med byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-15: drag po dbang po nye dbang zla //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-17: khros nas yi ge h'um tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-18: ma lus pa ni thal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-20: mchog tu zhugs te mthong nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-21: sdig pa kun las rnam grol te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-22: khyed rnams dang ni rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-23: sar khyod 'chi ba yod mi te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-24: khyad par du ni ngan 'gro med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-25: gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-26: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:243b-27: shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-2: dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-3: rtag tu yang ni bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-4: sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-5: dam pa brtag pa'i bka' yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-6: byang chub sems ni spang mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-7: dam chos de bzhin dam tshig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-8: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-9: gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin kun de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-10: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-11: theg pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-12: gdug pa 'dul bas dag pa zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-13: rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-14: shin tu gdug cing gtum pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-15: bdag po'i grogs po bu rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-16: phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor mngon spyod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-17: shin tu gnyid ni log tu gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-18: rtag tu rang gi dam tshig srungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-19: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-20: rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-21: de la phul na 'bras bu che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-22: de bya ni sangs rgyas thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-23: rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-24: de byin bsod nams tshogs rdzogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-25: tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-26: deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-27: gang phyir 'di la rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-28: dam tshig rgyal po dang mnyam par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-29: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-30: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244a-31: de ring khyod la dbang bskur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-0: khams gsum @244b gyi ni rgyal srid che'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-1: stobs dpal 'khor los bsgyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-2: rdo rje dam pa'i gsang mchog rnal 'byor ma'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-3: mchog gi dam tshig gsang ba mthong nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-4: bdud la sogs pa'i sha yang zos nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-5: de bzhin gshegs sbyor thob nas khyod grub yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-6: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-8: mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu grub pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-9: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog tu gsang ba 'gro ba 'dul ba'i cho ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-10: ras la bcom ldan bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-11: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-14: padma la sogs phyag mtshan bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-15: phyag rgya 'khor lo ltar mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-16: de yi logs ni thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-17: khro gnyer ma sogs bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-18: drag po la sogs phyag mtshan gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-20: dkyil 'khor der ni brtag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-21: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-22: mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-23: thams cad byas nas 'di brjod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-24: de nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-25: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:244b-26: 'dul ba'i thabs kyis dag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-2: zhes bya ba ni mchog gi rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-3: ji ltar padma dmar po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-4: gnas kyi nyes pa sna tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-5: tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-6: de bzhin khams gsum dag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-7: zhes bya ba ni mchog tu gsang pa'i chos nyid kyi dril bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-8: cho ga gang dang gang dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-11: de dang de yis dag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-12: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-13: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du padma gar gyi mchod pas mchod la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po don thams cad grub pa'i cho ga ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-15: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-16: ras ris de ni blo gros che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-17: ljang gu bee d'urya dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-18: nam mkha'i snying po bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-19: de yi padma gcig la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-21: dbang bskur ma dang gtor ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-22: rgyal mchog mnga' bdag mchod pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-23: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa de'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-24: 'khor lo brtag par byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-25: mtshon cha mchog gi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-26: cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-27: de ni rdo rje mchog gi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-28: nyi ma 'di ni dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245a-30: nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-0: @245b bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-1: de nas chos kyi rin po che'i dril bu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-2: bsam pa grub pa thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-3: nor gyi bsam pa grub pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-4: de yang 'dod pa rab grub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-5: 'dod las thar pa bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-7: dman min rnams ni sbyin bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-8: 'dod pa kun gyi bde ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-9: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-10: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-11: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-12: dam tshig 'di yis mchog tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba chen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-14: myur du yang dag dam pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-15: mi 'gyur mchog ni grub par mdzod /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-16: de ltar gsang ba mchog gi tshul dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-17: ji bzhin cho ga mchog tu rgyas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-18: mchog chen de ni rtog pa thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-19: khyad par dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-21: rtog pa thams cad kyi bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-22: de nas grub chen thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-23: sgrub pa'i mchog ni bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-24: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-25: rtog pa kun mchog grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-26: snod ma yin pa'i sems can gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-27: sdig pa thams cad byed rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-28: mthong ba la sogs sems can don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-29: sems dpa' chen pos mdzad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-30: mthong med long ba de rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:245b-31: bsod nams med sogs rtags ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-1: rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-2: mthong ba'i thabs kyi rgyu rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-3: rdo rje sems sogs sems mchog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-4: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis; ;dam tshig mchog ni bcing ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-6: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-7: gang phyir sku rnams brtan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-8: de yi phyag rgyar grags pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-9: dngos grub kun phyir de dag sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-10: gang dag gzung ba tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-12: mthong zhing mngon par mthong ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-13: mchog bsdus nyid du gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-14: phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-15: gang phyir bsdus par 'gyur ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-16: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-18: ci ltar rgyal po rnams kyi bka'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-19: rtags kyi phyag rgya 'da' dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-20: phyag rgya gsang ba kun gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-21: 'da' bar nus pa ma yin no; ;sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-22: de ltar bskal ba bye bas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-23: thob par mi 'gyur myur du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-24: ci ltar phyag rgya mchog gzung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-25: ji ltar 'dul ldan 'jig rten ni; ;de ltar dngos grub gsungs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-26: de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-27: dngos grub thams cad mchog tu byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246a-28: gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-0: 'dus pa bde ba chen po @246b rnams; ;rdo rje sems sogs skad cig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-1: byin gyis brlab pa brtan par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-3: de nas 'di gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhas shing mchog tu phra ba dang; zab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-7: thog ma dang tha ma med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-8: mi zad cing zad pa med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-9: don yod cing thogs pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-10: shin tu mchog tu dga' ba ma lus pa'i bde ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-11: yid bde ba ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje dbab pa rnams kyis rab tu sad par mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-12: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i don yod pa'i mchog gi gsang ba zhes bya ba'i mtshon cha mchog 'di mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga rgyud phyi ma'i mchog byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa bsgrub pa gcig pu'i cho ga bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-14: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-15: nyin re sngon du lan gcig tu; ;phyag rgya che dang snying po bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-16: kun gyi phyag rgya rab grub pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-17: bdag byin brlab pa gcig pus 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:246b-18: ces bya ba ni mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-0: de nas mchog tu gsang ba @247a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-1: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa gcig pu bsgrub pa'i cho ga mchog tu grub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-2: lan cig dam tshig gsum mchog tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-3: gsang ba dman pa'i khang bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-4: rdo rje la sogs thob bzung na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-5: rdo rje can gyis byin brlab 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-6: de nas shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag la byin gyis brlab pa gcig pu bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par shin tu mchog tu grub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-7: rdo rje dril bu kun bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-8: sna tshogs phyag rgya'i skur bdag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-9: phyag rgya kun gyi rnal 'byor bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-11: grub pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-13: kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-14: dbang phyug chen po nyid byin brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-15: don yod rab tu bdag byin brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-16: rang bzhin gyis ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-17: mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-18: rang nyid bcings nas grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-19: bdag byin brlabs dang don yod phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-20: myur du 'bad med dngos grub rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-21: las kyi tshogs kyis bsgrubs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-23: 'di yis cung zad mi 'grub med; ;dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-24: thams cad byin brlab bsgrubs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247a-25: mi 'gyur ba ni kun grub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-0: ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas @247b gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-2: dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-3: de nas yang mchog tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor thams cad kyi cho ga rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-4: de la thog ma kho nar re zhig don yod pa'i phyir ni rnal 'byor gyi skad kyi dbyings so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-5: 'di yang brtson pa yin no zhes bya ba ni skad kyi dbyings kyi don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-6: gang gis brtson pa zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-8: rang gi lhag pa'i lha rjes su dran par sbyor bas na rnal 'byor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-9: slar yang gzhan ni yang dag par bsdu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-10: yang dag par kun tu sbyor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-11: yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor brjod pa'i rnam grangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-12: gang yang dag par kun tu sbyor ba yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-13: rang gi lhag pa'i lha rjes su dran pa'i rnal 'byor rjes su bsgrubs pas rang gi lhag pa'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-14: de la ci ltar thams cad kyi rnal 'byor yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-15: dam tshig gi rnal 'byor ni thams cad kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-17: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-18: phyag rgya dam tshig ces su bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-19: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:247b-20: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-1: su bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ni dam tshig gi rnal 'byor te thams cad kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-3: rdzas mang po yang dag par sbyar bas sbyor ba zhes bya ba grub pa de bzhin du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-4: thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas yang dag par kun tu sbyor bas na thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ni dam tshig gi rnal 'byor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-5: de la ci ltar na thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-6: sangs rgyas kun bdag yang dag sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-7: ci ltar dbyibs dang sku dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-8: bdag nyid bdag nyid nyid la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-9: bkod nas rjes su bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-10: zhes bya ba ni rang gi dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-11: de la rjes su bsgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-12: lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-13: phyag rgya gang dang gang 'ching ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-14: de dang de yi rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-15: phyag rgya de dang der sbyor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-17: de nas mchog tu gnas pa'i rab mchog gi rjes su sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-18: bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-19: gzi brjid can ni nyid kyang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-21: de phyir bdag nyid brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248a-22: phyag rgya thams cad kyi rnal 'byor chen po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-0: de nas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i @248b mchog gi rjes su sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par shin tu mchog tu grub pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-1: rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-2: sna tshogs phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-3: phyag rgya kun bdag rnal 'byor bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-5: rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig mchog gi rnal 'byor ni yang dag par kun tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-6: de nas gzhan yang slar mchog tu shin tu gsang ba mchog gi rjes su sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par mchog tu grub pa las kyang shin tu mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ni; ;rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-7: ji bzhin dbyings dang skur ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-8: kun bdag phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-10: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-11: dam tshig gsal ba'i rjes 'gro ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-12: rnal 'byor kun bdag grub pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-13: gsal zhing shin tu grub mchog yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-14: 'di yis mi 'grub cung zad med; ;dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-15: las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-16: dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-17: ces bya ba ni gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rnal 'byor te shin tu mchog tu rab tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-18: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:248b-19: ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249a-2: zhes bya ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu gsang ba bla na med pa theg pa chen po'i dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal gyi rang gi dam tshig gi rnal 'byor dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gi dngos grub kyi rnal 'byor gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog gi tshe dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249a-12: dngos grub mchog thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249a-17: yid bde ba thams cad la dam pa mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249a-18: ci srid ma lus shing lus pa med pa la ma lus ba'i dngos grub chen po dam pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu grub pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249a-19: rgyas btab pa tsam gyis skad cig gis rab tu grub ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249a-20: de'i rgyu gang gi phyir zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-0: sbyod pa phyag rgya la rag @249b lus; ;phyag rgya rnal 'byor la gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-1: rnal 'byor khyad par gyis bsgrub bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-2: rnal 'byor dam tshig gis sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-3: sems ni stong pa sgyu mar mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-4: lus dang bral bar ma grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-5: lus de yang ni rtsig pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-6: bya ba med cing sems dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-7: sems kyang lus dang bral ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-8: lus kyang sems dang bral ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-9: grub pa ma yin de bzhin 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-10: phyag rgya rnal 'byor chos gar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-11: ci ltar lus ni sems kyis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-13: de bzhin phyag rgya rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-14: rnal 'byor dam tshig bsgrubs pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-15: de ltar dam tshig rnal 'byor dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-16: phan tshun du ni bsgrub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-17: phan tshun du ni rtag bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-18: de bzhin gshegs par grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-19: zhes bya ba ni shin tu mchog tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-20: de la ci ltar phyag rgya thams cad dang rnal 'byor dag rjes su sgrub pa yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-21: phyag rgya sku ni brtan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-22: de yang bde bas brtan par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-23: sdug bsngal gyis ni g-yo 'gyur ram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-25: de ni rnal 'byor sems las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-26: yid bde ba yis rab tu bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-27: yid mi bde bas g-yo ba 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-29: de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:249b-30: phyag rgya rnal 'byor rjes sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-2: bde ba dga' bas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-3: zhes bya ba shin tu mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dbas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-4: de la dam tshig thams cad kyi rnal 'byor rjes su sgrub pa'i bde ba de gang yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-5: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-6: ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-7: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis; ;bdag dang gzhan rnams mchod par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub theg pa chen po'i yang chen po'i rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde ba zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-10: de la dam tshig thams cad kyi rnal 'byor rjes su sgrub pa de gang yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-11: dka' thub nyes pa mi bzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-12: sdug bsngal ldan pas myur du bskam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-13: sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g-yeng 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-14: rnal 'byor la ni sbyor ba min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-15: de phyir ci 'dod la spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-16: kun za de bzhin thams cad byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-17: ci 'dod bya ba la spyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-18: ci 'dod par ni spyod pa spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-19: gang dang gang du 'chag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-21: gang yang de ru ji bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-22: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-23: sgrib pa rnams dang ldan pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250a-24: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-0: tshig @250b gis kyang ni de bzhin 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-2: thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-3: ngan spyod sdig pa thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-4: rnam pa kun tu gnod mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-5: 'dod pa chen po kun bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-7: thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-8: kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-9: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-11: dngos grub rnams dang las mchog gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-12: tshogs rnams gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-13: don yod mchog tu grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-14: phyag rgya thams cad rjes grub byed; ;dpal ldan sdug bsngal kun 'phrog pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-16: ces bya ba mchog tu yid bde ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-17: de la rnal 'byor thams cad bcing ba ci ltar yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-18: bsam pa med cing thams cad smra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-19: de bzhin thams cad bsams nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-20: ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-21: rang bzhin nyid du snyoms par zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-22: de la ci ltar rnal 'byor thams cad bcing ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-23: lung bstan pa yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-24: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-25: dngos grub thams cad rab sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-26: ye shes tsam la sbyor ba 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-27: rnal 'byor zhes ni brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:250b-28: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi rnal 'byor gyi cho ga mchog tu shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad rnal 'byor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-3: shin tu rnal 'byor bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-6: mchod pa kun gyis rjes sbyor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-8: rnal 'byor zhes ni brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-9: de la 'di ltar brjod bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-10: de nyid chen po 'di grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-11: mchog gi bdag nyid 'di nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-12: shin tu mchog tu gsang ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-13: so so'i skye bo la brjod min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-14: rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-15: de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-16: thams cad rnal 'byor cho ga sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-17: gzhan rnams la ni rims kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-18: 'di la sgrub med cung zad med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-19: dngos grub las dang bde ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-20: thams cad rnal 'byor rjes bsgrubs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-21: mi 'gyur thams cad sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-23: gcig pu'ang gang la yod gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-24: gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-25: bdud la sogs pas non mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-26: de la rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-28: kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251a-30: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-0: shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor thams cad kyi cho ga mchog tu gsang @251b ba'o; ;de nas rtog pa thams cad don yod cing thogs pa med pa mchog tu mkhas shing phra la rgya che zhing zab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-1: bsam gyis mi khyab cing shin tu tshad med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-2: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa mchog tu grub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-3: zhes bya ba phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-4: zhes bya ba phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyud bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-5: g-yon pa'i phang par dgod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-6: zhabs kyi padma ci bde bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-7: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcings te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-8: rang nyid lus ni drang por 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-9: rdo rje gsor bas kun las rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-10: mchog gi dngos grub kun gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-11: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-14: sangs rgyas nyid ni gzi can nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-15: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-16: tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur; ;zhes bya ba thams cad kyi bdag nyid bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-17: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-18: phyag rgya chen po yongs bzung par; ;bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-19: phyag rgyas mchod cing bkur bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-20: gang gis 'di mthong phyag byed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:251b-21: bstod pa dang ni mchod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-2: de yis bdag po mchod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-3: dngos grub kun gyi tshogs chen po'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-4: bde ba phun tshogs dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-5: phyag rgya chen pos grub 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-7: lha la sogs pa'i dngos grub kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-8: las kun gyis ni bde ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-9: phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs kyis; ;khyad par du ni rab tu 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-10: de yis mi 'grub gang yang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-11: dngos grub las dang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-12: phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-13: bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis mchog kun 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-14: de nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po kun gyi dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi dam tshig dang; chos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-16: gdon mi za bar dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-23: mchog gi sgrub pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-24: de bcing ba ni 'di yin te; ;sor mo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-25: rdo rje thal mo zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-26: kun mchog nang du bsdams pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252a-27: rdo rje bsdams pa bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-0: rdo rje bsdams pa'i @252b nang du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-1: mdzub mo mthe bong yang dag sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-2: g-yas pa'i mthe bong rtags kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-3: rtse mo bkug nas btsir bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-4: mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-5: dbus ma bcings pa'i nang du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-6: mthe bong mthe'u chung rdo rjer bsdams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-7: de yi dang po'i rdo rje mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-8: rdo rje bsdams pa de bcings nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-9: dbus ma'i rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-10: dgug pa'i tshul ni de nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-11: rang gi snying gar lcags kyus 'debs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-12: lcags kyu'i rgyal po 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-14: dga' ba'i rdo rje lcags kyus dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-15: slar yang nye ba'i snying po sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-16: snying gar brdeg pa drag po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-17: rjes su chags pa'i me yis gdungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-18: snying po 'phrog pas dbang gyur dgyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-19: myur du byon nas grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-20: zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-21: bde ba chen po rdo rje chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-22: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-25: g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad rgyas btab pas 'ongs te myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-26: gal te ma 'ongs nas 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-27: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying bo mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:252b-28: rdo rje mchod yon rdo rje thal mo shin tu rab tu brkyang ba'i thal mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-1: po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya dbus ma'i rdo rje gzung ba'i me tog gi lcug mas bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-3: rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis dbang bskur na thams cad kyi bdag po nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-4: tshe 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad la dgos pa yin pas btung ba byas na sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-5: de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-6: ba dan gsum dang kha tv'am ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-7: bcings na ci nus par ni dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-8: rdo rje gar bskor dgrol ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-9: yongs su bskor bar 'dzin pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-10: ka pu ta yi kha sbyor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-11: spyi bor bzhag ste phab nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-12: sgeg bcas mdzub mo mthe'u chung sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-13: bkrol nas rdo rje can la dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-14: 'di yis dkyil 'khor ma zhugs kyang; ;rdo rje slob dpon nyid thob 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-15: rang nyid zhugs pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-16: mchod pas don yod grub phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-17: yongs su rdzogs pa ma tshang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-18: yang na slar yang ci snyed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-19: me tog la sogs mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-20: thun mong dngos grub kun 'grub pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-21: ba dan gsum mchog kha tv'am ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-22: sgeg bcas mtha' ma la sogs bkrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-23: glog 'gyu mchog tu bskor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-24: rdo rje gar zhes de bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-25: sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253a-26: rdo rje gar gyi mchod pas mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253b-0: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag 'tshal @253b pas rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rjes su chags par byas nas phyag byed du gzhug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253b-1: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas ma lus par byas nas thams cad la bstod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lcags kyu mchog ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bo bstan pa'i skyil mo krung mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa'i lus can dbus ma mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i mchog gi yan lag spyi bor bzhag la g-yas logs su thams cad la cod pan bcings la mdun logs rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mdud pa'i tshul byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253b-3: phreng ba bcings pa byas la sgeg pa dang bcas pas mthe'u chung la sogs pa bkrol te logs gnyis la dar dbyangs 'ching ba'i tshul byas la mnyam pa'i thal mo rgyas btab pas rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253b-4: de nas bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253b-5: thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon nyid dang rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du 'gyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253b-6: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje rtse lnga ba rdo rje'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i rtse mo can kha dog dmar po sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:253b-7: slob mas kyang slob dpon la yon phul la de nas me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi slob dpon las rdo rje thal mo bskor ba'i phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgyas blang bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-0: @254a *// de ltar na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-1: de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug grub pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po rgyal po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-2: bde ba chen po'i gsang ba chen po'i lcags kyu rang gi snying po'i sngags lan gcig brjod pas rdo rje sems dpa' spyan drang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-3: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang ldan pas rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa dbul bas glog 'gyu ba'i gar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-4: rdo rje khu tshur yongs su gzung bas bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa bsgreng bar byas la sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje mas phyag bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-5: rdo rje glus ni glu len cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-6: bzlas pa'i don ni ci bde bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-7: rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-8: yang dag mchod na myur du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-9: de las dang po'i rdo rje'i gsang ba'i glu 'di dang po la sogs pa rnams kyis blang bar bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-10: thams cad bde ba dam pa rjes su chags pa'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-12: bde ba chen po brtan zhing 'thor bar bdag gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-13: so sor rtogs nas myur du bsgrubs shing phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-14: rdo rje'i glu ni 'di nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-15: bde chen la ni lan cig bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-16: rjes su chags nas shin tu dgyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-17: brtan par gyur nas sgrub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254a-18: phyag rgya chen po lan gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-0: snying pos @254b bdag byin brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-1: shin tu g-yo med lce rtse dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-2: so dang mchu gnyis yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-3: rdo rje ngag ni dbyangs dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-4: rigs kun rab tu sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-5: ri bi ta sogs h'um gi glu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-6: rgyan ldan ci 'dod ci nus par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-7: drug ldan la sogs snyan pa'i glu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-8: ci 'dod gra ma r'a ga'i glu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-9: rab dga' rdo rje mchog gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-10: gan dar ba yi glu mchog blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-11: ngag 'di ni mchog tu grub pa yin te bzlas pa thams cad la dgos pa ji srid mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-12: bzlas pa'i don ni nye ba'i snying por shes pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-13: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-14: phyag rgya chen pos rang la byin gyis brlabs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-15: rdo rje'i lta bas de bzhin du blta zhing rdo rje bsnyems pas 'dzin cing yi ge h'um gis glu'i bzlas pas bcom ldan 'das pa bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-16: lan gcig bsgrub pa ni ji lta ba bzhin mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-17: de nas de'i 'og tu ji ltar mngon par brtson pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-19: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-20: ji ltar byin gyis brlabs nas yi ge h'um gi glu'i bzlas pas dga' ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-21: ji ltar dga' ba sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-22: de nas phyag rgya chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:254b-23: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-2: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-3: sems dpa' chen po rang nyid 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-4: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje bshad pa'o;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-5: 'di las rdo rje mda' la sogs pa'i 'byung ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-7: phyi rol du kha bltas pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa tsam ni rdo rje'i mda' 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-8: mthe bong yongs su bcing ba ni rdo rje ki li ki la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-9: mthe bong gnyis kha phye nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mos dbus ma 'dren pa'i srin lag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-10: mthe chung mnyam pa'i kha phye ba ni rdo rje chu srin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-11: brla gnyis la bskor zhing gnas pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-12: rdo rje thal mo rang gi snying gar bskor bas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta zhing mgo pos phyag byas la spyi bor bzhag la phab ste gyen du gtor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-14: mthe bong sbyar nas bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-15: rab tu byug pa ni me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-18: dril bu dang ldan pa'i rdo rje mchod pa rnams su brjod pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-19: phyi'i mtshams rnams su rdo rje thal mo snying gar bskor bas sgeg pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-20: kha la yongs su bskor nas spyi bor 'jog pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255a-21: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas g-yon pa g-yas pas bkug pas rdo rje pi wang sgreng zhing rdo rje glus mngon par bstod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-0: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis @255b kyis gar byas la spyi bor rdo rje thal mo bcing ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-1: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa'i g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-2: mthe bong gnyis kyis mdud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-3: mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis kyis mdud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-4: gnyis kyis nang du mthe bong bcings pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-5: de nas gsang ba'i dam tshig rnams ni bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi gsang ba'i lcags kyu ste; de las byung ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-6: mthe mdzub rtse sbyar dbus ma'i rtse //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-8: dbus ma rdo rje'i 'og tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-9: mthe bong gis mnan btsir bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-11: srin lag mthe'u chung kha phye ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-12: bskor nas pus mor bzhag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-13: gzhan rnams thams cad ji bzhin bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-14: dam tshig gi rdo rje 'bebs pa mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa rdo rje khu tshur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-15: de las dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gnyis kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-17: g-yon pa bsnyems pas g-yas pa gtad pa'i tshul gyis snying gar gzung ba ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-18: gtod pa dang bcas pa'i snying gar 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-19: rdo rje gtod pa'i tshul ni ki li ki la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-21: bsnyems pa gnyis gtod pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dbang phyug ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-22: mtshams rnams su rdo rje gar ma bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:255b-23: sgeg mo la sogs pa yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-0: rdo rje sgo ba rnams kyi ni g-yon pa'i @256a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-1: mdud pa lag pa g-yas pa steng du byung bas rdo rje bka' bsgo ba byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-4: mthe bong mkhrig mar bzung ste mdud de btsir ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-5: rang gi snying gar dril bu dkrol ba'i tshul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-6: 'di rnams kyis thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-8: gzhug pa don yod par bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba yang gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-9: ji bzhin grub pa'i mtshan ma rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-10: dngos grub chen po myur du stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-11: dang po'i phyag rgya dge 'di dag //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-13: de nas dngos grub med pa sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-14: dang po'i rdo rje phyag rgya bzhi'i phreng ba'i tshul du bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-24: dbus ma'i rdo rje snying ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-27: dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag nas btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256a-40: rang gi lus la bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-0: thams cad @256b bskor nas dbang po kun la gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-1: dbus ma'i rdo rje dbang po thams cad la reg pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-2: rang gi las byas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-3: dbang bskur nas de bzhin du dngos grub byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-5: thams cad du bskor nas yid kyis sprul par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-6: 'dzum pa med pa'i khro zhing 'bar la g-yo ba ni lta bas blta ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-11: thams cad du bskor zhing thams cad du dran pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-14: dbus ma'i rdo rje bzhi snying gar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-15: mdzub mo gnyis kyis yi ge h'um dang bcas pas dgug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-16: dbus ma'i rdo rjes dpral bar 'phred la mig byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-17: rang gi snying gar bcings la g-yo ba med cing ma btsums pa'i lta bas sa 'og tu blta zhing ha h'um dham zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-18: gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i gdong pa bris nas rdo rje dgug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-19: 'og gi phyogs su bzhag na rtag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-20: kha'i dbus su bzhag na rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-21: phyag byas na mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-23: cig char du sor mo thams cad dral ba ni yid kyi las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-24: bcings nas dza: h'um bam ho:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:256b-25: dbus ma'i phyi rol tu bcings pas spyi bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-1: nas rang gi rdo rjer bsgom pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-2: rang nyid byang chub sems dpar bsgom pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-3: rang nyi de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-4: rang nyid rdo rje 'chang chen por rjes su dran pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-5: de nas las kyi tshogs thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-6: rdo rje gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje 'chang bdag dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang don yod cing thogs pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-7: rdo rje sku mchog gi gtsug tor gyi las ni rdo rje bsdams pa btsir ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-10: sor mo thams cad kyi rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-11: sor mo lhag ma'i 'od zer gyi 'khor lo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-12: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing bskor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-14: snying gar phab cing 'bar bar byed pas phyogs thams cad du rdo rje 'bar ba'i ra ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-15: khro bo chen po 'bar ba'i rdo rje dag gis kyang 'jug par nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje lta bu'i 'phrog pa rnams kyis gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-22: dpag tu med pa ni bskor zhing btsum pa med pa'i mig gis rab tu zhi ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-23: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gi lcags kyu'i mdud pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257a-24: mdzub mo gnyis mnyam pa'i las ni snying gar rab tu bzhag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-0: @257b mdzub mo'i rtse mos gnan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-1: dgod pas rab tu bzhag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-2: yongs su bskor nas de bzhin du mdzod spur bzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-3: kha tvam ga gnyis kyis rdo rje bcings pas mthe'u chung rdo rje'i legs par byed pa'i tshul gyis nye bar 'phel ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-4: bsdus pa'i don gyis tshul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-8: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug cing bsnyams la nang du bzhag ste mthe'u chung gnyis kha phye ba'i mche ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-9: des mthil dpral bar brdab pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-10: mdzub mo'i sen mo brud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-11: dbus ma'i rdo rje brtan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-12: byabs nas myur du phyag rgya bkrol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-13: sor mo sbyar nas rdo rje gtsug tor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-14: ba dan gsum pa gnyis kha gyen du kha bltas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-15: 'og tu kha lta ba'i mdzub mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-16: dbus ma'i mdud pa byas la mdzub mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-18: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-20: cig char du phyag rgya bkrol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:257b-22: dbus mas bsnun te nam mkha' las ltung ba'i tshul lo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:262b-12: rdo rje padma ni thams cad gcod par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:262b-13: rdo rje bsdams pa ni mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i gdu bus g-yas pa'i h'um gis mdzub mo bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:262b-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad las byung ba ni g-yas pa'i mdzub mos g-yon pa'i yi ge h'um bzung ba ste gzhu rgyud 'dren pa zhes bya ba thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:262b-19: rdo rje bsdams pa las rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:262b-20: rdo rje bsdams pa'i g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur g-yas pa'i rtse gsum gyis mtshan pas yongs su bzung ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:262b-21: thams cad dral bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-1: g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe'u chung yang dag par brkyang ba g-yon gyi lag pa'i steng du bzhag pa ni kha tv'am ga sgreng ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-2: gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya phye zhing dral bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-5: za ba la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad g-yas pas 'khor lo bzung ba'i tshul gyis gtod cing dor ba ste /
