K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-8: rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-9: g-yas pa'i rdo rje 'bebs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-10: sbyor ba spro zhing g-yo ba'i 'dab ma can gyi ba dan gsum pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-11: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-12: mdzub mo gnyis kyis rdo rje las byung ba'i srin lag mnyam par sbyar zhing mthe'u chung kha phye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-13: dpal thams cad byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-14: rnam par rgyal bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-15: gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-18: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-19: rdo rje thal mo mnyam byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-20: mdzub mo gnyis kyis dar dpyangs bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-21: mthe bong srin lag rdo rje ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-22: yongs su bskor te dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263a-23: 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyag nas bzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-0: ci 'byor pas slob dpon la yon phul te dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog phun sum @263b tshogs pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-1: rdo rje phyag rgya rdo rje ti rin ti ri las 'byung ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-2: don yod thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-3: de nas las kyi phyag rgya bzhi ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi dam tshig ni rdo rje khu tshur g-yon pas bsnyems pa thams cad sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-5: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje gsor ba ste 'dis thams cad brgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-12: khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-14: g-yo ba thams cad la nges par sbyor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-17: de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo ni khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-18: de dag gi las dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-19: mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis kyis thams cad dgug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-21: g-yas pas gdug pa thams cad gcod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-22: mkhrig ma'i mdud pas g-yas pa'i khro bo 'gugs pas thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:263b-24: gtod pa dang bcas pa'i mda' 'phangs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-0: de bzhin du rdo rje rtse gsum pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje gar gyi sbyor bas rang gi phyag @264a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-2: las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gyen du 'phangs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-3: las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas la rdo rje thal mo rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-4: rdo rje gar gyi sbyor bas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya steng du dor ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-5: thams cad las rgyas gdab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-9: 'tsho bar byed pa ni rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-10: de nas ngag gi phyag rgya ni sprin gyi sgra sgrogs pa'i h'um yi ge h'um phra ba'i sgra dang bcas pa khro zhing gsal ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje ngag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-11: sgrub pa'i don bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-12: de nas ma grub na las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-13: sgrub pa ni de bzhin du phyag rgya chen po lan cig tu bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-14: las la nges par sbyor ba ni khro gnyer gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-15: rdo rje h'um mdzad las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-16: ske tshe dang bcas pa'i til mar rnon po'i sbyin sreg ni g-yas pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-18: de nyid kyis thams cad 'ching ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-19: g-yo ba med pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-21: khro bo'i rdo rje lta ba'i sdigs mdzub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-22: phyag rgya glod par gyur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-23: mdzub mo gnyis yang dag par sbyar nas phye ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264a-24: de dag nyid kyis gdu bu bcing ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-0: g-yas pa'i @264b mdzub mo g-yon pa ltung ba'i tshul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-1: mdzub mo gnyis kyi 'bar bar phye ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-3: mdzub mo gnyis kyis sor mo spyar ba'i rtse mo gcod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-4: lag pa gnyis drag tu mnye ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-5: thams cad du sor mo thams cad dor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-6: gcig char du phyag rgya dgrol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-7: drang zhing g-yo bas sdigs mdzub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-8: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo gdengs ka bskyod pas sdigs mdzub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-9: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo mche bas bzung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-12: rgyud pa la sogs pas bstan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-13: mdzub mo gnyis kyis se go la rdebs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-14: g-yon pa'i steng du g-yas pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-15: so la rab tu gzhag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-20: thams cad du brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-25: yongs su bskor nas nub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-28: de bzhin du kun nas 'dren pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-29: de bzhin du gyen du drang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-30: rang nyid kyis nga ro bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-32: bdag nyid la brdog par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-33: snying gar brdeg par sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-34: rang nyid kyis rang gi skra 'bal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-36: rang gi gos bstod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-37: khro bos de bzhin du 'bar ba ston pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-38: g-yas pas mdzub mo lcags kyu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:264b-39: de nyid kyis rab tu gzhug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-2: lce reg pa ni mdzub mo gnyis kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-3: yan lag la ba spu g-yas su bskor bas 'khyil /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-5: ltung ba la sogs pa byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-7: khro bo'i lta bas shing drung rnams la yid kyis 'dod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-15: khro bo dang bcas pa'i 'jigs byed kyi lta bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-16: mdzum pa med pas lta bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-17: de bzhin du 'bar ba 'ching bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-19: gtsug tor las mdzub mo'i rdo rje gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-20: de bzhin du snying gar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-22: phyag rgya zur du bslang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-23: mdzub mo'i rtse mo brtan par sbyar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-24: lta bas steng nas 'og tu ltung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-28: rdo rje kha tv'am ga dral ba khro bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-29: rdo rje snying gar bsgom pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-30: rdo rje rtse gsum dral ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-31: gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-35: de nyid kyi dong rtse gsor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-36: khro bo'i lta bas bzhin du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-37: khu tshur g-yas pas mnan te g-yon pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265a-39: dong rtse gsor ba ni gnyis kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-0: @265b g-yon pa'i dril bu dral ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-1: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi g-yas pa'i khu tshur g-yon pa'i rdo rje khro pos mnan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-2: mthe'u chung gi gdu bu dkrol ba'i khu tshur gyis 'phrog par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-3: g-yas pa'i dril bu dral ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-4: tshegs dang bral ba ltung ba ni yid kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-7: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi g-yon pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mnan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-8: de bzhin du gdu bu bkrol bas 'phrog par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-12: rdo rje 'chang chen po rjes su dran pas mdun du bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-13: rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i rgyud do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-14: de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni padma chen po rdo rje'i thal mo kha spub pa dbu ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-16: mthe'u chung kha phye ba'i 'dab ma bzhin pa chos nyid thams cad thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-17: thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-18: phyag rgya chen po rnams ni de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-19: dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje padma bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-20: padma'i rigs rnams kyi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:265b-21: de la padma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nang gi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i padma pang par gyen du kha phye ba lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming can gyi phyag rgya padma'i @266a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-2: rdo rje padma chen po'i rdo rje padma snying gar rdo rje bcing ba rdo rje padma'i chags pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-3: padma chen po'i bdag po'i mdzub mo mnyam pa 'og tu kha lta ba pang bar bzung ba padma'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-4: padma chen po'i ba dan rin po che gnyis bzung zhing des padma sbyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-5: 'di rnams kyi chos nyid thams cad las thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-6: thams cad rjes su chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-7: srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs thams cad las sgrol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-8: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i shin tu grub pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-9: rdo rje rtse gsum dral ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-10: de nas padma'i lha'i bdag po rnams kyi phyi rol gyi bsdams pa las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-11: de la don yod pa'i rgyal po ni 'og tu mdzub mo gnyis kyi kha 'bus pa khro gnyer la gzhag par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-12: padmo'i khro gnyer gyi spyan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-13: rdo rje bsdams pa kha gyen du 'bar ba ni mgrin sngon gyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-14: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug pa mthe bong yongs su bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-15: dung gi dbyibs de g-yas pa'i mthe bong bsgreng ba bteg ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-16: mthe'u chung mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-17: sor mo lhag ma yang dag par brkyang ba'i 'khor lo ni khyab 'jug ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266a-18: padma las byung ba'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa'i lcags kyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-0: sor mo lhag ma kha phye ba'i padma las byung @266b ba'i zhes bya bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-1: rta mgrin gyi ni mdzub mo gnyis shin tu sbyar ba'i lcags kyu rgod ma'i kha shin tu rab tu brkyang ba'i srin lag gi rtse mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-2: mthe'u chung dang gnyis rab tu brkyang ba so sor phye la g-yon g-yo zhing bzung ba ni padma'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-3: 'di rnams kyis dbang bskur ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-6: dgug pa thams cad kyi dngos grub don yod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-8: de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni kha tv'am ga bcings nas padma'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du gzung bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-9: ngag gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzungs dgug pa ni chos kyi ngag gis bzlas pa'i don shes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-10: padma chen po bcings nas yid kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-14: zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-15: las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-16: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rgyud do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-17: de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-18: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya rdo rje rin chen te mthe bong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:266b-19: mdzub mo'i sor bzhi'i rtse mo bsnyams nas 'og tu rab tu bsdus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-0: dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje thal @267a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-1: mos dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-2: des ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-3: rdo rje de nyid snying gar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-6: khu tshur spyi bor bzhag la me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-7: 'di nyid dbus su bzhag nas las kyi phyag rgyar gzung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-8: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i gter gyi mchod pa thob pa'i don du yang dag par rdzogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi dam tshig ni gsal ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-10: g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bstod nas g-yas pa nor sbyin pa bkrol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-11: nor bu'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'i nyid kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-12: snying po'i ngag klu'i rgyal pos bzla ba ste bka' bsgo zhing de bzhin du las la nye bar sbyor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-13: gal te ma grub na dbang bskur bar gnas pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyis nam mkhar las thams cad kyi bka' bsgo ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-14: chos kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi tshogs ni 'di'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-15: don yod thogs med grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-16: las kyi tshogs ni sgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-17: ngag gi phyag rgya'i bka' bsgo ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-18: thams cad myur du mkha' las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-19: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267a-20: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-0: de nas phyi'i rgyud ni phyag rgya chen po ni @267b g-yon par kham phor dang g-yas na mda' gtod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-1: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'jug pa la bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-2: lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-3: mthe'u chung gi gdu bus lu gu rgyud bcing bar byas la mdzub mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-5: srin lag bsnyams te rtse gsum pas mtshan pa ni ming po rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-6: ji lta ba bzhin du bzung bas lha mo rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-7: rdo rje bsdams pa'i dbus ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-8: srin lag gis sor mo'i rtse mo bzhi la mdzub mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-9: mthe'u chung bzhi'i rtse mo 'dus pa ni lha mo rnams kyis 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-10: sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-11: gang gi tshe dkyil 'khor gyi brtag par ma nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings te bltas na dkyil 'khor brtag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-13: mchod pa ci dgar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-14: gdengs ka can gyi dbang po rnams kyi ni mthe bong bcings nas phyi rol tu kha bltas pa'i sor mo'i gdengs ka sgreng ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-15: klu thams cad dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-18: dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-19: gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-20: lto 'phye lag pa ste thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:267b-21: dbus ma srin lag bzhi'i mdud pa legs par byed pa'i sbyor bas nye bar gtod cing bsdus la mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis kyis brdeg par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-2: kun nas bsdus na dug thams cad 'ching ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-3: 'di nyid kyis dug thams cad bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-6: gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i rdo rjes khros nas myur du gzhig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mchog dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-9: rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-10: ba dan gsum ni yongs su bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-11: rdo rje khyab 'jug ces bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-12: dor na thams cad gcod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-13: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad kyi mgo rnams bcad nas mchog tu byung ba thams cad grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-14: mthe'u chung mthe bong dang sprel ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-15: lag gnyis steng dang 'og tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-16: dbus ma gsum gyi rtse gsum mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-17: rdo rje 'dzin ma zhes sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-18: rdo rje dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba don yod pa'i dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-19: rdo rje padma mnyam gzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-20: gang der ci bzhin de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-21: shin tu thob dka'i sangs rgyas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-22: bsgrub pa bzlas pas sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-23: rdo rje chos nyid ces bya ba'i phyag rgya sgrol ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-24: mdzub mo bsdams pa'i phyi rol dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-25: mthe bo rdo rje bkab pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268a-26: rdo rje chen po'i nor bu ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-0: zhes @268b bya ba ni rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-1: de nas thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pas bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-2: de la dang por re zhig dang po'i dngos grub brgya rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po stong du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-3: ci lta ba bzhin du dam tshig phyag rgya mtshan rnams kyis lag pa g-yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-4: g-yon pa dag gi rdo rje chen po'i sbyor bas las thams cad kyi dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-5: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-6: de ltar rang gi phyag mtshan gyi khu tshur rdo rje gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya stong dang po'i las kyi tshogs brgya sgrub par byed pa'i rdo rje las byed pa gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-7: de ltar lag pa g-yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-8: g-yon pa'i gcig shos kyis las thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i las kyi phyag rgya stong bzhi pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-9: de ltar ma lus pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni lag pa gcig gis phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba rab tu sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-10: de ltar 'gro ba don kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-11: 'khor dang dam tshig las dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-12: kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-13: rdo rje sems dpas sgrub par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-14: de ltar gsang ba rgya chen rmad du byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-15: mchog tu 'gro ba thams cad sbyong byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:268b-16: mchog dang po yi bla ma bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-2: dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-3: rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-4: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-5: gsang ba kun gyi bdag brtan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-6: de nyid phyag rgya'i rgyud chen po'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-7: mtshon cha dam pa 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa'i tshogs mchog tu mkhas shing phra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-12: gsal zhing mnyam pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-13: bla na med pa'i bla ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-14: mthar thug pa med pa'i dngos grub kyi gsang ba bsgrub pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las rnams sgrub pa po don yod cing thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-15: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gsang bas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-16: ma mchu so rnams kyis bzung la dga' ba chen pos dang po'i rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing byed pa dag gis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269a-17: bde ba chen po'i gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen pos dgod cing brtan pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i byed pa dag @269b gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las rnams sgrub par byed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-3: khro bo'i rdo rje lta ba dang bcas pa'i byed pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-4: sna'i dbugs chen po'i yi ge h'um gis rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-5: rdo rje nyi ma ltar me 'bar ba'i lta ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-6: de bas cung zad 'dzum pas dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba'i byed pa rnams kyis mchu mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-7: padma chen po'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-8: bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phra bar 'dzum pa'i lta ba'i byed pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-9: bzhin mdzum pa dang bzhad pas nam mkha' la dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-10: rdo rje chen po ni nor bu'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-11: don yod thogs med grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-12: bden pa'i bdag nyid 'jig pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-13: sangs rgyas kun dang bdag nyid kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-14: gsang ba'i phyag rgya legs grub stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-15: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-16: de nas de phyir mchog dang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:269b-17: bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-0: dang po shin tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis @270a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-2: mchog gi mchog ni dang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-3: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-4: 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-5: rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-6: rdo rje 'chang chen slob dpon ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-7: mchog tu dang zhing rab dga' bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-8: snying po la sogs rnams med kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-9: myur du thams cad sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-10: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-11: sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-12: dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-14: gang zhig grub par ma gyur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-15: bsod nams phun tshogs mi ldan na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-16: bdag nyid dam ni rdo rje sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-17: bsgrubs na de ni myur du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-18: gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-19: snying po sogs dang nye snying pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-20: bsgrub pa byas kyang ma grub na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-21: 'dzum pa'i phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-22: de phyir gsang ba'i btsun mo 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-23: rdo rje sems dpas rab dga' byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-25: dgyes pa de yis myur du 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-26: de nyid chen po 'di grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-27: dam pa mchog gi bdag nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-28: gsang ba mchog tu bsod nams ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-29: so so'i skye bo la brjod min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-30: de nyid grub pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-31: rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270a-32: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-0: de bzhin gzhan la sbyin mi @270b bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-1: gang gis grub par ma gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-2: de la de nyid sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-3: de nyid 'dzum pas myur du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-5: de nyid chen po dag pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-6: rdo rje can gyi mtshon cha mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-7: phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-8: mchog tu gsang ba bshad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-9: de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-10: rdo rje slob dpon kun mchog la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-11: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-12: gzhan rnams la yang de bzhin sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-13: phyag rgya'i rgyud ni gcig pu 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-14: bdag nyid gang la yod gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-15: bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-16: mi thub pa dang mi sod 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-17: de la rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-18: kun mchog dngos grub kun gsol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-19: kun gsol kun byed thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-20: bka' bsgo ba kun grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-21: dpal mchog dang po gsang ba'i bla ma dam pa'i dpal rang gi dam tshig gi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i chog ga'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:270b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog dang po mchog tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab la mtha' med cing shin tu mtha' yas pa tshad med cing gzhal du med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-0: don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi mchog @271a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-1: gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dam pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-2: rab tu dga' ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-4: yid bde ba'i dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-5: mchog gi phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-6: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-8: 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-9: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ste thams cad rnal 'byor zhes bya bar gang brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-11: gang la nye bar sbyor ba de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-13: kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-14: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-15: byin rlabs mchog ni brtags mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' myur du grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-18: 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i reg bya'i rgyas btab pa tsam gyis kyang ma lus shing lus pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271a-19: lhag ma med pa thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid kyis 'dod pa grub par byed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271b-0: zhes bya ba shin tu mchog @271b tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271b-1: rnam par 'phrul ba dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing g-yo ba'i mig gi zur gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi dga' ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i mda' zhes bya bas rgyas btab pas thams cad rjes su chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271b-5: dngos grub mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid kyis 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271b-6: 'dzum zhing chung zad phye ba'i mig gi lta ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dpal rdo rje spyan zhes bya'i phyag rgya thams cad sgrub par byed pa ste 'dis lta zhing btung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271b-7: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271b-8: tshe zad pa thams cad kyang 'dis rdo rje sems dpa'i na tshod gzhon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271b-14: dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271b-18: shin tu bde ba thams cad dang yid bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271b-19: dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:271b-20: ji srid dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272a-1: btab pa tsam gyis skad cig ma gcig gis grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272a-2: bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i g-yon pa'i mig dgod cing gtod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272a-3: bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272a-4: 'dis rgyas btab pas thams cad las rnam par rgyal par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272a-5: phyag byed du bcug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272a-6: rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272a-7: ji srid mchog thams cad grub cing dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug nyid rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272a-8: sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272a-10: gsod zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272a-11: dga' ba chen po dpal don yod pa'i dbang phyug gi ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272a-12: 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272a-13: g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la rgyas btab pas 'dud par gyur nas dngos grub mchog thams cad la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs kyi mchog gi dam pa'i dngos grub kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272b-0: rnam par 'phrul pa dang sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i zhal nyid ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i @272b dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod dga' bas rnam par 'phrul pa brtson ba zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272b-1: 'dis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi slob dpon mchog dang po'i glu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272b-2: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272b-3: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272b-4: rdo rje 'dzin kun rgyal po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272b-6: rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa'i 'dzum pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams grub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272b-7: sarba ku ru ya th'a su kham zhes bya ba brjod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba 'di rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:272b-10: chos thams cad rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid thob pa'i ye shes dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-1: dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-2: rnam par 'phrul ba dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing smin ma'i khro gnyer rdo rje lta ba'i phyag rgya ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-3: 'dis rgyas btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad rjes su chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-10: rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-13: pra dbab pa thams cad bsgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-15: rmad du byung ba thams cad so sor ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-16: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyis bya ba ston pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-17: thams cad la rgyas btab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-19: gdul ba dang gsod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-22: mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa gzhom du med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-23: thams cad dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-24: thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273a-25: sna tshogs pa yi bya ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-0: rab 'jug mchod pa byin @273b gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-1: rdo rje padma zhes bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-2: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-3: thams cad rnam par sbyong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-10: nad dang mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya nye bar zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-11: shi ba yang dag par gso ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-12: dbang phyug thams cad thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-13: gzugs sna tshogs pa'i bya ba thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa la sogs pa'i don grub pa'i dngos grub mtha' yas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-14: nam mkha' phra bar bskyod pa dag gis rol zhing rnal 'byor thams cad kyis rjes su chags par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-15: 'di la bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-16: 'dis rgyas btab pas bcom ldan 'das rjes su chags shing dgyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-17: brtan par rjes su chags nas nam mkha' thams cad kyi bdag nyid kun gyis dngos po nyid kyi phyir bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-18: mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid la 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:273b-19: zhes bya ba yang gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-2: gsang ba dam pa gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-3: mig sogs phyag rgya rgyas btab pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-4: rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-5: rdo rje kun 'dzin slob dpon gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-6: tsum pa na dang 'khyud sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-7: thams cad rnal 'byor rjes bsgrub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-8: myur du kun la rgyas gdab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-9: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-10: sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-11: grub pa med pa rnams la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-12: dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-13: gang la dngos grub med gyur dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-14: bsod nams phun tshogs med pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-15: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-17: gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-18: snying po la sogs nye snying pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-19: bsgrub bya grub par ma gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-20: tsum pa sogs kyis rgyas gdab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-21: gang phyir gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-22: dngos grub kun gyi bde dam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa mchog de yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-24: de nyid chen po 'di grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-25: mchog gi bdag nyid dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-26: mchog tu gsang ba bsod nams ldan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-27: so so'i skye bo la brjod min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-28: rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-29: de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-30: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274a-31: sbyin te gzhan la sbyin mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-1: bdag nyid gang la yod gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-2: bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-3: mi thub pa dang sod mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-4: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-5: kun mchog dngos grub kun stsol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-6: thams cad mdzad cing thams cad mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-7: thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-8: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-10: mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud phyag rgya bcu pa rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-11: de nas mchog tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu mtha' yas pa tshad med cing gzhal du med cing brjod kyis mi lang zhing rab tu khyab pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-12: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu grub pa'i rdo rjes gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-13: de la phyag rgya bcu ni bdag nyid thams cad bskyed par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-14: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-15: sngon du dang po'i dngos grub thams cad mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs myur du sgrub par byed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-16: de la 'di ni sku'i phyag rgya ste ba dan gsum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:274b-17: kha tv'am ga'i phyag rgya bcings nas g-yon ba dril bu dang bcas shing g-yas pa bslang ba'i tshul du byed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275a-1: bcas pa'i mdzub mo la sogs pa bkrol ba'i gar gyis rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma gtod ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275a-2: thams cad kyi mchog dngos grub chen po dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgyas dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dgyes pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275a-3: des rdo rje bsnyems ma yongs su btang bar byas na dngos grub bzhir 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275a-4: rdo rje bsnyems ma de nyid kyis rgyas btab na thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid mi 'gyur ba'i mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275a-5: mda' gsor bas rgyas btab na rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang rjes su chags par byed na bud med gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275a-6: rdo rje ki li ki las rgyas btab na lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275a-7: lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad kyi bud med thams cad rol bar byed cing ma grub na yang thams cad sgrub par nus pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275a-8: chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275a-10: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas yongs su dgod cing phreng ba dor ba'i sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275a-11: phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thob pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275b-0: mchog tu gsang ba'i ras ris kyi phyag rgya ci lta ba bzhin du @275b brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275b-1: bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi mchod pas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad thob pa mi zad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275b-2: rdo rje gtod pa'i phyag rgyas srid pa gsum thams cad bskyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275b-4: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275b-5: rkang pas lha'i gzugs brnyan mnan cing rgyas btab nas sdigs mdzub byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275b-6: lha la sogs pa'i sems can de dang de ring por mi thogs par rgyas btab pas bka' bsgo ba thams cad dang las rnams byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275b-7: stan mthon po la skyil krung phyed pas 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275b-8: rkang pa g-yon pas rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan yang mnan nas rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje sems dpa' mnan nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275b-9: dngos grub yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa rnams nyams su myong na lha la sogs pa'i sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275b-10: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi rtags bzung nas g-yas pa rdo rje la sogs pa gtod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275b-11: yid la 'dod pa'i lha'i bu mo thams cad la rgyas 'debs shing stobs kyis rol bar byed pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:275b-12: sgrub par byed pa ste rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-0: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba ni bcu ste @276a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-3: g-yon pa'i lcags kyu la g-yas pa de gzhug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-4: lcags kyu'i rtse mo btsir ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-5: phan tshun sems brud pa'i snying gar byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-7: snying gar rdo rje brtan par rab tu bzhag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-9: rtse ba'i phyag rgya yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-19: bde ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams don yod par thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-20: de nas gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i las bcu ni dbus ma'i lcags kyus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-21: kha sbyor gyi nang du rdo rje sor mo rnams thams cad kyi las so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-23: de nyid kyis mthil gnyis su brud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-25: de nyid kyi lcags kyu gnyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-27: de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo bcing bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-29: de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo dag gi rol mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-31: de nyid kyis mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mo bcing ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276a-32: 'di rnams kyis btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad sgrub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-5: thams cad smrar gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-6: gar byed du gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-9: de nas las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-10: lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-11: bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad brtan par rjes su chags pa ni rdo rje lta bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-12: rab tu dga' ba'i sgrub pa ni ma mchu nang du g-yo bar byed pas myang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-14: chags pa brtan zhing ltung ba ni dbugs ring por gtong bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-15: de nas las 'dod pa thams cad kyis dbang phyug thob pa ni dpung ba gnyis gtod pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-16: thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ba ni snying gar gzhug pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-17: yod pa thams cad rnyed pa ni mig dgug pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-18: 'dod pa'i chags pa bskyed pa ni dbus dang bcas pa'i smin pa'i gdong gis lta bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-19: thams cad 'bebs pa'i cho ga ni rang gi snying phra bar bskyod pa'i las rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-20: 'dod pa'i chags pa gsad pa ni dbugs btang bas rang nyid ldang bar byed pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:276b-21: 'dod pa thams cad kyi rjes su spyod pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi byed pa ni bka' bsgo bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-0: de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la @277a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-2: g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la yang nye bar sbyor na don yod grub pas skad cig nyid kyis brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyis rgyas btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-3: de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje bsnyems ma'i phyag rgyas thams cad bsgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-4: rdo rje mtshon cha mas thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-6: rdo rje ki li ki las rab tu dga' ba'i reg bya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-7: dngos grub thams cad bde bar grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-8: rgyal mtshan sgreng bas 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-9: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas bdag po chen po nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-10: dus kyis mchod pas mchod par 'gyur ba nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-11: rdo rje gsor bas thams cad 'dul ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-12: rdo rje dor bas thams cad gsod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-14: g-yon pa bsnyems shing g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi las rnams kyis sgyu ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277a-19: gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-0: dbang du byed pa la sogs pa'i las @277b thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-1: rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-2: rdo rje sku mchog gi dngos grub thams cad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-3: mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus dngos grub thams cad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-4: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bdud thams cad la sogs pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i de nyid kyis mthe bo'i rdo rjes bkab pas thams cad rnyed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-5: de nyid kyi mthe bo gnyis bcug pa'i gtsug tor rdo rjes thams cad bsrung ba'i mthe bo rdo rje nang du bcug pa de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-7: dbang du byed pa bsgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-8: mthe'u chung rdo rje sor mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyis legs par bzung bas mthe bo ni dpal dgug pa dang dbang du byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-9: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rgyal mo de nyid kyis nor thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-11: de nyid kyi dbus ma gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yongs su btsir bas bdud la sogs pa'i gdon las grol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-12: dbang du byas nas las thams cad la sbyor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-13: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes yul thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:277b-14: de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-1: nas rdo rje lha mo rol tu gzhug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-2: de yang rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje chen pos rgyas btab pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-3: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chags pa dang bral ba'i 'khor los so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-7: srin lag gi 'khor lo bsgreng bar byas la mthe bo dang mthe'u chung mnyam la dral bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-8: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bsgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis rgyas btab cing bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-9: btsir bas 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-10: mdzub mo lcags kyus 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba dgug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-11: mdzub mos phrag dog la sogs pa'i 'dod pas thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-12: rtag tu bskyod pas rab tu dga' ba 'bebs shing de nas bsgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-13: skye gnas g-yo bas bud med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-14: skyes pa dag gi rab tu dga' ba la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu mtha' yas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-15: kha sbyor btsir bas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dus pa dang bral ba yang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278a-16: rtags kyi sen mo g-yon pa'i mthil brud pas shin tu brtan pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-0: gzhan gyi 'dod pa la mi @278b lta zhing gzhan la mi 'gro bar shin tu bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-1: yid bde ba ster ba'i bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-2: skye gnas su sen mo brud pas skyes bu rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-3: de nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-4: de la lus thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khyud la ma mchu so rnams kyis bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-5: rmongs pas bde ba ster du gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-6: bsgrub pas rab tu dga' ba'i dngos grub kyis rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-7: mchog dang po'i dngos grub kyis su ra ta stvam zhes bcom ldan 'das la brjod cing de kho na nyid bskul bas grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-8: rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad sgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-9: lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur gsang bar reg na thams cad bsgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-10: bde ba chen po rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i lta bas thams cad grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-11: smin ma gyen du bteg pas ltung ba slong ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-12: rang gi ma mchu nang du myang bas skal ba bzang po chen po sgrub ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-13: rang gi lce bskyod pas rang nyid kyi bden pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-14: de kho na nyid gsal zhing mi slu bar smra ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-15: rang gi lus la 'bebs pas gzugs thams cad yongs su bsgyur ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:278b-17: sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-1: nyid rdo rje bsgoms pas nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-2: de nas dang po las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo kha tv'am gso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-3: dngos grub thams cad rdo rje khu tshur dag gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dag gis dngos grub thams cad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-5: thams cad gsod pa ni khro bo'i khu tshur dag gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-6: thams cad sbyar ba ni padma'i khu tshur dag gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-7: nor thams cad dbrog pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-8: thams cad 'bebs pa ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-9: thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa ni kha tv'am ga gtor ba'i khu tshur dag gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-10: thams cad smrar gzhug pa ni mdzub mo mnyam pa'i lce'i khu tshur dag gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-11: thams cad bskyod pa ni brtan pa'i khu tshur dag gis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-12: thams cad gzhug cing don yod par bsgrub pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i khu tshur gyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-13: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ci 'dod pa'i lag pa'i sor mo'i phyag rgya bcu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279a-14: don yod cing thogs pa med par skad cig mas myur du grub par byed pa 'di lta ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-0: 'di rnams kyis rgyas btab na thams cad du @279b rjes su chags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-8: 'thab mo las rnam par rgyal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-9: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa yin no zhes bya ba gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-10: 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-12: phyag rgya'i rtog pa rab tu brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-13: rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-14: de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-15: rtogs pa tsam gyis skad cig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-16: don yod kun grub bde bar gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-19: mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-20: de nas mchog tu mkhas shing mtha' las 'das pa tshad med cing gzhal du med pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyis las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya stong bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-21: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-22: phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-23: sgeg bcas mdzub sogs bkrol ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-24: las kyi phyag rgya chen po rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:279b-25: thams cad gar gyis bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-1: rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus khyad par du las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ste brgya phrag dang po mchog tu bsgrubs te rdo rje dam tshig lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-2: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-3: kha sbyor nang du gsal ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-4: mchog dang po yi gsang chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-5: las kyi phyag rgya rgya gzhan yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-6: zhes bya ba rdo rje lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-7: rdo rje las kyi mchod pa che'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-8: thal mos sbyi bor bzung nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-9: las kyi phyag rgya grub pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-10: dbang po rnams dang sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-11: zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-12: rdo rje bsnyems mas gar bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-13: sgeg bcas mthe'u chung sogs bkrol bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-14: de nyid bcings nas gar bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-16: zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi las don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgya brgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-17: rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-18: thams cad kyis ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-19: mchog dang po yi las chen po'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-20: phyag rgya mchog ni gzhan yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-21: zhes bya ba rgyal mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-22: mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-23: las kyi phyag rgya bde ba brgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280a-24: rab tu dga' mchog sgra bkrol bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-0: bde ba @280b nyid du mngon par sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-1: zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i 'dod pa ma'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-2: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-3: ji bzhin phyag rgya mchog sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-4: las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs brgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-5: mchog dang po ni rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-6: ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-7: rdo rje lha mo'i kha tv'am ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-8: lus kun gyis ni gar bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-9: rdo rje gar mchog glu blang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-10: dang po'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-11: ji ltar gong du rgyas gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-12: rol mo mchog gi phyag rgya'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-13: rol mo brdung zhing glu len pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-14: phyag rgya kun gyi gsal ba brgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-15: zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis phyag bya ste phyag rgya stong mchog tu grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-16: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-17: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-18: nam mkha'i mtha' ltar grangs med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-19: phyag rgya'i rgyal mo grub mchog ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-20: kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-21: dbang phyug chen po'i mchog grub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-22: nam mkha' kun gyi go skabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-24: dam pa mchog tu grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-25: mchog gi dam pa rgyud chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-26: dam pa mchog gi dngos grub ster //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-27: rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:280b-28: de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-2: bstan par bya ste gzhan la min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-3: de ltar mchog tu mi 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bde ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-4: mchog tu rnam dag rdo rje bde grub mtha' yas 'bras bur ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-5: dpal mchog dang po'i gsang ba'i de nyid mchog gi sku'i tshul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-6: mchog tu rtag pa'i rtog pa'i tshul 'di yongs su mthar thug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-8: dam pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-9: de nas sems dpa' chen po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-10: rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-11: rdo rje 'chang chen gtso bo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-12: mgon la bde gshegs rnams kyis gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-13: kun mchog nam mkha' chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-14: dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-15: rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-16: de nyid sems dpa' chen pos gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-17: rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-18: rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-19: gang gis rgyud 'di phyi ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-20: dang po'i gnas mchog ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-21: de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-22: rab dga' nyid dang bzang ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-23: rdo rje bsnyems bdag ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-24: sems dang sems dpa' ting 'dzin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-25: de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-26: rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281a-27: byang chub spyod pa ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-0: bdud @281b dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-1: byang chub sangs rgyas ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-2: rdo rje gtum po mthar byed nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-3: phyag na rdo rje ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-4: ji ltar dang po'i rigs byung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-5: 'dod pa thar pa ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-6: ji ltar mgon po rnam gsum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-7: khyod ni ji ltar thams cad nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-8: dang po'i snying po ji ltar byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-9: de ci nye snying ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-10: bde chen rdo rje chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-11: don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-12: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ji skad gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-13: de yi rnam smin ji ltar bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-14: thig gdab ba dang brtag pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-15: dngos grub ji ltar gsungs pa lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-16: gsang ba lnga yi de bde ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-17: ji ltar gyur pa ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-18: dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-19: rigs rnams gsal ba ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-20: thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-21: phyag mtshan tshogs kyi de nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-22: thams cad dgug gzhug mchod pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-23: bdag byin brlabs sogs sgrub pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-24: de ni de nyid gsang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-25: don yod pa ni mchog nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-27: thams cad bdag cag rnams la gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-28: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi mdo gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-29: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-30: rtog pa kun gyi bdag po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:281b-31: the tshom tshogs rnams gsan nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-2: de la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-3: rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-4: sems can don yod yongs brtags bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-5: des na rtog par gsungs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-6: rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-7: de nas rgyud phyi ma ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-8: rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-9: phyi ma sngar dang yang dag byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-10: de nyid gsang ba'i gsang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-11: phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-12: de la dang po gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-13: nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-14: rdo rje kun mchog rang bzhin mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-15: bde ba chen po dga' ba che'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-16: grong khyer der ni mi 'gyur mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-17: ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rtog pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-18: de la thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-19: nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-20: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-21: sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-22: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-24: dkon mchog dngos grub chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-25: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282a-26: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-0: rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog @282b de la bcom ldan 'das dga' ba chen po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-1: nyes pa med cing shin tu rtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-2: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-4: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-5: de la ci kun tu bzang po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-6: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-7: gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-8: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid //byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-9: de la rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-10: kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-11: dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-12: rdo rje dbang phyug chen bstod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-13: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-14: ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-15: mchog dang po yi de nyid 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' gang gang brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-17: dngos grub kun gyi 'byor ba rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-19: zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-20: de nas de'i 'og tu las kyi bya bas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog nyid du bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-21: zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:282b-22: de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems can ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-1: gyis mi khyab rgya che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-2: thab dngos kun bde mi 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-3: thams cad khyab cing dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-4: byang chub sems ni bdag brtan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-5: de nas 'di'i las kyi khyad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-6: sems nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-7: ting 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-8: rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-9: rdo rje las ni 'dzin gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-10: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-11: sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-12: bdag la byin rlabs mchog bsgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-13: nyin re sgrub par byed na des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-15: de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-16: snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-17: gang phyir sems can don gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-18: de phyi nga ni kun tu bzang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-20: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul bas rgyal ba ji ltar yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-21: sems nyid kho na bdud nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-22: sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-23: rang sems gdul bar bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-24: bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-25: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-27: rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283a-28: byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-0: de phyir de nyid sangs @283b rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-1: bdag byin rlabs mchog grub phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-2: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-3: mi phyed so sor rtogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-4: gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-5: sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-6: byang chub sems ni brtan pa bdag //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-7: kun tu bzang po'i lag tu ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-8: mtshon cha de ni rgyal bas byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-9: brtan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-10: des na phyag na rdo rje des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-11: de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs las byung ba shes pa'i rgyud yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-12: shes rab pha rol phyin pa yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-13: yab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-15: rigs rnams rab tu byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-16: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-18: bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-19: dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-20: dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-21: bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-22: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-23: bdag ni dus gsum mtha' yas phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-24: nga ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-25: gsum mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-26: 'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum nga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-27: de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyin yid zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-28: nga nyid brtan pa thams cad bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:283b-29: bsod nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-2: sgyu ma thams cad nga yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-3: zhes bya ba rang gi las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-4: de la ji ltar dang po'i glu byung ba shes pa yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-5: srid pa shin tu grub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-6: dbang phyug chen po mchog grub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-7: gzi can sems can don mdzad phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-8: bskal ba thog mar bcom ldan gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-9: de nas de gang yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-11: rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-12: gsang ba'i phyir ni snying por brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-13: yi ge h'um ni mi 'gyur mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-14: de nas nye bar snying po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-15: de kho na nyid shes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-16: de nyid gsang zhing gsang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-17: snying po rab tu brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-18: snying po'i rjes su sgrub par 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-19: nye ba'i snying po nyid du brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-20: de la ji ltar bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa dam tshig gi bshad pa'i rgyud yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-21: dngos grub kun gyi mi 'gyur bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-22: bde ba chen po zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-23: rdo rje de nyid don yod grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-25: zhes bya ba'i mchog gi dam pa'i glu bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-26: de la ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi don shes pa yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284a-27: ji lta gnas dang 'khor lo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-0: ji ltar dgod par 'gro ba @284b dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-1: 'khor dang bcas pa dgod pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-3: de nas rnam par shes pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-4: rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-5: 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-6: rtag pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-7: phyir na bris na'ang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-8: de nas thig gdab pa'i cho ga ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-9: shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-10: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-11: shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-12: thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-13: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-14: ka ba brgyad kyis nyer mdzes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-15: sgo bzhi rta babs kha khyer dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-16: dra ba dra phyed la sogs brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-17: der bdag po'i don shes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-18: nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-19: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-20: sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-21: dpal mchog dang po zhes byar brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-23: kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-24: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-25: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-26: rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-27: ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-28: de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-29: padma r'a ga dang mtshungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-30: thams cad dag pa bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:284b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-2: de nas padma'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-3: rdo rje chos ni rab grub phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-4: sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-5: padma chen po'i rigs dag pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-6: ting 'dzin ye shes kun nas bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-8: de la ji ltar nam mkha'i snying po yin zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-9: thams cad nam mkha'i bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-10: sems can bsod nams mthong zhing che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-11: nam mkha'i snying po sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-12: de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-13: dbang bskur ba dang gter dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-14: rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchod pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-15: nor bu chen po'i rigs grub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-16: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-17: zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de kho na nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-18: rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba shes pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-19: sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-20: rdo rje rin chen rdo rje la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-21: spyan ras gzigs la rdo rje sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-23: de nas mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-24: kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-25: dbang phyug chen po'i mtshon cha che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-26: gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-27: rdo rje rtse lnga zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285a-28: de nas rigs thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid shes pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-0: sangs rgyas thams @285b cad sangs rgyas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-1: sna tshogs bya ba rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-2: 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-3: nor bu nor bu bsags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-4: zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-5: de la ji ltar thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-6: rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-7: rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-8: bkug te de nas rjes bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-9: dril bu nyid kyi ba ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-10: ji ltar mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-11: rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-12: rab tu dga' bas mchod nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-13: glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-14: mchod de slar yang rnal 'byor mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-15: de la ji ltar dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-16: rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-17: phyag rgya kun gyis legs byin brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-18: dam tshig chen po 'di nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-19: rang nyid bsgrubs nas snying po bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-20: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-21: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-22: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-23: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-24: ces bya ba mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-25: de la ji ltar rang lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin 9zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:285b-26: brtan pa dang ni g-yo ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-1: pa kun las bsgrub bya gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-2: rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-3: de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-4: de nas thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i rgyud ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-5: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-6: rdo rje dril bus rab sad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-7: rtog pa thams cad rjes bsgrubs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-9: de la ji ltar 'bad pa med pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-10: bsgrub bya ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-11: phyi nas ji ltar 'dod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-12: ci 'dod spyod pa la spyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-13: thams cad byed cing thams cad bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-16: dgod pa dang ni smra ba 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-17: gang der ji bzhin de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-18: dbang po gang dang gang lam gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-19: de dang de yi ngo bor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-20: mnyam par bzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-21: rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-23: thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya //
