K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-24: sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-25: rtag tu mthong zhing grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-26: dam tshig chen po de nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-27: mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-28: de ni sdig kun dang bral bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-29: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286a-30: zhes bya ba dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-0: de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i cho ga ma nyams @286b mchog gi bla ma gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-1: mchog tu gsang ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga bde mchog myur du grub phyir gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-2: rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang bcas bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyis byin brlabs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-3: bde chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dga' chen mchog gis de gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-5: mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-6: de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-7: mkha' ltar thug med kun tu 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-8: sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-9: rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-10: bdag gi snying po dang 'di mchog chen gso ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-11: mtha' yas pa dang thog med mthar thug med pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-12: mchod bya chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-13: nam mkha' dang mtshungs mchog gi dngos 'phel gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-14: de ni sus kyang mthar thug byed par nus pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-15: sems can rnams ni dman la zhen cing nyung la dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-16: dad pa med cing slu ba byed la ma sbyangs pa; ;rtag tu rjes su chags shing chags bral la chags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:286b-17: de rnams la ni phan phyir 'di ni mthar thug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-0: gang gi khyim na 'di gnas gang gis rab tu bsgrub pa [line missing?] @287a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-1: 'am; ;yang na ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir sgrub byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-2: so sor nyams su myong ba'i mthu yis thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-3: bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-4: rdo rje 'chang sogs sku ni gang gis sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-5: gzugs brnyan la sogs thams cad 'dir ni ji bzhin gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-6: des ni thams cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-7: bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-8: gang zhig rdo rje la sogs gzugs brnyan la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-9: ji ltar 'dod pa 'di dag thams cad sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-10: rab tu 'dod pas yi ge h'um las bris nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-11: 'dod pa'i dngos grub de yis ster zhing thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-12: rgyal po rnams kyis rnam par sbyangs par mdzad pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-13: gang la don kun dag phyir mdzad par mi 'gyur min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-14: 'di ni bgegs byed bdud rnams kyang ni yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-15: rtogs pas dngos grub 'phel zhing byin gyis brlabs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-16: nga ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-17: brtan pa nyid phyir nga ni brtan par mdzad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-18: rtag pa 'di ni mchog chen gang gis sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-19: de la nga ni dngos grub myur du sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287a-20: dngos grub chen po la thams cad du rjes su chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-0: shi na @287b tu brtan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-2: rtag tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-3: gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po'i snying po sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-4: rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-5: de dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde ba'ang thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-6: de phyir 'di la dad cing gus par bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-7: de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-8: yab mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-9: sras mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-10: rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-11: dam pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-12: sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag byin brlab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-13: rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-14: ji ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-15: phyi nas kyang ni de bzhin grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-16: de ltar dag chen gsungs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-17: sras dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-19: gsungs la rjes su yi rang mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-21: rtog pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mchog rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-22: thugs dam pa'i snying po tho lding du rgya gar gyi mkhan po panti ta mkhas pa chen po mantra k'a la sha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:287b-23: sgrub bsgyur gyi lo tstsha ba lha btsan po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:288a-0: @288a *// lo tstsha chen po rin chen bzang po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:288a-1: dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bsgyur ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:288a-2: bar bar dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-085-006:288a-3: bdag gis 'bad pas dpe btsal rnyed pas bsgyur //
